1a1('bum): (pha) @#/ ! /sher phyin stong phrag brgya pa bzhugs so/ /
1a2('bum): (黃) 大般若經第十四部
1b1('bum): @##/ /shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa stong phrag brgya pa/ bam po dang po/
1b2('bum): de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byord kyis/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsold to/ /bcom
1b3('bum): l dan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos mnyam pa nyid gang la bslab par bgyi ba'i byang chub
1b4('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi mnyam pa nyid gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis
1b5('bum): bka' stsald pa/ rab 'byord nang stong pa nyid ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
1b6('bum): chen po rnams kyi mnyam pa nyid do/ /rab 'byord phyi stong pa nyid ni/ byang chub sems dpa'
1b7('bum): sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi mnyam pa nyid do/ /rab 'byor phyi nang stong pa nyid ni/
2a1('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi mnyam pa nyid do/ /rab 'byor stong pa nyid stong pa nyid ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi mnyam pa nyid do/ /rab 'byor
2a2('bum): chen po stong pa nyid ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi mnyam pa nyid do/ /rab 'byor don dam pa stong pa nyid ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi mnyam pa nyid do/ /rab 'byor
2a3('bum): 'dus byas stong pa nyid ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi mnyam pa nyid do/ /rab 'byor 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi mnyam pa nyid do/ /rab 'byor
2a4('bum): mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi mnyam pa nyid do/ /rab 'byor thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi mnyam pa
2a5('bum): nyid do/ /rab 'byor dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi mnyam pa nyid do/ /rab 'byor rang bzhin stong pa nyid ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi
2a6('bum): mnyam pa nyid do/ /rab 'byor chos thams cad stong pa nyid ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' rnams kyi mnyam pa nyid do/ /rab 'byor rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
2a7('bum): po rnams kyi mnyam pa nyid do/ /rab 'byor myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' rnams kyi mnyam pa nyid do/ /rab 'byor dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid ni byang chub sems dpa'
2a8('bum): sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi mnyam pa nyid do/ /rab 'byor ngo bo nyid stong pa ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi mnyam pa nyid do/ /rab 'byor dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid
2b1('bum): ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi mnyam pa nyid do/ /gzugs ni gzugs kyis stong / tshor ba ni tshor bas stong / 'du shes ni 'du shes kyis stong / 'du byed ni 'du byed kyis stong /
2b2('bum): rnam par shes pa ni rnam par shes pas stong / myig ni myig gis stong / rna ba ni rna bas stong / sna ni snas stong / lce ni lces stong / lus ni lus kyis stong / yid ni yid kyis stong / gzugs ni gzugs
2b3('bum): kyis stong / sgra ni sgras stong / dri ni dris stong / ro ni ros stong / reg ni reg gis stong / chos ni chos kyis stong / myig gi rnam par shes pa ni myig gi rnam par shes pas stong / rna ba'i
2b4('bum): rnam par shes pa ni rna ba'i rnam par shes pas stong / sna'i rnam par shes pa ni sna'i rnam par shes pas stong / lce'i rnam par shes pa ni lce'i rnam par shes pas stong / lus kyi rnam par
2b5('bum): shes pa ni lus kyi rnam par shes pas stong / yid kyi rnam par shes pa ni yid kyi rnam par shes pas stong / myig gi 'dus te reg pa ni myig gi 'dus te reg pas stong / rna ba'i 'dus te
2b6('bum): reg pa ni rna ba'i 'dus te reg pas stong / sna'i 'dus te reg pa ni sna'i 'dus te reg pas stong / lce'i 'dus te reg pa ni lce'i 'dus te reg pas stong / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa ni
2b7('bum): lus kyi 'dus te reg pas stong / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa ni yid kyi 'dus te reg pas stong / myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba ni myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor bas stong /
2b8('bum): rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba ni rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor bas stong / sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba ni sna'i 'dus reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor bas stong / lce'i
3a1('bum): 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba ni lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor bas stong / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba ni lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor bas stong /
3a2('bum): yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba ni yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor bas stong / sa'i khams ni sa'i khams kyis stong / chu'i khams ni chu'i khams kyis stong / mye'i khams ni
3a3('bum): mye'i khams kyis stong / rlung gi khams ni rlung gi khams kyis stong / nam mkha'i khams ni nam mkha'i khams kyis stong / rnam par shes pa'i khams ni rnam par shes pa'i khams kyis stong /
3a4('bum): ma rig pa ni ma rig pas stong / 'du byed ni 'du byed kyis stong / rnam par shes pa ni rnam par shes pas stong / mying dang gzugs ni mying dang gzugs kyis stong / skye mched drug ni skye mched drug
3a5('bum): gis stong / reg pa ni reg pas stong / tshor ba ni tshor bas stong / sred pa ni sred pas stong / len pa ni len pas stong / srid pa ni srid pas stong / skye ba ni skye bas stong / rga shi ni rga shis stong /
3a6('bum): sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pas stong / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pas stong / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pas
3a7('bum): stong / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pas stong / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pas stong / shes rab kyi pha rol tu
3a8('bum): phyin pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas stong / nang stong pa nyid ni nang stong pa nyid kyis stong / phyi stong pa nyid ni phyi stong pa nyid kyis stong / phyi nang stong pa nyid ni phyi nang stong pa nyid kyis stong /
3b1('bum): stong pa nyid stong pa nyid ni stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyis stong / chen po stong pa nyid ni chen po stong pa nyid kyis stong / don dam pa stong pa nyid ni don dam pa stong nyid kyis stong / 'dus byas stong pa nyid ni 'dus byas
3b2('bum): stong pa nyid kyis stong / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid ni 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyis stong / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid ni mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyis stong / thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid ni
3b3('bum): thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid kyis stong / dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid ni dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid kyis stong / rang bzhin stong pa nyid ni rang bzhin stong nyid kyis stong / chos thams cad stong pa nyid ni chos
3b4('bum): thams cad stong pa nyid kyis stong / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid ni rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyis stong / myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid ni myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid kyis stong / dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid
3b5('bum): ni dngos po myed pa stong nyid kyis stong / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ni ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyis stong / dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ni dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyis stong / dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams ni dran pa
3b6('bum): nye bar bzhag pa rnams kyis stong / yang dag par spong ba rnams ni yang dag par spong ba rnams kyis stong / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams ni rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyis stong / dbang po rnams ni dbang
3b7('bum): po rnams kyis stong / stobs rnams ni stobs rnams kyis stong / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams ni byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyis stong / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa ni 'phags
3b8('bum): pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pas stong / 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams ni 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyis stong / bsam gtan rnams ni bsam gtan rnams kyis stong / tshad myed pa rnams ni tshad
4a1('bum): myed pa rnams kyis stong / gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams ni gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyis stong / rnam par thar pa rnams ni rnam par thar pa
4a2('bum): rnams kyis stong / mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa ni mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyis stong / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan
4a3('bum): ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa ni rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pas stong / mngon par shes pa rnams ni mngon par shes pa rnams kyis stong / ting nge
4a4('bum): 'dzin rnams ni ting nge 'dzin rnams kyis stong / gzungs kyi sgo rnams ni gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyis stong / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams
4a5('bum): kyis stong / myi 'jigs pa rnams ni myi 'jigs pa rnams kyis stong / so so yang dag par rig pa rnams ni so so yang dag par rig pa rnams kyis stong / byams pa chen po ni/ byams
4a6('bum): pa chen pos stong / snying rje chen po ni snying rje chen pos stong / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams ni sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyis stong / rgyun tu zhugs pa'i
4a7('bum): 'bras bu ni rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bus stong / lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu ni lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bus stong / phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu ni phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras
4a8('bum): bus stong / dgra bcom pa nyid ni dgra bcom pa nyid kyis stong / rang byang chub ni rang byang chub kyis stong / lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid ni lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyis stong /
4b1('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyis stong ste/ rab 'byor 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi mnyam pa nyid de/ de la gnas shing
4b2('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags/ byang chub
4b3('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gzugs bas par bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ gzugs 'dod chags dang bral bar bgyi
4b4('bum): ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ gzugs 'gag par bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags
4b5('bum): sam/ gzugs myi skye bar bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ tshor ba bas par bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa
4b6('bum): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ tshor ba 'dod chags dang bral bar bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/
4b7('bum): tshor ba 'gag par bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ tshor ba myi skye bar bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad
4b8('bum): mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ 'du shes bas par bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ 'du shes 'dod chags dang
5a1('bum): bral bar bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ 'du shes 'gag par bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
5a2('bum): pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ 'du shes myi skye bar bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ 'du byed bas par bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/
5a3('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ 'du byed 'dod chags dang bral bar bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ 'du byed
5a4('bum): 'gag par bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ 'du byed myi skye bar bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob
5a5('bum): pa lags sam/ rnam par shes pa bas par bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ rnam par shes pa 'dod chags dang bral bar bgyi ba'i slad du
5a6('bum): slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ rnam par shes pa 'gag par bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/
5a7('bum): rnam par shes pa myi skye bar bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ myig bas par bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa
5a8('bum): lags sam/ myig 'dod chags dang bral bar bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ myig 'gag par bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad
5b1('bum): mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ myig myi skye bar bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ rna ba bas par bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
5b2('bum): pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ rna ba 'dod chags dang bral bar bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ rna ba 'gag par bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/
5b3('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ rna ba myi skye bar bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ sna bas par bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad
5b4('bum): mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ sna 'dod chags dang bral bar bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ sna 'gag par bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa
5b5('bum): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ sna myi skye bar bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ lce bas par bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa
5b6('bum): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ lce 'dod chags dang bral bar bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ lce 'gag par
5b7('bum): bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ lce myi skye bar bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags
5b8('bum): sam/ lus bas par bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ lus 'dod chags dang bral bar bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad
6a1('bum): mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ lus 'gag par bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ lus myi skye bar bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du
6a2('bum): slob pa lags sam/ yid bas par bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ yid 'dod chags dang bral bar bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du
6a3('bum): slob pa lags sam/ yid 'gag par bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ yid myi skye bar bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa
6a4('bum): lags sam/ gzugs bas par bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ gzugs 'dod chags dang bral bar bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad
6a5('bum): mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ gzugs 'gag par bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ gzugs myi skye bar bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa
6a6('bum): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ sgra bas par bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ sgra 'dod chags dang bral bar bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/
6a7('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ sgra 'gag par bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ sgra myi skye bar bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/
6a8('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ dri bas par bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ dri 'dod chags dang bral bar bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam
6b1('bum): pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ dri 'gag par bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ dri myi skye bar bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad
6b2('bum): mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ ro bas par bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ ro 'dod chags dang bral bar bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
6b3('bum): nyid du slob pa lags sam/ ro 'gag par bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ ro myi skye bar bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa
6b4('bum): lags sam/ reg bas par bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ reg 'dod chags dang bral bar bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
6b5('bum): nyid du slob pa lags sam/ reg 'gag par bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ reg myi skye bar bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
6b6('bum): nyid du slob pa lags sam/ chos bas par bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ chos 'dod chags dang bral bar bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad
6b7('bum): mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ chos 'gag par bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ chos myi skye bar bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad
6b8('bum): mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ myig gi rnam par shes pa bas par bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ myig gi rnam par shes pa 'dod chags dang bral bar
7a1('bum): bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ myig gi rnam par shes pa 'gag par bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa
7a2('bum): lags sam/ myig gi rnam par shes pa myi skye bar bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ rna ba'i rnam par shes pa bas par bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa
7a3('bum): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ rna ba'i rnam par shes pa 'dod chags dang bral bar bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ rna ba'i rnam par shes
7a4('bum): pa 'gag par bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ rna ba'i rnam par shes pa myi skye bar bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags
7a5('bum): sam/ sna'i rnam par shes pa bas par bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ sna'i rnam par shes pa 'dod chags dang bral bar bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/
7a6('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ sna'i rnam par shes pa 'gag par bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ sna'i rnam par shes pa
7a7('bum): myi skye bar bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ lce'i rnam par shes pa bas par bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags
7a8('bum): sam/ lce'i rnam par shes pa 'dod chags dang bral bar bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ lce'i rnam par shes pa 'gag par bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/
7b1('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ lce'i rnam par shes pa myi skye bar bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ lus kyi rnam par shes pa bas par
7b2('bum): bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ lus kyi rnam par shes pa 'dod chags dang bral bar bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa
7b3('bum): lags sam/ lus kyi rnam par shes pa 'gag par bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ lus kyi rnam par shes pa myi skye bar bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/
7b4('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa bas par bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa
7b5('bum): 'dod chags dang bral bar bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa 'gag par bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du
7b6('bum): slob pa lags sam/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa myi skye bar bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ myig gi 'dus te reg pa bas par bgyi ba'i slad du slob
7b7('bum): na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ myig gi 'dus te reg pa 'dod chags dang bral bar bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/
7b8('bum): myig gi 'dus te reg pa 'gag par bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ myig gi 'dus te reg pa myi skye bar bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa
8a1('bum): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa bas par bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ rna ba'i 'dus
8a2('bum): te reg pa 'dod chags dang bral bar bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa 'gag par bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad

8a5('bum): sam/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa 'gag par bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa myi skye bar bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/

8a8('bum): pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa myi skye bar bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa bas par bgyi ba'i

12b1('bum): mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa 'gag par bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa myi skye bar

12b4('bum): 'gag par bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa myi skye bar bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad
12b5('bum): mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa bas par bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu
12b6('bum): phyin pa 'dod chags dang bral bar bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa 'gag par bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/
12b7('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa myi skye bar bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/
12b8('bum): brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bas par bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'dod chags dang bral
13a1('bum): bar bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'gag par bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad
13a2('bum): mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa myi skye bar bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin
13a3('bum): pa bas par bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'dod chags dang bral bar bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad
13a4('bum): mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'gag par bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ bsam gtan
13a5('bum): gyi pha rol tu phyin pa myi skye bar bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bas par bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa
13a6('bum): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'dod chags dang bral bar bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/
13a7('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'gag par bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa myi skye bar bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/
13a8('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ nang stong pa nyid bas par bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ nang stong pa nyid
13b1('bum): 'dod chags dang bral bar bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ nang stong pa nyid 'gag par bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/
13b2('bum): nang stong pa nyid myi skye bar bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ phyi stong pa nyid bas par bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/
13b3('bum): phyi stong pa nyid 'dod chags dang bral bar bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ phyi stong pa nyid 'gag par bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa
13b4('bum): lags sam/ phyi stong pa nyid myi skye bar bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ phyi nang stong pa nyid bas par bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
13b5('bum): nyid du slob pa lags sam/ phyi nang stong pa nyid 'dod chags dang bral bar bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ phyi nang stong pa nyid 'gag par bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/
13b6('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ phyi nang stong pa nyid myi skye bar bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid bas par
13b7('bum): bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid 'dod chags dang bral bar bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du
13b8('bum): slob pa lags sam/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid 'gag par bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid myi skye bar bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad
14a1('bum): mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ chen po stong pa nyid bas par bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ chen po stong pa nyid 'dod chags dang bral
14a2('bum): bar bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ chen po stong pa nyid 'gag par bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ chen po stong pa nyid
14a3('bum): myi skye bar bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ don dam pa stong pa nyid bas par bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/
14a4('bum): don dam pa stong pa nyid 'dod chags dang bral bar bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ don dam pa stong pa nyid 'gag par bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
14a5('bum): pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ don dam pa stong pa nyid myi skye bar bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid bas par bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/
14a6('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid 'dod chags dang bral bar bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid

14b1('bum): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid 'gag par bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid myi skye bar bgyi ba'i
14b2('bum): slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid bas par bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ mtha' las

14b5('bum): myed pa stong pa nyid bas par bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid 'dod chags dang bral bar bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/
14b6('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid 'gag par bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ thog ma dang
14b7('bum): tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid myi skye bar bgyi ba'i slad du slob/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid bas par bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad

15a7('bum): mtshan nyid stong pa nyid bas par bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid 'dod chags dang bral bar bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa

15b1('bum): stong pa nyid myi skye bar bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid bas par bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags

15b6('bum): ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid bas par bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/

16a1('bum): bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid 'dod chags dang bral bar bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen

16a3('bum): nyid myi skye bar bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi bas par bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du
16a4('bum): slob pa lags sam/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi 'dod chags dang bral bar bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi
16a5('bum): 'gag par bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi myi skye bar bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du
16a6('bum): slob pa lags sam/ yang dag par spong ba bzhi bas par bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ yang dag par spong ba bzhi 'dod chags dang
16a7('bum): bral bar bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ yang dag par spong ba bzhi 'gag par bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid

16b6('bum): mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ stobs lnga 'dod chags dang bral bar bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ stobs lnga 'gag par bgyi
16b7('bum): ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ stobs lnga myi skye bar bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/
16b8('bum): byang chub kyi yan lag bdun bas par bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ byang chub kyi yan lag bdun 'dod chags dang bral bar bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/
17a1('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ byang chub kyi yan lag bdun 'gag par bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ byang chub kyi
17a2('bum): yan lag bdun myi skye bar bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa bas par bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad

17b4('bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi bas par bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ gzugs myed
17b5('bum): pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi 'dod chags dang bral bar bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi 'gag

17b7('bum): nyid du slob pa lags sam/ rnam pa thar pa brgyad bas par bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ rnam pa thar pa brgyad 'dod chags dang bral bar bgyi ba'i
17b8('bum): slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ rnam pa thar pa brgyad 'gag par bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ rnam pa thar pa
18a1('bum): brgyad myi skye bar bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu bas par bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa
18a2('bum): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu 'dod chags dang bral bar bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/

18a4('bum): bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa bas par bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/

18a7('bum): pa lags sam/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa myi skye bar bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/
18a8('bum): mngon par shes pa rnams bas par bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ mngon par shes pa rnams 'dod chags dang bral bar bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa
18b1('bum): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ mngon par shes pa rnams 'gag par bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ mngon par shes pa rnams myi skye bar bgyi ba'i
18b2('bum): slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ ting nge 'dzin rnams bas par bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ ting nge 'dzin rnams
18b3('bum): 'dod chags dang bral bar bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ ting nge 'dzin rnams 'gag par bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa
18b4('bum): lags sam/ ting nge 'dzin rnams myi skye bar bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams bas par bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams
18b5('bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams 'dod chags dang bral bar bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams 'gag
18b6('bum): par bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams myi skye bar bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/
18b7('bum): de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu bas par bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu 'dod chags dang bral bar bgyi ba'i
18b8('bum): slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu 'gag par bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa
19a1('bum): lags sam/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu myi skye bar bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ myi 'jigs pa bzhi bas par bgyi ba'i slad du
19a2('bum): slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ myi 'jigs pa bzhi 'dod chags dang bral bar bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ myi 'jigs pa
19a3('bum): bzhi 'gag par bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ myi 'jigs pa bzhi myi skye bar bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags
19a4('bum): sam/ so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi bas par bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi 'dod chags dang bral bar bgyi ba'i
19a5('bum): slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi 'gag par bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/
19a6('bum): so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi myi skye bar bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ snying rje chen po bas par bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du
19a7('bum): slob pa lags sam/ snying rje chen po 'dod chags dang bral bar bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ snying rje chen po 'gag par bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa
19a8('bum): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ snying rje chen po myi skye bar bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams
19b1('bum): bas par bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams 'dod chags dang bral bar bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
19b2('bum): nyid du slob pa lags sam/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams 'gag par bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres
19b3('bum): pa rnams myi skye bar bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu bas par bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du
19b4('bum): slob pa lags sam/ rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu 'dod chags dang bral bar bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu 'gag par
19b5('bum): bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu myi skye bar bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa
19b6('bum): lags sam/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu bas par bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu 'dod chags dang bral
19b7('bum): bar bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu 'gag par bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob
19b8('bum): pa lags sam/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu myi skye bar bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu bas par
20a1('bum): bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu 'dod chags dang bral bar bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad
20a2('bum): mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu 'gag par bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu myi skye
20a3('bum): bar bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ dgra bcom pa nyid bas par bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/
20a4('bum): dgra bcom pa nyid 'dod chags dang bral bar bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ dgra bcom pa nyid 'gag par bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad
20a5('bum): mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ dgra bcom pa nyid myi skye bar bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ rang byang chub bas par bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/
20a6('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ rang byang chub 'dod chags dang bral bar bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ rang byang chub
20a7('bum): 'gag par bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ rang byang chub myi skye bar bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/
20a8('bum): lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid bas par bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid 'dod chags dang bral bar bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/
20b1('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid 'gag par bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid
20b2('bum): myi skye bar bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid bas par bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags
20b3('bum): sam/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid 'dod chags dang bral bar bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid 'gag par bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/
20b4('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid myi skye bar bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam// //
20b5('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa/ bam po gnyis pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ni ma yin te/ gnas brtan rab 'byor kyis gang 'di skad du/ gzugs
20b6('bum): zad par bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ gzugs 'dod chags dang bral bar bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ gzugs 'gag
20b7('bum): par bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ gzugs myi skye bar bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ tshor ba zad par bya ba'i phyir slob na/
20b8('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ tshor ba 'dod chags dang bral bar bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ tshor ba 'gag par bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad
21a1('bum): mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ tshor ba myi skye bar bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ 'du shes zad par bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/
21a2('bum): 'du shes 'dod chags dang bral bar bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ 'du shes 'gag par bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ 'du shes myi skye bar bya
21a3('bum): ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ 'du byed zad par bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ 'du byed 'dod chags dang bral bar bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa
21a4('bum): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ 'du byed 'gag par bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ 'du byed myi skye bar bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin
21a5('bum): nam/ rnam par shes pa zad par bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ rnam par shes pa 'dod chags dang bral bar bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/
21a6('bum): rnam par shes pa 'gag par bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ rnam par shes pa myi skye bar bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ myig zad par bya ba'i
21a7('bum): phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ myig 'dod chags dang bral bar bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ myig 'gag par bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams
21a8('bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ myig myi skye bar bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ rna ba zad par bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa
21b1('bum): yin nam/ rna ba 'dod chags dang bral bar bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ rna ba 'gag par bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ rna ba
21b2('bum): myi skye bar bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ sna zad par bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ sna 'dod chags dang bral bar
21b3('bum): bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ sna 'gag par bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ sna myi skye bar bya ba'i phyir slob na/
21b4('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ lce zad par bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ lce 'dod chags dang bral bar bya ba'i phyir slob na/
21b5('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ lce 'gag par bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ lce myi skye bar bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad
21b6('bum): mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ lus zad par bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ lus 'dod chags dang bral bar bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad
21b7('bum): mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ lus 'gag par bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ lus myi skye bar bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
21b8('bum): nyid du slob pa yin nam/ yid zad par bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ yid 'dod chags dang bral bar bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad
22a1('bum): mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ yid 'gag par bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ yid myi skye bar bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
22a2('bum): pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ gzugs zad par bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ gzugs 'dod chags dang bral bar bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad
22a3('bum): mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ gzugs 'gag par bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ gzugs myi skye bar bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
22a4('bum): pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ sgra zad par bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ sgra 'dod chags dang bral bar bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
22a5('bum): nyid du slob pa yin nam/ sgra 'gag par bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ sgra myi skye bar bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du
22a6('bum): slob pa yin nam/ dri zad par bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ dri 'dod chags dang bral bar bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
22a7('bum): nyid du slob pa yin nam/ dri 'gag par bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ dri myi skye bar bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
22a8('bum): nyid du slob pa yin nam/ ro zad par bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ ro 'dod chags dang bral bar bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob
22b1('bum): pa yin nam/ ro 'gag par bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ ro myi skye bar bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ reg zad par bya
22b2('bum): ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ reg 'dod chags dang bral bar bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ reg 'gag par bya
22b3('bum): ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ reg myi skye bar bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ chos zad par bya ba'i phyir slob na/
22b4('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ chos 'dod chags dang bral bar bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ chos 'gag par bya ba'i phyir slob na/
22b5('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ chos myi skye bar bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ myig gi rnam par shes pa zad par bya ba'i phyir slob na/
22b6('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ myig gi rnam par shes pa 'dod chags dang bral bar bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ myig gi rnam par shes pa
22b7('bum): 'gag par bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ myig gi rnam par shes pa myi skye bar bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/
22b8('bum): rna ba'i rnam par shes pa zad par bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ rna ba'i rnam par shes pa 'dod chags dang bral bar bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
23a1('bum): nyid du slob pa yin nam/ rna ba'i rnam par shes pa 'gag par bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ rna ba'i rnam par shes pa myi skye bar bya ba'i phyir slob na/
23a2('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ sna'i rnam par shes pa zad par bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ sna'i rnam par shes pa 'dod chags dang bral bar bya ba'i phyir
23a3('bum): slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ sna'i rnam par shes pa 'gag par bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ sna'i rnam par shes pa myi skye bar bya ba'i phyir slob na/
23a4('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ lce'i rnam par shes pa zad par bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ lce'i rnam par shes pa 'dod chags dang bral bar bya ba'i
23a5('bum): phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ lce'i rnam par shes pa 'gag par bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ lce'i rnam par shes pa myi skye bar bya ba'i
23a6('bum): phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ lus kyi rnam par shes pa zad par bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ lus kyi rnam par shes pa 'dod chags dang
23a7('bum): bral bar bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ lus kyi rnam par shes pa 'gag par bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ lus kyi rnam
23a8('bum): par shes pa myi skye bar bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa zad par bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/
23b1('bum): yid kyi rnam par shes pa 'dod chags dang bral bar bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa 'gag par bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad
23b2('bum): mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa myi skye bar bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ myig gi 'dus te reg pa zad par bya ba'i phyir slob na/
23b3('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ myig gi 'dus te reg pa 'dod chags dang bral bar bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ myig gi 'dus te reg pa
23b4('bum): 'gag par bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ myig gi 'dus te reg pa myi skye bar bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/
23b5('bum): rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa zad par bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa 'dod chags dang bral bar bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad
23b6('bum): mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa 'gag par bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa myi skye bar bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa
23b7('bum): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa zad par bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa 'dod chags dang bral bar bya
23b8('bum): ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa 'gag par bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa
24a1('bum): myi skye bar bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa zad par bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/
24a2('bum): lce'i 'dus te reg pa 'dod chags dang bral bar bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa 'gag par bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
24a3('bum): nyid du slob pa yin nam/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa myi skye bar bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa zad par bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad
24a4('bum): mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa 'dod chags dang bral bar bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa 'gag par bya ba'i
24a5('bum): phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa myi skye bar bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa zad
24a6('bum): par bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa 'dod chags dang bral bar bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/
24a7('bum): yid kyi 'dus te reg pa 'gag par bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa myi skye bar bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa
24a8('bum): yin nam/ myig gi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba zad par bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ myig gi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba 'dod
24b1('bum): chags dang bral bar bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ myig gi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba 'gag par bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa
24b2('bum): yin nam/ myig gi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba myi skye bar bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba zad par bya ba'i phyir slob na/
24b3('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba 'dod chags dang bral bar bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ rna ba'i 'dus te
24b4('bum): reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba 'gag par bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba myi skye bar bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
24b5('bum): pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba zad par bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba 'dod chags dang
24b6('bum): bral bar bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba 'gag par bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/
24b7('bum): sna'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba myi skye bar bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba zad par bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad
24b8('bum): mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba 'dod chags dang bral bar bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i
25a1('bum): tshor ba 'gag par bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba myi skye bar bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du
25a2('bum): slob pa yin nam/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba zad par bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba 'dod chags dang bral

25a5('bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba 'dod chags dang bral bar bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung

25a8('bum): slob pa yin nam/ sa'i khams 'gag par bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ sa'i khams myi skye bar bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa

26a1('bum): nam/ rnam par shes pa'i khams 'dod chags dang bral bar bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ rnam par shes pa'i khams 'gag par bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ rnam

29b4('bum): nyid myi skye bar bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid zad par bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob
29b5('bum): pa yin nam/ thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid 'dod chags dang bral bar bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid 'gag par bya
29b6('bum): ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid myi skye bar bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/
29b7('bum): dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid zad par bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid 'dod chags dang bral bar bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
29b8('bum): pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid 'gag par bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid myi skye bar bya ba'i phyir slob na/
30a1('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid zad par bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ rang bzhin stong
30a2('bum): pa nyid 'dod chags dang bral bar bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid 'gag par bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad
30a3('bum): mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid myi skye bar bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid zad par bya ba'i
30a4('bum): phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid 'dod chags dang bral bar bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du
30a5('bum): slob pa yin nam/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid 'gag par bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid myi skye bar bya ba'i phyir slob na/
30a6('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid zad par bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ rang gi mtshan nyid
30a7('bum): stong pa nyid 'dod chags dang bral bar bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid 'gag par bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa
30a8('bum): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid myi skye bar bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ myi dmyigs pa stong
30b1('bum): pa nyid zad par bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid 'dod chags dang bral bar bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob
30b2('bum): pa yin nam/ myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid 'gag par bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid myi skye bar bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams
30b3('bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid zad par bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid 'dod chags dang bral
30b4('bum): bar bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid 'gag par bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/
30b5('bum): dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid myi skye bar bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid zad par bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob
30b6('bum): pa yin nam/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid 'dod chags dang bral bar bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid 'gag par bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
30b7('bum): pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid myi skye bar bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid zad par bya ba'i phyir slob na/
30b8('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid 'dod chags dang bral bar bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/
31a1('bum): dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid 'gag par bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid myi skye bar bya ba'i phyir
31a2('bum): slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi zad par bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa
31a3('bum): bzhi 'dod chags dang bral bar bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi 'gag par bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
31a4('bum): pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi myi skye bar bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ yang dag par spong ba bzhi zad par bya ba'i phyir slob na/
31a5('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ yang dag par spong ba bzhi 'dod chags dang bral bar bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ yang dag par
31a6('bum): spong ba bzhi 'gag par bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ yang dag par spong ba bzhi myi skye bar bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du
31a7('bum): slob pa yin nam/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi zad par bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi 'dod chags dang bral bar bya ba'i
31a8('bum): phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi 'gag par bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/
31b1('bum): rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi myi skye bar bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ dbang po lnga zad par bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/
31b2('bum): dbang po lnga 'dod chags dang bral bar bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ dbang po lnga 'gag par bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du
31b3('bum): slob pa yin nam/ dbang po lnga myi skye bar bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ stobs lnga zad par bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du
31b4('bum): slob pa yin nam/ stobs lnga 'dod chags dang bral bar bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ stobs lnga 'gag par bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams
31b5('bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ stobs lnga myi skye bar bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ byang chub kyi yan lag bdun zad par bya ba'i phyir slob na/
31b6('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ byang chub kyi yan lag bdun 'dod chags dang bral bar bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ byang chub kyi
31b7('bum): yan lag bdun 'gag par bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ byang chub kyi yan lag bdun myi skye bar bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
31b8('bum): pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa zad par bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa
32a1('bum): 'dod chags dang bral bar bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa 'gag par bya ba'i phyir slob na/
32a2('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa myi skye bar bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ 'phags
32a3('bum): pa'i bden pa bzhi zad par bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi 'dod chags dang bral bar bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad
32a4('bum): mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi 'gag par bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi myi skye bar bya
32a5('bum): ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ bsam gtan bzhi zad par bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ bsam
32a6('bum): gtan bzhi 'dod chags dang bral bar bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ bsam gtan bzhi 'gag par bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
32a7('bum): nyid du slob pa yin nam/ bsam gtan bzhi myi skye bar bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ tshad myed pa bzhi zad par bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa
32a8('bum): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ tshad myed pa bzhi 'dod chags dang bral bar bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ tshad myed pa bzhi 'gag par
32b1('bum): bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ tshad myed pa bzhi myi skye bar bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ gzugs myed pa'i snyoms
32b2('bum): par 'jug pa bzhi zad par bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi 'dod chags dang bral bar bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa
32b3('bum): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi 'gag par bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ gzugs myed
32b4('bum): pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi myi skye bar bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ rnam par thar pa brgyad zad par bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
32b5('bum): nyid du slob pa yin nam/ rnam par thar pa brgyad 'dod chags dang bral bar bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ rnam par thar pa brgyad 'gag par bya ba'i
32b6('bum): phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ rnam par thar pa brgyad myi skye bar bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ mthar kyis
32b7('bum): gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu zad par bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu 'dod chags
32b8('bum): dang bral bar bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu 'gag par bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa
33a1('bum): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu myi skye bar bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/
33a2('bum): rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa zad par bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa
33a3('bum): nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa 'dod chags dang bral bar bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /
33a4('bum): mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa 'gag par bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa
33a5('bum): myed pa myi skye bar bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ mngon par shes pa rnams zad par bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/
33a6('bum): mngon par shes pa rnams 'dod chags dang bral bar bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ mngon par shes pa rnams 'gag par bya ba'i phyir slob na/
33a7('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ mngon par shes pa rnams myi skye bar bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ ting nge 'dzin rnams zad par
33a8('bum): bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ ting nge 'dzin rnams 'dod chags dang bral bar bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/
33b1('bum): ting nge 'dzin rnams 'gag par bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ ting nge 'dzin rnams myi skye bar bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob
33b2('bum): pa yin nam/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams zad par bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams 'dod chags dang bral bar bya ba'i phyir slob na/
33b3('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams 'gag par bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams myi skye
33b4('bum): bar bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu zad par bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob
33b5('bum): pa yin nam/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu 'dod chags dang bral bar bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu
33b6('bum): 'gag par bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu myi skye bar bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
33b7('bum): nyid du slob pa yin nam/ myi 'jigs pa bzhi zad par bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ myi 'jigs pa bzhi 'dod chags dang bral bar bya ba'i phyir slob na/
33b8('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ myi 'jigs pa bzhi 'gag par bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ myi 'jigs pa bzhi myi skye bar
34a1('bum): bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi zad par bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin
34a2('bum): nam/ so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi 'dod chags dang bral bar bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi 'gag par bya ba'i phyir slob na/
34a3('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi myi skye bar bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ snying rje chen po zad par bya
34a4('bum): ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ snying rje chen po 'dod chags dang bral bar bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/
34a5('bum): snying rje chen po 'gag par bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ snying rje chen po myi skye bar bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob
34a6('bum): pa yin nam/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad zad par bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad 'dod chags
34a7('bum): dang bral bar bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad 'gag par bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad
34a8('bum): mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwo brgyad myi skye bar bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ rgyun tu zhugs pa'i
34b1('bum): 'bras bu zad par bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu 'dod chags dang bral bar bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du
34b2('bum): slob pa yin nam/ rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu 'gag par bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu myi skye bar bya ba'i phyir slob na/
34b3('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu zad par bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i
34b4('bum): 'bras bu 'dod chags dang bral bar bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu 'gag par bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams
34b5('bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu myi skye bar bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu zad par bya ba'i phyir
34b6('bum): slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu 'dod chags dang bral bar bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/
34b7('bum): phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu 'gag par bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu myi skye bar bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad
34b8('bum): mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ dgra bcom pa nyid zad par bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ dgra bcom pa nyid 'dod chags dang bral bar bya ba'i phyir
35a1('bum): slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ dgra bcom pa nyid 'gag par bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ dgra bcom pa nyid
35a2('bum): myi skye bar bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ rang byang chub zad par bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ rang byang chub
35a3('bum): 'dod chags dang bral bar bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ rang byang chub 'gag par bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin
35a4('bum): nam/ rang byang chub myi skye bar bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid zad par bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du
35a5('bum): slob pa yin nam/ lam gyi rnam pa shes pa 'dod chags dang bral bar bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid 'gag par bya ba'i
35a6('bum): phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid myi skye bar bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ rnam pa thams
35a7('bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid zad par bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid 'dod chags dang bral bar bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad
35a8('bum): mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid 'gag par bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ rnam pa thams cad

40b5('bum): slob pa yin/ rab 'byor de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni/ mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu la slob pa yin/ rab 'byor de ltar slob pa'i byang chub
40b6('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa la slob pa yin/ rab 'byor de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
40b7('bum): chen po ni/ mngon par shes pa rnams la slob pa yin/ rab 'byor de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni/ ting nge 'dzin rnams la slob pa yin/ rab 'byor de ltar slob pa'i
40b8('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams la slob pa yin/ rab 'byor de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs
41a1('bum): bcu la slob pa yin/ rab 'byor de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni/ myi 'jigs pa bzhi la slob pa yin/ rab 'byor de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems
41a2('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni/ so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi la slob pa yin/ rab 'byor de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems chen po ni/ snying rje chen po la slob pa yin/ rab 'byor de
41a3('bum): ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la slob pa yin/ rab 'byor de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni/
41a4('bum): rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la slob pa yin/ rab 'byor de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la slob pa yin/ rab 'byor de ltar
41a5('bum): slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni/ phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la slob pa yin/ rab 'byor de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni/ dgra bcom
41a6('bum): pa nyid la slob pa yin/ rab 'byor de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni/ rang byang chub la slob pa yin/ rab 'byor de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
41a7('bum): chen po ni/ lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid la slob pa yin/ rab 'byor de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' ni/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la slob pa yin/ rab 'byor
41a8('bum): de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni/ bslab pa thams cad kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'thob par 'gyur ba yin/ rab 'byor de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
41b1('bum): chen po ni/ bdud dam bdud kyi ris kyi lha rnams kyis pham par myi nus pa yin/ rab 'byor de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni/ myur du phyir myi ldog pa'i sa 'thob pa yin/
41b2('bum): rab 'byor de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni/ bdag gi de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyod yul la spyod pa yin/ rab 'byor de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
41b3('bum): ni mgon du 'gyur ba'i chos rnams la slob pa yin/ rab 'byor de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni/ byams pa chen po la slob pa yin/ rab 'byor de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems
41b4('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni/ snying rje chen po la slob pa yin/ rab 'byor de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par bya ba'i phyir slob pa yin/
41b5('bum): rab 'byor de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni/ sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir slob pa yin/ rab 'byor de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
41b6('bum): chen po ni rnam pa bcu gnyis lan gsum du bskor ba'i chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba'i phyir slob pa yin/ rab 'byor de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni/ sems can
