63b7('bum): po gang sems can myed pa rnams kyi don tu go ca gyon pa de dag ni dka' ba byed pa ste/ gang sems can rnams kyi don tu go ca gyon pa de dag ni nam mkha' dang brtsad par 'dod pa ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos
63b8('bum): go ca de yang bgos la/ sems can gang gi don du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos go ca bgos pa'i sems can de dag kyang myi dmyigs so/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sems can dben pa'i phyir go ca dben
64a1('bum): par blta'o/ /gal te de ltar bstan pa'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhum par myi 'gyur na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa yin no/ /de ci'i phyir zhe
64a2('bum): na/ gzugs dben pa'i phyir sems can dben pa'o/ /tshor ba dben pa'i phyir sems can dben pa'o/ /'du shes dben pa'i phyir sems can dben pa'o/ /'du byed dben pa'i phyir sems can dben pa'o/ /rnam par shes pa dben
64a3('bum): pa'i phyir sems can dben pa'o/ /myig dben pa'i phyir sems can dben pa'o/ /rna ba dben pa'i phyir sems can dben pa'o/ /sna dben pa'i phyir sems can dben pa'o/ /lce dben pa'i phyir sems can dben pa'o/ /lus
64a4('bum): dben pa'i phyir sems can dben pa'o/ /yid dben pa'i phyir sems can dben pa'o/ /gzugs dben pa'i phyir sems can dben pa'o/ /sgra dben pa'i phyir sems can dben pa'o/ /dri dben pa'i phyir sems can
64a5('bum): dben pa'o/ /ro dben pa'i phyir sems can dben pa'o/ /reg dben pa'i phyir sems can dben pa'o/ /chos dben pa'i phyir sems can dben pa'o/ /myig gi rnam par shes pa dben pa'i phyir sems can dben pa'o/ /
64a6('bum): rna ba'i rnam par shes pa dben pa'i phyir sems can dben pa'o/ /sna'i rnam par shes pa dben pa'i phyir sems can dben pa'o/ /lce'i rnam par shes pa dben pa'i phyir sems can dben pa'o/ /lus kyi rnam par shes pa dben
64a7('bum): pa'i phyir sems can dben pa'o/ /yid kyi rnam par shes pa dben pa'i phyir sems can dben pa'o/ /myig gi 'dus te reg pa dben pa'i phyir sems can dben pa'o/ /rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa dben pa'i phyir sems can dben
64a8('bum): pa'o/ /sna'i 'dus te reg pa dben pa'i phyir sems can dben pa'o/ /lce'i 'dus te reg pa dben pa'i phyir sems can dben pa'o/ /lus kyi 'dus te reg pa dben pa'i phyir sems can dben pa'o/ /yid kyi 'dus te reg pa
64b1('bum): dben pa'i phyir sems can dben pa'o/ /myig gi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dben pa'i phyir sems can dben pa'o/ /rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dben pa'i phyir sems can dben pa'o/ /sna'i 'dus te reg
64b2('bum): pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dben pa'i phyir sems can dben pa'o/ /lce'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dben pa'i phyir sems can dben pa'o/ /lus kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dben pa'i phyir sems can dben
64b3('bum): pa'o/ /yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dben pa'i phyir sems can dben pa'o/ /sa'i khams dben pa'i phyir sems can dben pa'o/ /chu'i khams dben pa'i phyir sems can dben pa'o/ /mye'i khams dben pa'i
64b4('bum): phyir sems can dben pa'o/ /rlung gi khams dben pa'i phyir sems can dben pa'o/ /nam mkha'i khams dben pa'i phyir sems can dben pa'o/ /rnam par shes pa'i khams dben pa'i phyir sems can dben pa'o/ /ma
64b5('bum): rig pa dben pa'i phyir sems can dben pa'o/ /'du byed dben pa'i phyir sems can dben pa'o/ /rnam par shes pa dben pa'i phyir sems can dben pa'o/ /mying dang gzugs dben pa'i phyir sems can dben pa'o/ /skye mched
64b6('bum): drug dben pa'i phyir sems can dben pa'o/ /reg pa dben pa'i phyir sems can dben pa'o/ /tshor ba dben pa'i phyir sems can dben pa'o/ /sred pa dben pa'i phyir sems can dben pa'o/ /len pa dben pa'i phyir sems
64b7('bum): can dben pa'o/ /srid pa dben pa'i phyir sems can dben pa'o/ /skye ba dben pa'i phyir sems can dben pa'o/ /rga shi dben pa'i phyir sems can dben pa'o/ /sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'i phyir sems can
64b8('bum): dben pa'o/ /tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'i phyir sems can dben pa'o/ /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'i phyir sems can dben pa'o/ /brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'i phyir
65a1('bum): sems can dben pa'o/ /bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'i phyir sems can dben pa'o/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'i phyir sems can dben pa'o/ /nang stong pa nyid dben pa'i phyir sems can dben
65a2('bum): pa'o/ /phyi stong pa nyid dben pa'i phyir sems can dben pa'o/ /phyi nang stong pa nyid dben pa'i phyir sems can dben pa'o/ /stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dben pa'i phyir sems can dben pa'o/ /chen po stong pa nyid dben pa'i phyir sems
65a3('bum): can dben pa'o/ /don dam pa stong pa nyid dben pa'i phyir sems can dben pa'o/ /'dus byas stong pa nyid dben pa'i phyir sems can dben pa'o/ /'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dben pa'i phyir sems can dben pa'o/ /mtha' las
65a4('bum): 'das pa stong pa nyid dben pa'i phyir sems can dben pa'o/ /thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid dben pa'i phyir sems can dben pa'o/ /dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid dben pa'i phyir sems can dben pa'o/ /rang bzhin stong pa nyid dben
65a5('bum): pa'i phyir sems can dben pa'o/ /chos thams cad stong pa nyid dben pa'i phyir sems can dben pa'o/ /rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dben pa'i phyir sems can dben pa'o/ /myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid dben pa'i phyir sems
65a6('bum): can dben pa'o/ /dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid dben pa'i phyir sems can dben pa'o/ /ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dben pa'i phyir sems can dben pa'o/ /dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dben pa'i phyir sems can dben pa'o/ /
65a7('bum): dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dben pa'i phyir sems can dben pa'o/ /yang dag par spong ba bzhi dben pa'i phyir sems can dben pa'o/ /rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dben pa'i phyir sems can dben pa'o/ /dbang po lnga dben
65a8('bum): pa'i phyir sems can dben pa'o/ /stobs lnga dben pa'i phyir sems can dben pa'o/ /byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dben pa'i phyir sems can dben pa'o/ /'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dben pa'i phyir
65b1('bum): sems can dben pa'o/ /'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dben pa'i phyir sems can dben pa'o/ /bsam gtan bzhi dben pa'i phyir sems can dben pa'o/ /tshad myed pa bzhi dben pa'i phyir sems can dben pa'o/ /gzugs
65b2('bum): myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dben pa'i phyir sems can dben pa'o/ /rnam par thar pa brgyad dben pa'i phyir sems can dben pa'o/ /mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dben pa'i phyir sems can
65b3('bum): dben pa'o/ /rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa dben pa'i phyir sems can dben pa'o/ /mngon par shes pa rnams dben pa'i phyir sems can dben pa'o/ /ting nge 'dzin rnams dben pa'i phyir
65b4('bum): sems can dben pa'o/ /gzungs kyi sgo rnams dben pa'i phyir sems can dben pa'o/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dben pa'i phyir sems can dben pa'o/ /myi 'jigs pa bzhi dben pa'i phyir sems can dben pa'o/ /
65b5('bum): so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dben pa'i phyir sems can dben pa'o/ /byams pa chen po dben pa'i phyir sems can dben pa'o/ /snying rje chen po dben pa'i phyir sems can dben pa'o/ /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwo brgyad dben pa'i phyir sems can dben pa'o/ /rgyun tu
65b6('bum): zhugs pa'i 'bras bu dben pa'i phyir sems can dben pa'o/ /lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dben pa'i phyir sems can dben pa'o/ /phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dben pa'i phyir sems can dben pa'o/ /dgra bcom pa nyid dben
65b7('bum): pa'i phyir sems can dben pa'o/ /rang byang chub dben pa'i phyir sems can dben pa'o/ /lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid dben pa'i phyir sems can dben pa'o/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dben pa'i phyir sems can
65b8('bum): dben pa'o/ / //shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa/ bam po lnga pa/ gzugs dben pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'o/ /tshor ba dben pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
66a1('bum): dben pa'o/ /'du shes dben pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'o/ /'du byed dben pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'o/ /rnam par shes pa dben pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu
66a2('bum): phyin pa dben pa'o/ /myig dben pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'o/ /rna ba dben pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'o/ /sna dben pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'o/ /lce
66a3('bum): dben pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'o/ /lus dben pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'o/ /yid dben pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'o/ /gzugs dben pa'i phyir shes rab
66a4('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'o/ /sgra dben pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'o/ /dri dben pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'o/ /ro dben pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'o/ /reg
66a5('bum): dben pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'o/ /chos dben pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'o/ /myig gi rnam par shes pa dben pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'o/ /rna ba'i rnam
66a6('bum): par shes pa dben pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'o/ /sna'i rnam par shes pa dben pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'o/ /lce'i rnam par shes pa dben pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
66a7('bum): dben pa'o/ /lus kyi rnam par shes pa dben pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'o/ /yid kyi rnam par shes pa dben pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'o/ /myig gi 'dus te reg pa dben pa'i phyir shes
66a8('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'o/ /rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa dben pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'o/ /sna'i 'dus te reg pa dben pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'o/ /lce'i 'dus te reg
66b1('bum): pa dben pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'o/ /lus kyi 'dus te reg pa dben pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'o/ /yid kyi 'dus te reg pa dben pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben
66b2('bum): pa'o/ /myig gi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dben pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'o/ /rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dben pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'o/ /
66b3('bum): sna'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dben pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'o/ /lce'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dben pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'o/ /lus kyi 'dus
66b4('bum): te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dben pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'o/ /yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dben pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'o/ /sa'i khams dben
66b5('bum): pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'o/ /chu'i khams dben pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'o/ /mye'i khams dben pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'o/ /rlung gi khams dben
66b6('bum): pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'o/ /nam mkha'i khams dben pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'o/ /rnam par shes pa'i khams dben pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'o/ /ma
66b7('bum): rig pa dben pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'o/ /'du byed dben pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'o/ /rnam par shes pa dben pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'o/ /mying dang gzugs
66b8('bum): dben pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'o/ /skye mched drug dben pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'o/ /reg pa dben pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'o/ /tshor ba dben
67a1('bum): pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'o/ /sred pa dben pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'o/ /len pa dben pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'o/ /srid pa dben pa'i phyir shes rab
67a2('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'o/ /skye ba dben pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'o/ /rga shi dben pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'o/ /sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha
67a3('bum): rol tu phyin pa dben pa'o/ /tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'o/ /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'o/ /brtson 'grus kyi pha
67a4('bum): rol tu phyin pa dben pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'o/ /bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'o/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'i phyir/ shes
67a5('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'o/ /nang stong pa nyid dben pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'o/ /phyi stong pa nyid dben pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'o/ /phyi nang stong pa nyid dben pa'i phyir/
67a6('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'o/ /stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dben pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'o/ /chen po stong pa nyid dben pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'o/ /don dam pa stong pa
67a7('bum): nyid dben pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'o/ /'dus byas stong pa nyid dben pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'o/ /'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dben pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben
67a8('bum): pa'o/ /mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dben pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'o/ /thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid dben pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'o/ /dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid dben
67b1('bum): pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'o/ /rang bzhin stong pa nyid dben pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'o/ /chos thams cad stong pa nyid dben pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'o/ /rang gi mtshan
67b2('bum): nyid stong pa nyid dben pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'o/ /myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid dben pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'o/ /dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid dben pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
67b3('bum): dben pa'o/ /ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dben pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'o/ /dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dben pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'o/ /dran pa nye bar gzhag pa dben pa'i phyir/
67b4('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'o/ /yang dag par spong ba dben pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'o/ /rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dben pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'o/ /dbang po dben pa'i phyir/
67b5('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'o/ /stobs dben pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'o/ /byang chub kyi yan lag dben pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'o/ /'phags pa'i lam yan lag
67b6('bum): brgyad pa dben pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'o/ /'phags pa'i bden pa dben pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'o/ /bsam gtan dben pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'o/ /
67b7('bum): tshad myed pa dben pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'o/ /gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dben pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'o/ /rnam par thar pa dben pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol
67b8('bum): tu phyin pa dben pa'o/ /mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dben pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'o/ /rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa dben pa'i phyir/ shes
68a1('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'o/ /mngon par shes pa dben pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'o/ /ting nge 'dzin dben pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'o/ /gzungs kyi sgo dben pa'i phyir/ shes
68a2('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'o/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs dben pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'o/ /myi 'jigs pa dben pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'o/ /so so yang dag par rig pa dben
68a3('bum): pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'o/ /byams pa chen po dben pa'i phyir/ sher rab kyi pha rob tu phyin pa dben pa'o/ /snying rje chen po dben pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'o/ /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa dben pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'o/ /rgyun tu
68a4('bum): zhugs pa'i 'bras bu dben pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'o/ /lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dben pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'o/ /phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dben pa'i phyir/ shes
68a5('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'o/ /dgra bcom pa nyid dben pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'o/ /rang byang chub dben pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'o/ /lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid dben
68a6('bum): pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'o/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dben pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'o/ /lha'i bu dag gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ chos thams
68a7('bum): cad dben par bshad pa la sems myi 'jum/ yongs su zhum par myi 'gyur la/ de'i yid 'jigs par myi 'gyur la/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'o/ /de nas bcom
68a8('bum): ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /rab 'byor ci'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la zhum par myi 'gyur ba yin/ gsol pa/
68b1('bum): bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad ma mchis pa'i slad du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la zhum par myi 'gyur ro/ /bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad dben pa dang zhi ba dang / ma skyes pa'i
68b2('bum): slad du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la zhum par myi 'gyur te/ bcom ldan 'das de'i slad du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la zhum par myi
68b3('bum): 'gyur ro/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar gang zhum par 'gyur ba dang / gang gis zhum par 'gyur ba dang / gang la zhum par 'gyur ba'i chos de dag thams cad ni ma mchis pa ste/ dmyigs su ma mchis
68b4('bum): so/ /bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de skad du bshad pa la myi 'jum myi 'gong zhing tshig chad pa dang / sgyid lug par myi 'gyur la myi 'jigs myi sngang skrag par myi 'gyur na/ shes rab kyi
68b5('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa lags so/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar gang zhum par 'gyur ba 'am/ gang gis zhum par 'gyur ba 'am/ gang zhum par 'gyur ba'i chos de dag thams cad ni ma mchis pa
68b6('bum): ste/ bcom ldan 'das de ltar spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni dbang po dang bcas pa tshangs pa dang bcas/ skye dgu'i bdag po dang bcas pa'i lha rnams kyis phyag bgyi bar 'gyur ro/ /bcom ldan
68b7('bum): 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa de ni dbang po dang bcas/ tshangs pa dang bcas/ skye dgu'i bdag po dang bcas pa'i lha
68b8('bum): rnams kyis phyag bya bar yang ma zad de/ gang 'phags pa mngon par 'phags pa'i kha dog dang ldan pa de dge rgyas dang / 'bras bu che ba dang / gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha rnams kyis kyang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu
69a1('bum): phyin pa la de ltar spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de la phyag bya bar 'gyur ro/ /rab 'byor phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs
69a2('bum): rgyas grangs myed tshad myed pa gang ji snyed cig bzhugs shing / 'tsho skyong ba de dag kyang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa de la dgongs pa mdzad de/ byang chub sems dpa' sems
69a3('bum): dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa de ni/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'o/ /tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'o/ /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su
69a4('bum): rdzogs par byed pa'o/ /brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'o/ /bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'o/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'o/ /nang
69a5('bum): stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'o/ /phyi stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'o/ /phyi nang stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'o/ /stong pa nyid stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'o/ /chen po stong pa nyid yongs su
69a6('bum): rdzogs par byed pa'o/ /don dam pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'o/ /'dus byas stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'o/ /'dus ma byas stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'o/ /mtha' las 'das pa stong pa
69a7('bum): nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'o/ /thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'o/ /dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'o/ /rang bzhin stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'o/ /chos thams
69a8('bum): cad stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'o/ /rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'o/ /myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'o/ /dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'o/ /
69b1('bum): ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'o/ /dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'o/ /dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'o/ /yang dag par spong ba bzhi yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'o/ /rdzu
69b2('bum): 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'o/ /dbang po lnga yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'o/ /stobs lnga yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'o/ /byang chub kyi yan lag bdun yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'o/ /'phags pa'i lam yan lag
69b3('bum): brgyad pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'o/ /'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'o/ /bsam gtan bzhi yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'o/ /tshad myed pa bzhi yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'o/ /gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par
69b4('bum): 'jug pa bzhi yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'o/ /rnam par thar pa brgyad yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'o/ /mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'o/ /rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan
69b5('bum): ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'o/ /mngon par shes pa rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'o/ /ting nge 'dzin rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'o/ /gzungs kyi sgo rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'o/ /
69b6('bum): de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'o/ /myi 'jigs pa bzhi yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'o/ /so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'o/ /snying rje chen po yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'o/ /
69b7('bum): sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwo brgyad yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'o/ /rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'o/ /lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'o/ /phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras
69b8('bum): bu yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'o/ /dgra bcom pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'o/ /rang byang chub yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'o/ /lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'o/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yongs su rdzogs
70a1('bum): par byed pa'o zhes dgongs pa mdzad do/ /rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ni gang la/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis dgongs pa mdzad pa'i
70a2('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni sangs rgyas su 'gyur bar zhugs par rig par bya'o/ /rab 'byor gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams dag na/ sems can gang ji snyed cig yod pa de dag thams
70a3('bum): cad bdud sdig to can tu gyur te/ bdud sdig to can de dag re res kyang de snyed kyi bdud sdig to can mngon par sprul kyang de dag thams cad kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de la bar chad bya bar myi nus so/ /rab
70a4('bum): 'byor chos gnyis dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bdud sdig to can rnams kyis myi thub pa yin te/ gnyis gang zhe na/ des chos thams cad stong pa'o zhes bya bar rnam par bltas pa yin/
70a5('bum): des sems can thams cad kyang yongs su ma btang ba yin te/ rab 'byor chos 'di gnyis dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni bdud sdig to can rnams kyis myi thub pa yin no/ /rab 'byor
70a6('bum): gzhan yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos gnyis dang ldan pa bdud sdig to can rnams kyis myi thub pa yin te/ gnyis gang zhe na/ ji skad smras pa de bzhin du byed
70a7('bum): pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis dgongs pa yin te/ rab 'byor shes rab kyis pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos de gnyis dang ldan pa ni/ bdud sdig can
70a8('bum): rnams kyis myi thub pa yin no/ /rab 'byor de ltar spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i drung du ni lha'i bu rnams kyang 'ong bar sems so/ /bsnyen bkur ba dang yongs su dri ba dang / kun dri ba yang byed par
70b1('bum): 'gyur te/ rigs kyi bu khyod sangs rgyas kyi byang chub myur du thob par 'gyur gyis de bas na rigs kyi bu khyod kyis 'di lta ste/ stong pa nyid kyis rnam par spyod pa dang / mtshan ma myed pas rnam par spyod pa dang / smon pa myed pas rnam par
70b2('bum): spyod pa de nyid kyis rnam par spyod par gyis shig / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rigs bu khyod kyis rnam par spyod pa des/ rnam par spyod pa dang / sems can mgon myed pa rnams kyi mgon du 'gyur ro/ /sems can skyabs myed pa rnams
70b3('bum): kyi skyabs su 'gyur ro/ /sems can dpung gnyen myed pa rnams kyi dpung gnyen du 'gyur ro/ /sems can gnas myed pa rnams kyi gnas su 'gyur ro/ /sems can rten myed pa rnams kyi rten du 'gyur ro/ /sems can gling
70b4('bum): myed pa rnams kyi gling du 'gyur ro/ /sems can mun par gyur pa rnams kyi snang bar 'gyur ro zhes de la spro ba bskyed par 'gyur ro/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar 'jig rten gyi khams tshad myed grangs myed pa dag na sangs
70b5('bum): rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang ji snyed cig / dge slong gi dge 'dun gyis yongs su bskor te bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba dang / chos ston pa de dag kyang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
70b6('bum): pa la spyod cing 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i yon tan de dag dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de'i mying dang rigs yongs su brjod pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / ched du brjod pa ched
70b7('bum): du rjod pa mdzad de/ rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na nga da ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rin chen dpal gyi mying yongs su brjod pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing ched du brjod pa ched du rjod pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems
70b8('bum): dpa' chen po gtsug pud kyi mying yongs su brjod pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing ched du brjod pa ched du rjod pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas myi 'khrugs pa'i zham
71a1('bum): 'bring na tshangs pa'i spyad pa spyod pa/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ma bral ba de dag gi mying yongs su brjod pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing ched du brjod pa ched du rjod pa bzhin no/ /shar phyogs kyi sangs rgyas
71a2('bum): bcom ldan 'das gang ji snyed cig bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba dang / chos ston pa de dag kyang de na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang ji snyed cig tshangs pa'i spyad pa spyod cing / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ma bral
71a3('bum): ba de dag la spro bar mdzad pa'i tshul gyis chos ston te/ ched du brjod pa yang ched du brjod pa mdzad do/ /lho phyogs kyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang ji snyed cig bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba dang / chos ston pa de dag kyang de na byang chub sems
71a4('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang ji snyed cig tshangs pa'i spyad pa spyod cing / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ma bral ba de dag la spro ba mdzad pa'i tshul gyis chos ston te/ ched du brjod pa yang ched du brjod pa mdzad do/ /nub phyogs kyi sangs rgyas
71a5('bum): bcom ldan 'das gang ji snyed cig bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba dang / chos ston pa de dag kyang de na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang ji snyed cig tshangs pa'i spyad pa spyod cing / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ma bral ba de dag la
71a6('bum): spro ba mdzad pa'i tshul gyis chos ston te/ ched du brjod pa yang ched du brjod pa mdzad do/ /byang phyogs kyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang ji snyed cig bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba dang / chos ston pa de dag kyang de na byang chub sems dpa'
71a7('bum): sems dpa' chen po gang ji snyed cig tshangs pa'i spyad pa spyod cing / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ma bral ba de dag la spro ba mdzad pa'i tshul gyis chos ston te ched du brjod pa yang ched du brjod pa mdzad do/ /byang shar kyi phyogs mtshams
71a8('bum): kyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang ji snyed cig bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba dang / chos ston pa de dag kyang de na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang ji snyed cig tshangs pa'i spyad pa spyod cing / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
71b1('bum): pa dang ma bral ba de dag la spro bar mdzad pa'i tshul gyis chos ston te/ ched du brjod pa yang ched du brjod pa mdzad do/ /shar lho'i phyogs mtshams kyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang ji snyed cig bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba dang / chos ston
71b2('bum): pa de dag kyang de na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang ji snyed cig tshangs pa'i spyad pa spyod cing / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ma bral ba de dag la spro bar mdzad pa'i tshul gyis chos ston te/ ched du brjod pa yang ched du brjod
71b3('bum): pa mdzad do/ /lho nub kyi phyogs mtshams kyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang ji snyed cig bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba dang / chos ston pa de dag kyang de na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang ji snyed cig tshangs pa'i spyad pa spyod cing / shes
71b4('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ma bral ba de dag la spro ba mdzad pa'i tshul gyis chos ston te/ ched du brjod pa yang ched du brjod pa mdzad do/ /nub byang gi phyogs mtshams kyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang ji snyed cig bzhugs shing 'tsho
71b5('bum): skyong ba dang / chos ston pa de dag kyang de na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang ji snyed cig tshangs pa'i spyad pa spyod cing / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ma bral ba de dag la spro bar mdzad pa'i tshul gyis chos ston te/ ched du brjod
71b6('bum): pa yang ched du brjod pa mdzad do/ /'og gi phyogs mtshams kyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang ji snyed cig bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba dang / chos ston pa de dag kyang de na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang ji snyed cig
71b7('bum): tshangs pa'i spyad pa spyod cing / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ma bral ba de dag la spro bar mdzad pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / ched du brjod pa yang ched du brjod pa mdzad do/ /steng gi phyogs kyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang ji snyed
71b8('bum): cig bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba dang / chos ston pa de dag kyang de na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang ji snyed cig tshangs pa'i spyad pa spyod cing / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ma bral ba de dag la spro bar mdzad pa'i tshul
72a1('bum): gyis chos ston te ched du brjod pa yang ched du brjod pa mdzad do/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob kyi bar du byang chub kyi lam
72a2('bum): yongs su sbyong ba gang ji snyed cig yod pa de dag la yang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag spro bar mdzad pa'i tshul gyis chos ston te/ ched du brjod pa yang ched du brjod pa mdzad do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa'
72a3('bum): sems dpa' chen po gang sangs rgyas kyi tshul rgyun myi 'chad pa'i don tu zhugs pa de dag ni dka' ba byed pa'o/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po slar ldog
72a4('bum): pa 'am/ slar myi ldog pa 'am gang gi mying yongs su brjod pa'i tshul gyis chos ston pa mdzad/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni phyir myi ldog pa las shes rab kyi pha rol tu
72a5('bum): phyin pa la spyod pa yang yod/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni lung ma bstan pa las/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa yang yod de/ de dag la sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag spro bar mdzad pa'i tshul gyis chos
72a6('bum): ston cing / ched du brjod pa yang ched du brjod pa mdzad do/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de dag gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang byang chub sems dpa'i
72a7('bum): spyad pa spyod pa'i tshe/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas myi 'khrugs pa'i rjes su slob pa'i tshul gyis rnam par spyod pa de dag la sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag spro bar mdzad pa'i tshul
72a8('bum): gyis chos ston cing / ched du brjod pa yang ched du brjod pa mdzad do/ /rab 'byor gang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rin chen dpal gyi rjes su slob pa'i tshul gyis byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa de dag la
72b1('bum): yang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag spro bar mdzad pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / ched du brjod pa yang ched du brjod pa mdzad do/ /rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang shes
72b2('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing / chos thams cad skye ba myed par mos kyang myi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa ma thob pa dang chos thams cad stong pa'o zhes bya ba dang / chos thams cad zhi ba'o zhes bya ba dang / chos thams cad
72b3('bum): gsog gsob ste/ rag lus pa'o zhes bya ba dang / snying po myed pa'o zhes bya bar mos kyang myi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa ma thob pa de dag la yang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag spro bar mdzad pa'i tshul gyis chos
72b4('bum): ston cing / ched du brjod pa yang ched du brjod pa mdzad do/ /rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang la sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams mying yongs su brjod pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /
72b5('bum): ched du brjod pa yang ched du brjod pa mdzad pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag gis ni/ nyan thos kyi sa dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi sa spangs pa yin te/ bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang
72b6('bum): lung bstan pa yin/ rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa gang la sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi mying yongs su brjod pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing ched du brjod pa
72b7('bum): yang ched du brjod pa mdzad pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni phyir myi ldog pa nyid la gnas par 'gyur te/ de la gnas pas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur ro/ /rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub
72b8('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo bshad pa thos nas/ 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis ji ltar bshad pa de bzhin no zhes nem
73a1('bum): nur myed cing the tsom myi za la rmongs par myi 'gyur na/ des ni phyis kyang rgya cher de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas myi 'khrugs pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs
73a2('bum): kyi bu de dag las thos par 'gyur te/ byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu de yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la mos shing / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la de bzhin gshegs pas ji skad
73a3('bum): du bstan pa de bzhin du mos pas/ phyir myi ldog pa nyid la gnas par gyur te/ rab 'byor de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa thos pa ni phan pa mang po 'gyur ba yin te/ gang gis
73a4('bum): mos shing mos nas de bzhin du gnas pa dang / de bzhin du nan tan byed pa de dag ni lta smos kyang myi smos te/ de dag de bzhin nyid la gnas/ de bzhin nyid la nan tan du byas nas/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la gnas par
73a5('bum): 'gyur ro/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin nyid du gnas nas/ de bzhin du nan tan bgyis te/ chos gang yang myi dmyigs na/ de ji ltar rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la gnas par 'gyur ba lags/ bcom ldan
73a6('bum): 'das de ltar de bzhin nyid la ma gtogs pa'i chos kyang gang la myi dmyigs na su zhig de bzhin nyid la gnas par 'gyur/ su zhig de bzhin nyid la gnas nas/ bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par
73a7('bum): rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur/ su zhig de bzhin nyid la gnas shing / chos ston par 'gyur/ de bzhin nyid kyang dmyigs su ma mchis na/ de bzhin nyid la gnas par 'gyur ba dang / de bzhin nyid la gnas te/ bla na myed pa yang
73a8('bum): dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba dang / de bzhin nyid la gnas shing chos ston par 'gyur ba lta ci smos te/ de ni gnas ma mchis so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor gang khyod
73b1('bum): kyis 'di skad du gang de bzhin nyid la gnas pa dang / de bzhin nyid la gnas te/ bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba dang / de bzhin nyid la gnas shing chos ston par 'gyur
73b2('bum): ba de lta bu'i chos gang yang de bzhin nyid la ma gtogs pa gzhan dmyigs su myed de/ de bzhin nyid kyang dmyigs su myed na/ de bzhin nyid la gnas par 'gyur ba dang / de bzhin nyid la gnas te/ bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs
73b3('bum): pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba dang / de bzhin nyid la gnas shing chos ston par 'gyur ba lta ci smos te/ de ni gnas myed do zhes zer ba ni/ rab 'byor de de bzhin no/ /de de bzhin te/ ji skad du smras pa de bzhin
73b4('bum): no/ /rab 'byor gang de bzhin nyid la gnas pa dang / gang de bzhin nyid la gnas te/ bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba dang / gang de bzhin nyid la gnas shing chos ston par 'gyur
73b5('bum): ba de lta bu'i chos gang yang de bzhin nyid la ma gtogs par gzhan dmyigs su myed de/ de bzhin nyid kyang dmyigs su myed na/ gang de bzhin nyid la gnas par 'gyur ba dang / de bzhin nyid la gnas te/ bla na myed pa yang
73b6('bum): dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba dang / de bzhin nyid la gnas shing chos ston par 'gyur ba lta ci smos te/ de ni gnas myed do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor de bzhin gshegs pa rnams byung
73b7('bum): yang rung / de bzhin gshegs pa rnams ma byung yang rung ste/ chos rnams kyi de bzhin nyid dang / ma nor ba de bzhin nyid dang / gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid dang / chos nyid de ni gnas pa'o/ /chos rnams kyi chos kyi dbyings dang /
73b8('bum): chos kyi gnas nyid dang / chos skyon myed pa nyid dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' de ni gnas pa ste/ rab 'byor de bzhin nyid 'di la ni gang yang gnas par 'gyur ba myed de/ de la gnas shing bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu
74a1('bum): mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ba su yang myed na de la gnas shing chos ston par 'gyur ba lta ci smos te/ de ni gnas myed do/ /de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin kyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom
74a2('bum): ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni zab pa ste/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'tshal ba de dag ni
74a3('bum): dka' ba bgyid pa'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das chos gang yang dmyigs su ma mchis te/ su yang de bzhin nyid la gnas pa ma mchis la/ bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par
74a4('bum): 'tshang rgya ba yang gang yang ma mchis te/ chos ston pa yang gang yang ma mchis la/ des zhum par yang myi 'gyur zhing de dag la nem nur du 'gyur ba 'am/ rmongs par 'gyur ba ma mchis pa ni dka' ba bgyid pa'o/ /de nas gnas brtan rab
74a5('bum): 'byor gyis lha'i dbang po brgya byin la 'di skad ces smras so/ /ke'u shi ka gang khyod kyis 'di skad du bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang chos zab mo 'di dag la nem nur du myi 'gyur/ rmongs par
74a6('bum): myi 'gyur ba ni/ dka' ba bgyid pa'o/ /zhes gsol ba ni/ ke'u shi ka chos thams cad stong pa yin na/ de la nem nur du 'gyur ba 'am/ rmongs par 'gyur ba de lta bu su zhig yod/ brgya byin gyis smras pa/ gnas brtan
74a7('bum): rab 'byor ni gang ci ston kyang de thams cad stong pa nyid brtsams shing ston te/ ci la yang chags pa myed do/ /'di lta ste dper na bar snang la 'phangs pa'i mda' ni ci la yang chags pa myed do/ /de bzhin du gnas brtan rab
74a8('bum): 'byor kyis chos bstan pa yang ci la yang chags pa myed do/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa las/ le'u bzhi bcu dgu'o// // de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin kyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad
74b1('bum): ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das ci lags/ bdag gis 'di skad du gsol te/ de skad du brjod pas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa'i rjes su brjod pa dang / chos su brjod cing chos kyi gnyer ba'i chos nyid yang
74b2('bum): dag par lung bstan pas lung bstan par 'gyur ba lags sam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ke'u shi ka gang khyod kyis de skad du smras te/ de skad du brjod pas/ de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs pa'i rjes su
74b3('bum): brjod pa dang / chos su rjod cing chos kyi gnyer ba'i chos nyid lung bstan par 'gyur ro/ /brgya byin kyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das gnas brtan rab 'byor 'dis ci dang ci spobs pa de thams cad stong pa nyid brtsams
74b4('bum): shing spobs/ mtshan ma ma mchis pa nyid brtsams shing spobs/ smon pa ma mchis pa nyid brtsams shing spobs/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa nyid brtsams shing spobs/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid brtsams shing
74b5('bum): spobs/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa nyid brtsams shing spobs/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid brtsams shing spobs/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid brtsams shing spobs/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid
74b6('bum): brtsams shing spobs pa dang / nang stong pa nyid brtsams shing spobs/ phyi stong pa nyid brtsams shing spobs/ phyi nang stong pa nyid brtsams shing spobs/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid brtsams shing spobs/ chen po stong pa nyid brtsams
74b7('bum): shing spobs/ don dam pa stong pa nyid brtsams shing spobs/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid brtsams shing spobs/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid brtsams shing spobs/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid brtsams shing spobs/ thog
74b8('bum): ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid brtsams shing spobs/ dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid brtsams shing spobs/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid brtsams shing spobs/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid brtsams shing spobs/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa
75a1('bum): nyid brtsams shing spobs/ myi dmyigs stong pa nyid brtsams shing spobs/ dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid brtsams shing spobs/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid brtsams shing spobs/ dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid brtsams
75a2('bum): shing spobs/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams brtsams shing spobs/ yang dag par spong ba rnams brtsams shing spobs/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams brtsams shing spobs/ dbang po rnams brtsams shing spobs/ stobs rnams
75a3('bum): brtsams shing spobs/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams brtsams shing spobs/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa brtsams shing spobs/ 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams brtsams shing spobs/ bsam gtan rnams brtsams
75a4('bum): shing spobs/ tshad myed pa rnams brtsams shing spobs/ gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams brtsams shing spobs/ rnam par thar pa rnams brtsams shing spobs/ mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams
75a5('bum): brtsams shing spobs/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma myed pa dang smon pa myed pa brtsams shing spobs/ mngon par shes pa rnams brtsams shing spobs/ ting nge 'dzin rnams brtsams shing spobs/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams brtsams
75a6('bum): shing spobs/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams brtsams shing spobs/ myi 'jigs pa rnams brtsams shing spobs/ so so yang dag par rig pa rnams brtsams shing spobs/ snying rje chen po brtsams shing spobs/ sangs rgyas kyi
75a7('bum): chos ma 'dres pa rnams brtsams shing spobs/ rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu brtsams shing spobs/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu brtsams shing spobs/ phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu brtsams shing spobs/ dgra bcom pa
75a8('bum): nyid brtsams shing spobs/ rang byang chub brtsams shing spobs/ lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid brtsams shing spobs/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid brtsams shing spobs pa ngo mtshar che'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
75b1('bum): stsal pa/ ke'u shi ka gnas brtan rab 'byor stong pa nyid la rnam par spyod pas/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa nyid kyang myi dmyigs na/ gang sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa lta ci smos/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid kyang myi
75b2('bum): dmyigs na/ gang tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa lta ci smos/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa nyid kyang myi dmyigs na/ gang bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa lta ci smos/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid kyang myi
75b3('bum): dmyigs na/ gang brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa lta ci smos/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid kyang myi dmyigs na/ gang bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa lta ci smos/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
75b4('bum): nyid kyang myi dmyigs na/ gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa lta ci smos/ nang stong pa nyid kyang myi dmyigs na/ gang nang stong pa nyid la spyod pa lta ci smos/ phyi stong pa nyid kyang myi dmyigs na/ gang phyi stong pa nyid la bsgom pa lta
75b5('bum): ci smos/ phyi nang stong pa nyid kyang myi dmyigs na/ gang phyi nang stong pa nyid la bsgom pa lta ci smos/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang myi dmyigs na/ gang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la bsgom pa lta ci smos/ chen po stong pa nyid kyang myi
75b6('bum): dmyigs na/ gang chen po stong pa nyid la bsgom pa lta ci smos/ don dam pa stong pa nyid kyang myi dmyigs na/ gang don dam pa stong pa nyid la bsgom pa lta ci smos/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyang myi dmyigs na/ gang 'dus byas stong
75b7('bum): pa nyid la bsgom pa lta ci smos/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyang myi dmyigs na/ gang 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid la bsgom pa lta ci smos/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyang myi dmyigs na/ gang mtha' las 'das
75b8('bum): pa stong pa nyid la bsgom pa lta ci smos/ thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid kyang myi dmyigs na/ gang thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid la bsgom pa lta ci smos/ dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid kyang myi dmigs na/ gang dor
76a1('bum): ba myed pa stong pa nyid la bsgom pa lta ci smos/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang myi dmyigs na/ gang rang bzhin stong pa nyid la bsgom pa lta ci smos/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyang myi dmyigs na/ gang chos thams cad stong pa nyid la bsgom
76a2('bum): pa lta ci smos/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyang myi dmyigs na/ gang rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid la bsgom pa lta ci smos/ myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid kyang myi dmyigs na/ gang myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid la bsgom pa lta ci smos/ dngos po myed pa
76a3('bum): stong pa nyid kyang myi dmyigs na/ gang dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid la bsgom pa lta ci smos/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang myi dmyigs na/ gang ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la bsgom pa lta ci smos/ dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang myi dmyigs na/
76a4('bum): gang dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la bsgom pa lta ci smos/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyang myi dmyigs na/ gang dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams la bsgom pa lta ci smos/ yang dag spong ba rnams kyang myi dmyigs na/ gang yang dag par
76a5('bum): spong ba rnams la bsgom pa lta ci smos/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyang myi dmyigs na/ gang rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams la bsgom pa lta ci smos/ dbang po rnams kyang myi dmyigs na/ gang dbang po rnams la bsgom pa lta ci smos/ stobs rnams
76a6('bum): kyang myi dmyigs na/ gang stobs rnams la bsgom pa lta ci smos/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyang myi dmyigs na/ gang byang chub kyi yan lag rnams la bsgom pa lta ci smos/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa yang myi dmyigs na/ gang 'phags
76a7('bum): pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la bsgom pa lta ci smos/ 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyang myi dmyigs na/ gang 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams la bsgom pa lta ci smos/ bsam gtan rnams kyang myi dmyigs na/ gang bsam gtan rnams la
76a8('bum): bsgom pa lta ci smos/ tshad myed pa rnams kyang myi dmyigs na/ gang tshad myed pa rnams la bsgom pa lta ci smos/ gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyang myi dmyigs na/ gang gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa
76b1('bum): rnams la bsgom pa lta ci smos/ rnam par thar pa rnams kyang myi dmyigs na/ gang rnam par thar pa rnams la bsgom pa lta ci smos/ mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyang myi dmyigs na/ gang mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms
76b2('bum): par 'jug pa rnams la bsgom pa lta ci smos/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa yang myi dmyigs na/ gang rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa la bsgom pa lta ci smos/
76b3('bum): mngon par shes pa rnams kyang myi dmyigs na/ gang mngon par shes pa rnams la bsgom pa lta ci smos/ ting nge 'dzin rnams kyang myi dmyigs na/ gang ting nge 'dzin rnams la bsgom pa lta ci smos/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyang myi dmyigs na/ gang gzungs kyi sgo
76b4('bum): rnams la bsgom pa lta ci smos/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams kyang myi dmyigs na/ gang de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams la mngon par bsgrub pa lta ci smos/ myi 'jigs pa rnams kyang myi dmyigs na/ gang myi 'jigs pa rnams
76b5('bum): mngon par bsgrub pa lta ci smos/ so so yang dag par rigs pa rnams kyang myi dmyigs na/ gang so so yang dag par rig pa rnams la mngon par bsgrub pa lta ci smos/ snying rje chen po nyid kyang myi dmyigs na/ gang snying rje chen po mngon par bsgrub pa lta ci
76b6('bum): smos/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwo brgyad kyang myi dmyigs na/ gang sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwo brgyad mngon par bsgrub pa lta ci smos/ rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu nyid kyang myi dmyigs na/ gang rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu
76b7('bum): rjes su 'thob pa lta ci smos/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu nyid kyang myi dmyigs na/ gang lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu rjes su 'thob pa lta ci smos/ phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu nyid kyang myi dmyigs na/ gang phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras
76b8('bum): bu rjes su 'thob pa lta ci smos/ dgra bcom pa nyid kyang myi dmyigs na/ gang dgra bcom pa'i 'bras bu rjes su 'thob pa lta ci smos/ rang byang chub nyid kyang myi dmyigs na/ gang rang byang chub kyi 'bras bu rjes su 'thob pa lta ci smos
77a1('bum): lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyang myi dmyigs na/ gang lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid rjes su 'thob pa lta ci smos/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang myi dmyigs na/ gang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rjes su
77a2('bum): 'thob pa lta ci smos/ de bzhin nyid kyang myi dmyigs na/ gang de bzhin gshegs par 'gyur ba lta ci smos/ ma skyes pa nyid kyang myi dmyigs na/ gang ma skyes pa mngon du byed pa lta ci smos/ mtshan rnams kyang myi
77a3('bum): dmyigs na/ gang gi lus la mtshan yod par 'gyur ba lta ci smos/ dpe' byad rnams kyang myi dmyigs na/ gang gi lus la dpe' byad yod par 'gyur ba lta ci smos/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka gnas brtan rab 'byor ni
77a4('bum): chos thams cad dben pa la rnam par spyod pa ste/ dmyigs su myed pa la rnam par spyod pa/ stong pa nyid la rnam par spyod pa/ mtshan ma myed pa la rnam par spyod pa/ smon pa myed pa la rnam par spyod pa ste/ ke'u shi ka gnas
77a5('bum): brtan rab 'byor kyi rnam pa spyod pa gang yin pa des ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la rnam par spyod pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i rnam par spyod pa la
77a6('bum): brgya'i char yang nye bar myi 'gro'o/ /stong gi char yang nye bar myi 'gro'o/ /brgya phrag stong gi char yang nye bar myi 'gro'o/ /bye ba'i char yang nye bar myi 'gro'o/ /bye ba brgya'i char yang nye bar myi 'gro'o/ /
77a7('bum): bye ba stong gi char yang nye bar myi 'gro'o/ /bye ba brgya phrag stong gi char yang nye bar myi 'gro'o/ /bye ba khrag khrig brgya phrag stong gi char yang nye bar myi 'gro'o/ /grangs dang cha dang bgrang ba dang / dpe' dang rgyur
77a8('bum): yang nye bar myi bzod do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam par spyod pa ma gtogs par byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i rnam par spyod pa gang
77b1('bum): yin pa dang / nyan thos rnams kyis rnam par spyod pa gang yin pa dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi rnam par spyod pa gang yin pa'i rnam par spyod pa de dag las byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi
77b2('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i rnam par spyod pa 'di nyid ni mchog ces bya'o/ /rab ces bya'o/ /phul zhes bya'o/ /dam pa zhes bya'o/ /gya nom pa zhes bya'o/ /bla na myed pa gong na myed pa/ mnyam pa myed pa/
77b3('bum): myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa zhes bya'o/ /ke'u shi ka de bas na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can thams cad kyi mchog tu 'gyur bar 'dod pas/ 'di lta ste shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rnam par spyod
77b4('bum): pa 'di nyid kyis rnam par spyod par bya'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi sa las
77b5('bum): 'das te/ byang chub sems dpa'i skyon myed pa la 'jug go/ /byang chub sems dpa'i skyon myed pa la zhugs nas/ sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ /sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams
77b6('bum): yongs su rdzogs par byas nas/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi ye shes rjes su 'thob par 'gyur ro/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi ye shes rjes su thob nas/ bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor
77b7('bum): ba'i nyon mongs pa thams cad spongs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas su 'gyur ro/ / //shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa/ bam po drug
77b8('bum): pa/ de nas 'khor de'i nang nas sum bcu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams me tog man 'da' ra ba mang po thogs te/ bcom ldan 'das la gtor to/ /mngon par gtor to/ /rab tu gtor to/ /dge slong
78a1('bum): brgya drug bcu tsam yang stan las langs nas chos gos phrag pa gcig tu bzar te/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la gtsugs nas/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su/
78a2('bum): thal mo sbyar bas btud nas/ bcom ldan 'das la myig myi 'dzums par lta zhing phyag 'tshal lo/ /dge slong de dag gis thal mo sbyar te btud pa'i tshe/ sangs rgyas kyi mthus snyim pa me tog man
78a3('bum): 'da' ra bas gang bar gyur nas/ me tog man 'da' ra ba de dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la gtor to/ /mngon par gtor to/ /rab tu gtor to/ /de ltar
78a4('bum): 'thor zhing mngon par 'thor ba dang / rab tu 'thor ba'i tshe/ tshig 'di skad ces brjod de/ bcom ldan 'das dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi spyod yul ma lags pa'i rnam
78a5('bum): par spyod pa dam pas/ bdag cag rnam par spyod par gyur cig ces smras pa dang / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong de dag gis bsam pa thugs su chud de/ de'i tshe 'dzum pa mdzad do/ /
78a6('bum): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi chos nyid kyang de ste/ de ltar 'dzum pa mdzad pa'i tshe/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhal gyi sgo nas 'di lta ste/ 'od gzer sngon po dang / ser po dang /
78a7('bum): dmar po dang / dkar po dang / leb rgan dang / shel dang / dngul gyi kha dog lta bu rnam pa sna tshogs byung ste/ de dag gis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams snang bas rgyas par bkang nas
78a8('bum): phyir 'dus te/ bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum du g.yas phyogs su bskor ba byas te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi dbu'i gtsug du nub bo/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa dga' bo stan las langs nas/ bla gos phrag
78b1('bum): pa gcig tu byas te/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs nas/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar bas btud de/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs
78b2('bum): pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams ni rgyu dang rkyen ma mchis par 'dzum pa myi mdzad na/ ci'i rgyu ci'i rkyen kyis 'dzum pa mdzad/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa
78b3('bum): dga' bo la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /dga' bo dge slong brgya drug bcu po 'di dag bskal pa dpe skar ma lta bu la bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ste/ me tog sil ma
78b4('bum): zhes bya ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas sha stag 'jig rten du byung bar 'gyur ro/ /dga' bo me tog sil ma zhes bya ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
78b5('bum): sangs rgyas de dag gi dge slong gi dge 'dun mtshungs par 'gyur/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing mtshungs par 'gyur/ tshe'i tshad kyang 'di lta ste/ lo stong du mtshungs par 'gyur te/ de dag gang dang gang nas mngon par
78b6('bum): 'byung bar 'gyur ba dang / mngon par byung nas rab tu 'byung ba dang / rab tu byung nas bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba de dang de dag tu me tog kha dog rnam pa lnga dang
78b7('bum): ldan pa'i me tog gi char mngon par 'bab par 'gyur ro/ /dga' bo de bas na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam par spyod pa'i dam pas rnam par spyad par 'dod pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyad par bya'o/ /
78b8('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam par spyad pas/ rnam par spyod par 'dod pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod par bya'o/ /dga' bo rigs kyi bu/
79a1('bum): 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la spyod pa'i rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo des 'di ltar bdag ni myi'i nang nas shi 'phos nas 'dir skyes pa 'am/ dga' ldan gyi lha'i ris nas
79a2('bum): shi 'phos nas 'dir skyes pa ste/ myi'i nang du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di rgya cher thos pa 'am/ dga' ldan gyi lha'i ris su shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di rgya cher thos pa'o zhes bya bar
79a3('bum): rtogs par rig par bya'o/ /dga' bo byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la spyod pa de dag de bzhin gshegs pas rnam par gzigs par bltas te/
79a4('bum): dga' bo rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo la la zhig shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di nyan pa dang / thos nas 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par byed pa dang / tshul bzhin
79a5('bum): du yid la byed pa dang / gang zag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa rnams la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di ston cing rjes su 'dems pa'i gang zag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa des/
79a6('bum): bdag gis de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams las shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di thos par gyur/ gzung ba dang bcangs pa dang / blags pa
79a7('bum): dang / kun chub par byas par gyur te/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag la yang dge ba'i rtsa ba mang po bskyed par gyur to zhes bya bar rtogs par rig par bya
79a8('bum): ste/ dga' bo rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo des bdag gis ni nyan thos rnams la dge ba'i rtsa ba ma bskyed/ nyan thos rnams las shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di thos pa ma yin no
79b1('bum): zhes bya bar rig par bya'o/ /dga' bo rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par byed pa dang / don dang / chos dang /
79b2('bum): yi ge dang 'thun par khong du chud pa byed na/ dga' bo rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo des bdag la ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mngon du gyur to zhes bya bar
79b3('bum): rtogs par rig par bya'o/ /dga' bo rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di bstan pa thos na/ phyir myi zlog cing ngan du myi brjod la thos nas kyang mos pa thob par 'gyur
79b4('bum): na/ dga' bo rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de ni sngon gyi rgyal ba la bya ba byas pa/ dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis yongs su bzung bar rig par bya'o/ /dga' bo rigs kyi bu 'am
79b5('bum): rigs kyi bu mo gang la las de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams las dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa lta yang myi slu te/ nyan thos sam/ rang sangs rgyas sam/ sangs rgyas
79b6('bum): su 'gyur mod kyi 'on kyang dga' bo byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la
79b7('bum): spyod pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa dang / nang stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / phyi stong
79b8('bum): pa nyid la spyod pa dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / chen po stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang /
80a1('bum): 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid la
80a2('bum): spyod pa dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang /
80a3('bum): dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams la spyod pa dang / yang dag par spong ba rnams la spyod pa dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams la spyod pa dang / dbang po rnams la spyod pa dang /
80a4('bum): stobs rnams la spyod pa dang / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams la spyod pa dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la spyod pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams la spyod pa dang / bsam gtan rnams la spyod pa dang / tshad myed
80a5('bum): pa rnams la spyod pa dang / gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la spyod pa dang / rnam par thar pa rnams la spyod pa dang / mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la spyod pa dang / rnam par
80a6('bum): thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa la spyod pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams la spyod pa dang / ting nge 'dzin rnams la spyod pa dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams la spyod pa dang /
80a7('bum): de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams la spyod pa dang / myi 'jigs pa rnams la spyod pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa rnams la spyod pa dang / snying rje chen po la spyod pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa
80a8('bum): rnams la spyod pa dang / rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la spyod pa dang / lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la spyod pa dang / phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la spyod pa dang / dgra bcom pa nyid la spyod pa dang / rang byang chub
80b1('bum): la spyod pa dang / lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid la spyod pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la spyod pas shin tu rtogs par bya'o/ /shin tu rtogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ sbyin pa'i
80b2('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa dang /
80b3('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa dang / nang stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / phyi stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / chen po stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / don dam pa
80b4('bum): stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang /
80b5('bum): dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / dngos po myed
80b6('bum): pa stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams la spyod pa dang / yang dag par spong ba rnams la spyod pa dang / rdzu 'phrul
80b7('bum): gyi rkang pa rnams la spyod pa dang / dbang po rnams la spyod pa dang / stobs rnams la spyod pa dang / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams la spyod pa dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la spyod pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa
80b8('bum): rnams la spyod pa dang / bsam gtan rnams la spyod pa dang / tshad myed pa rnams la spyod pa dang / gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la spyod pa dang / rnam par thar pa rnams la spyod pa dang / mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par
81a1('bum): 'jug pa rnams la spyod pa dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa la spyod pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams la spyod pa dang / ting nge 'dzin rnams la spyod pa dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnam
81a2('bum): la spyod pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams la spyod pa dang / myi 'jigs pa rnams la spyod pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa rnams la spyod pa dang / snying rje chen po la spyod pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma
81a3('bum): 'dres pa bcwo brgyad la spyod pa dang / thams cad shes pa nyid la spyod pa dang / lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid la spyod pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la spyod pa ni nyan thos sam/ rang sangs rgyas su myi 'gyur ro/ /
81a4('bum): dga' bo de bas na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di khyod la gtad de dga' bo gal te khyod kyi ngas chos gang ji snyed cig bshad pa las/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma gtogs par ngas chos bstan
81a5('bum): pa de dag thams cad bzung ste/ kun chub par byas nas/ de'i 'og tu chud gsan te bor yang de tsam gyis dga' bo khyod la skyon du ngas myi rtsi'i/ dga' bo gal te khyod kyi shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab
81a6('bum): mo 'di bzung ste/ kun chub par byas nas de'i 'og tu chud gsan tam/ bor bar 'gyur na des ni 'ga' bo khyod la ngas skyon du gzung ngo / /dga' bo de bas na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di nyid khyod la
81a7('bum): gtad kyis ci nas kyang gzung ba dang / bcang ba dang / klag pa dang / kun chub par bya ba dang / shin tu yid la gzung bar gyis shig /legs par yongs su zin pa dang / legs par kun chub pa dang / legs
81a8('bum): par bcang bar gyis shig / yi ge dang tshig dang / 'bru shin tu rdzogs pa dang / nges pa'i tshig legs par shin tu zin par bya'o/ /dga' bo rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di
81b1('bum): 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par byed pa des ni/ 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi byang chub bzung bar 'gyur ro/ /dga' bo rigs kyi bu 'am rigs
81b2('bum): kyi bu mo gang la la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dzin pa des ni 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi byang chub 'thun par yongs su bzung bar 'gyur ro/ /dga'
81b3('bum): bo mngon du gyur par nga la gang me tog dang / 'phreng ba dang / spos dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / na bza' dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan gyis rim gror bya ba dang / bkur bstir bya ba dang / phu dud du bya ba dang /
81b4('bum): mchod par bya bar 'dod pa des shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di bzung bar bya/ bcang bar bya/ klag par bya/ kun chub par bya'o/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di bzung ste/ bcangs nas blags
81b5('bum): shing kun chub par bya ste/ me tog dang / 'phreng ba dang / spos dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / na bza' dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan gyis rim gror bya/ bkur bstir bya/ phu dud du bya/ mchod par bya'o/ /
81b6('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la rim gro dang / bkur bsti dang / phu dud dang / mchod pa byas na/ des ni nga yang mchod par 'gyur/ 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyang mchod
81b7('bum): par 'gyur ro/ /dga' bo gang la la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di bstan pa la rim gro dang / dga' ba dang mos pa bskyed pa des ni 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan
81b8('bum): 'das rnams la rim gro dang / dga' ba dang / mos pa bskyed par 'gyur ro/ /dga' bo gal te khyod la nga sdug cing yid du 'ong la yongs su ma btang zhe na/ dga' bo khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di sdug pa dang / yid du 'ong ba dang
82a1('bum): yongs su myi gtang bar gyis shig ci nas kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di las/ tshig 'ga' yang khyod kyis chud ma zos par gyis shig /dga' bo ngas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di gtad
82a2('bum): pa las brtsams te/ khyod la shin tu mang du bstan pa yang mdor na dga' bo khyod la nga ji ltar ston par gyur pa de bzhin du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di khyod kyi ston pa yin gyis/ dga' bo de bas na ngas khyod
82a3('bum): la tshad myed par gtad pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di yongs su gtad de/ dga' bo de bas na ngas lha dang myi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyi mdun du brjod de/ sus sangs rgyas yongs su ma btang ba dang /
82a4('bum): chos yongs su ma btang ba dang / dge 'dun yongs su ma btang ba dang / 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams yongs su ma btang ba dang / 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang /
82a5('bum): da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi byang chub yongs su ma btang ba des shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di yongs su gtang bar myi bya ste/ 'di ni nga'i gdams ngag go/ /dga' bo
82a6('bum): rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / 'phel bar byed pa dang / kun chub par byed pa dang / tshul bzhin du
82a7('bum): yid la byed pa dang / gzhan la yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di rnam grangs du mar rgya cher 'chad pa dang / ston pa dang / rab tu ston pa dang / shes par byed pa dang / rab tu gzhog pa dang /
82a8('bum): 'grel pa dang / rnam par 'byed pa dang / gsal bar byed pa dang / yang dag par ston pa'i rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo de ni myur du bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs
82b1('bum): par 'tshang rgya ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang nye bar gyur pa yin/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ dga' bo shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las byung ba ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
82b2('bum): byang chub ste/ dga' bo 'das pa'i dus kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang ji snyed cig byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gi/ bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
82b3('bum): byang chub kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid las byung ngo / /dga' bo ma 'ongs pa'i dus kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang ji snyed cig byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan
82b4('bum): 'das de dag gi/ bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid las byung bar 'gyur ro/ /dga' bo da ltar byung ba'i dus na/ shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams tshad myed
82b5('bum): grangs myed dpag tu myed pa dag na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang ji snyed cig bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba dang / chos ston pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de
82b6('bum): dag gi bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid las byung ngo / /dga' bo da ltar byung ba'i dus na/ lho phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams tshad myed grangs myed dpag
82b7('bum): tu myed pa dag na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang ji snyed cig bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba dang / chos ston pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gi bla na
82b8('bum): myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid las byung ngo / /dga' bo da ltar byung ba'i dus na/ nub phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams tshad myed grangs
83a1('bum): myed dpag tu myed pa dag na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang ji snyed cig bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba dang / chos ston pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gi bla na myed pa yang dag par
83a2('bum): rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid las byung ngo / /dga' bo da ltar byung ba'i dus na/ byang phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams tshad myed grangs myed dpag tu myed pa dag na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom
83a3('bum): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang ji snyed cig bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba dang / chos ston pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gi bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
83a4('bum): nyid las byung ngo / /dga' bo da ltar byung ba'i dus na/ byang shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams tshad myed grangs myed dpag tu myed pa dag na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
83a5('bum): sangs rgyas gang ji snyed cig bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba dang / chos ston pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gi bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid las byung ngo / /
83a6('bum): dga' bo da ltar byung ba'i dus na/ shar lho'i phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams tshad myed grangs myed dpag tu myed pa dag na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang ji
83a7('bum): snyed cig bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba dang / chos ston pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gi bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid las byung ngo / /
83a8('bum): dga' bo da ltar byung ba'i dus na lho nub kyi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams tshad myed grangs myed dpag tu myed pa dag na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang ji snyed
83b1('bum): cig bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba dang / chos ston pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gi bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid las byung ngo / /dga' bo da ltar byung ba'i
83b2('bum): dus na nub byang kyi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams tshad myed grangs myed dpag tu myed pa dag na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang ji snyed cig bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba dang /
83b3('bum): chos ston pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gi bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid las byung ngo / /dga' bo da ltar byung ba'i dus na 'og gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams
83b4('bum): tshad myed grangs myed dpag tu myed pa dag na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang ji snyed cig bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba dang / chos ston pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gi
83b5('bum): bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid las byung ngo / /dga' bo da ltar byung ba'i dus na steng gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams tshad myed grangs myed dpag tu myed pa dag na/
83b6('bum): de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang ji snyed cig bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba dang / chos ston pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gi bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
83b7('bum): byang chub kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid las byung ngo / /dga' bo de bas na bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'dod pa dang / pha rol
83b8('bum): tu phyin pa drug la bslab par 'dod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la bslab par bya'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ dga' bo 'di lta ste/
84a1('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi ma ste/ skyed par byed pa'o/ /dga' bo byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa drug la slob pa de dag
84a2('bum): thams cad ni bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu 'byung bar 'gyur te/ dga' bo de bas na khyod la pha rol tu phyin pa drug po 'di dag yang dang yang du yongs su gtad do/ /rjes su gtad do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/
84a3('bum): dga' bo 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi chos kyi mdzod de/ 'di ltar pha rol tu phyin pa drug gi mdzod ni zad myi shes pa'i chos kyi mdzod do/ /dga' bo phyogs bcu'i 'jig
84a4('bum): rten gyi khams tshad myed grangs myed dpag tu myed pa dag na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang ji snyed cig bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba dang / chos ston pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan
84a5('bum): 'das de dag kyang pha rol tu phyin pa drug gi mdzod 'di las chos ston to/ /dga' bo 'das pa'i dus kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang ji snyed cig byung ba de dag kyang pha rol tu
84a6('bum): phyin pa drug po 'di dag la bslabs nas/ bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas te chos bstan to/ /dga' bo ma 'ongs pa'i dus kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra
84a7('bum): bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang ji snyed cig byung ba de dag kyang pha rol tu phyin pa drug po 'di dag la bslabs te/ bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang
84a8('bum): rgya bar 'gyur te/ chos kyang ston par 'gyur ro/ /dga' bo 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi nyan thos gang ji snyed cig yod pa
84b1('bum): de dag kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid la bslabs te/ yongs su mya ngan las 'das par gyur to/ /yongs su mya ngan las 'da'o/ /yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur ro/ /dga' bo gal te khyod
84b2('bum): kyis gang zag nyan thos kyi theg pa rnams la nyan thos kyi sa las brtsams te/ chos bstan pa'i chos bstan pa des stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can gang ji snyed pa de dag thams cad dgra bcom
84b3('bum): p a nyid mngon tu byed par gyur kyang da rung nyan thos khyod kyis nga'i nyan thos kyi bya ba byas par myi 'gyur gyi dga' bo gal te khyod kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ldan pa'i tshig
84b4('bum): 'ga' zhig brjod de/ bstan kyang nyan thos khyod kyis nga dgyes par byas pa yin te/ nyan thos kyis nyan thos kyi bya ba byas par 'gyur ro/ /dga' bo de ji snyam du sems/ chos bstan pa snga ma des stong gsum
84b5('bum): gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can gang ji snyed pa de dag thams cad snga phyi myed par dgra bcom pa nyid mngon tu byed par gyur na/ dgra bcom pa de dag gi sbyin pa las byung ba'i bsod nams kyi dngos po
84b6('bum): dang / tshul khrims las byung ba dang / sgom pa las byung ba'i bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po de dag mang ngam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das mang ngo / /bde bar gshegs pa mang ngo / /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal
84b7('bum): pa/ dga' bo de bas gang zag nyan thos kyi theg pa pa gang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po la chung ngu na nyi ma gcig cig shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ldan pa'i chos ston na/ de'i bsod nams ches mang du
84b8('bum): 'phel bar 'gyur ro/ /dga' bo nyin gcig lta zhog gi/ dga' bo gal te nyi ma phyed dam/ dga' bo nyi ma phyed lta zhog gi/ dga' bo gal te snga dro gcig gam/ dga' bo snga dro gcig lta zhog gi/ dga' bo
85a1('bum): gal te chu tshod gcig tsam 'am/ dga' bo chu tshod gcig tsam lta zhog gi/ dga' bo gal te skad 'ga' yud 'ga' thang 'ga' zhig gang zag nyan thos kyi theg pa pas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
