128b7('bum): sa'i khams stong zhes bya ba 'am/ myi stong zhes bya bar myi dmyigs so/ /chu'i khams stong zhes bya ba 'am/ myi stong zhes bya bar myi dmyigs so/ /me'i khams stong zhes bya ba 'am/ myi stong zhes bya bar myi dmyigs
128b8('bum): so/ /rlung gi khams stong zhes bya ba 'am/ myi stong zhes bya bar myi dmyigs so/ /nam mkha'i khams stong zhes bya ba 'am/ myi stong zhes bya bar myi dmyigs so/ /rnam par shes pa'i khams stong zhes bya ba 'am/
129a1('bum): myi stong zhes bya bar myi dmyigs so/ /ma rig pa stong zhes bya ba 'am/ myi stong zhes bya bar myi dmyigs so/ /'du byed stong zhes bya ba 'am/ myi stong zhes bya bar myi dmyigs so/ /rnam par shes pa stong
129a2('bum): zhes bya ba 'am/ myi stong zhes bya bar myi dmyigs so/ /mying dang gzugs stong zhes bya ba 'am/ myi stong zhes bya bar myi dmyigs so/ /skye mched drug stong zhes bya ba 'am/ myi stong zhes bya bar myi dmyigs so/ /reg pa
129a3('bum): stong zhes bya ba 'am/ myi stong zhes bya bar myi dmyigs so/ /tshor ba stong zhes bya ba 'am/ myi stong zhes bya bar myi dmyigs so/ /sred pa stong zhes bya ba 'am/ myi stong zhes bya bar myi dmyigs so/ /len pa stong
129a4('bum): zhes bya ba 'am/ myi stong zhes bya bar myi dmyigs so/ /srid pa stong zhes bya ba 'am/ myi stong zhes bya bar myi dmyigs so/ /skye ba stong zhes bya ba 'am/ myi stong zhes bya bar myi dmyigs so/ /rga shi stong zhes
129a5('bum): bya ba 'am/ myi stong zhes bya bar myi dmyigs so/ /sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa stong zhes bya ba 'am/ myi stong zhes bya bar myi dmyigs so/ /tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong zhes bya ba 'am/ myi stong
129a6('bum): zhes bya bar myi dmyigs so/ /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa stong zhes bya ba 'am/ myi stong zhes bya bar myi dmyigs so/ /brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong zhes bya ba 'am/ myi stong zhes bya bar
129a7('bum): myi dmyigs so/ /bsam gtan kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong zhes bya ba 'am/ myi stong zhes bya bar myi dmyigs so/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong zhes bya ba 'am/ myi stong zhes bya bar myi dmyigs
129a8('bum): so/ /nang stong pa nyid stong zhes bya ba 'am/ myi stong zhes bya bar myi dmyigs so/ /phyi stong pa nyid stong zhes bya ba 'am/ myi stong zhes bya bar myi dmyigs so/ /phyi nang stong pa nyid stong zhes bya ba 'am/ myi stong zhes
129b1('bum): bya bar myi dmyigs so/ /stong pa nyid stong pa nyid stong zhes bya ba 'am/ myi stong zhes bya bar myi dmyigs so/ /chen po stong pa nyid stong zhes bya ba 'am/ myi stong zhes bya bar myi dmyigs so/ /don dam pa stong pa nyid
129b2('bum): stong zhes bya ba 'am/ myi stong zhes bya bar myi dmyigs so/ /'dus byas stong pa nyid stong zhes bya ba 'am/ myi stong zhes bya bar myi dmyigs so/ /'dus ma byas stong pa nyid stong zhes bya ba 'am/ myi stong zhes
129b3('bum): bya bar myi dmyigs so/ /mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid stong zhes bya ba 'am/ myi stong zhes bya bar myi dmyigs so/ /thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid stong zhes bya ba 'am/ myi stong zhes bya bar myi dmyigs
129b4('bum): so/ /dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid stong zhes bya ba 'am/ myi stong zhes bya bar myi dmyigs so/ /rang bzhin stong pa nyid stong zhes bya ba 'am/ myi stong zhes bya bar myi dmyigs so/ /chos thams cad stong pa nyid stong zhes bya
129b5('bum): ba 'am/ myi stong zhes bya bar myi dmyigs so/ /rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid stong zhes bya ba 'am/ myi stong zhes bya bar myi dmyigs so/ /myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid stong zhes bya ba 'am/ myi stong zhes bya bar myi
129b6('bum): dmyigs so/ /dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid stong zhes bya ba 'am/ myi stong zhes bya bar myi dmyigs so/ /ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid stong zhes bya ba 'am/ myi stong zhes bya bar myi dmyigs so/ /dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid
129b7('bum): stong pa nyid stong zhes bya ba 'am/ myi stong zhes bya bar myi dmyigs so/ /dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi stong zhes bya ba 'am/ myi stong zhes bya bar myi dmyigs so/ /yang dag par spong ba bzhi stong zhes bya ba 'am/
129b8('bum): myi stong zhes bya bar myi dmyigs so/ /rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi stong zhes bya ba 'am/ myi stong zhes bya bar myi dmyigs so/ /dbang po lnga stong zhes bya ba 'am/ myi stong zhes bya bar myi dmyigs so/ /stobs lnga
130a1('bum): stong zhes bya ba 'am/ myi stong zhes bya bar myi dmyigs so/ /byang chub kyi yan lag bdun stong zhes bya ba 'am/ myi stong zhes bya bar myi dmyigs so/ /'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa stong zhes bya ba 'am/ myi stong zhes
130a2('bum): bya bar myi dmyigs so/ /'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi stong zhes bya ba 'am/ myi stong zhes bya bar myi dmyigs so/ /bsam gtan bzhi stong zhes bya ba 'am/ myi stong zhes bya bar myi dmyigs so/ /tshad myed pa bzhi stong
130a3('bum): zhes bya ba 'am/ myi stong zhes bya bar myi dmyigs so/ /gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi stong zhes bya ba 'am/ myi stong zhes bya bar myi dmyigs so/ /rnam par thar pa brgyad stong zhes bya ba 'am/
130a4('bum): myi stong zhes bya bar myi dmyigs so/ /mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu stong zhes bya ba 'am/ myi stong zhes bya bar myi dmyigs so/ /rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan
130a5('bum): ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa stong zhes bya ba 'am/ myi stong zhes bya bar myi dmyigs so/ /mngon par shes pa rnams stong zhes bya ba 'am/ myi stong zhes bya bar myi dmyigs so/ /ting nge
130a6('bum): 'dzin rnams stong zhes bya ba 'am/ myi stong zhes bya bar myi dmyigs so/ /gzungs kyi sgo rnams stong zhes bya ba 'am/ myi stong zhes bya bar myi dmyigs so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs
130a7('bum): bcu stong zhes bya ba 'am/ myi stong zhes bya bar myi dmyigs so/ /myi 'jigs pa bzhi stong zhes bya ba 'am/ myi stong zhes bya bar myi dmyigs so/ /so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi stong zhes bya ba 'am/ myi stong zhes
130a8('bum): bya bar myi dmyigs so/ /snying rje chen po stong zhes bya ba 'am/ myi stong zhes bya bar myi dmyigs so/ /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwo brgyad stong zhes bya ba 'am/ myi stong zhes bya bar myi dmyigs so/ /rgyun tu
130b1('bum): zhugs pa'i 'bras bu stong zhes bya ba 'am/ myi stong zhes bya bar myi dmyigs so/ /lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu stong zhes bya ba 'am/ myi stong zhes bya bar myi dmyigs so/ /phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu stong zhes bya ba
130b2('bum): 'am/ myi stong zhes bya bar myi dmyigs so/ /dgra bcom pa nyid stong zhes bya ba 'am/ myi stong zhes bya bar myi dmyigs so/ /rang byang chub stong zhes bya ba 'am/ myi stong zhes bya bar myi dmyigs so/ /bla na myed pa
130b3('bum): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub stong zhes bya ba 'am/ myi stong zhes bya bar myi dmyigs so/ /'dus byas kyi khams stong zhes bya ba 'am/ myi stong zhes bya bar myi dmyigs so/ /'dus ma byas kyi khams
130b4('bum): stong zhes bya ba 'am/ myi stong zhes bya bar myi dmyigs te/ de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la spyod cing zas sam/ skom 'am/ bzhon pa 'am/ gos sam/
130b5('bum): me tog gam/ phreng ba 'am/ spos sam/ byug pa 'am/ mal cha 'am/ gnas sam/ 'tsho ba 'am/ yo byad dam/ myi'i yo byad gzhan gang yang rung ba sbyin pa gang dang gang gtong ba yang des sbyin pa de stong pa
130b6('bum): zhes bya bar yang dag par rjes su mthong ngo / /gang yongs su gtong ba dang / gang la yongs su gtong ba de yang stong pa zhes bya bar yang dag par rjes su mthong ste/ de la 'jungs pa'i sems sam/ yongs su 'dzin
130b7('bum): pa'i sems kyi skabs myed do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po la/ sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste/ snying po byang
130b8('bum): chub la 'dug gi bar du rnam par rtog pa de dag thams cad myed de/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs
131a1('bum): par sangs rgyas pa la ji ltar 'jungs pa'i thugs sam/ yongs su 'dzin pa'i thugs myi mnga' ba de bzhin du/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa la
131a2('bum): yang 'jungs pa'i sems sam/ yongs su 'dzin pa'i sems skye ba myed do/ /'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i ston pa'o/ /rab 'byor de
131a3('bum): ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su 'dzin to/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na/ byang
131a4('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su 'dzin pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor
131a5('bum): 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi sems kyi go skabs myi 'byed do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni
131a6('bum): 'di ltar des nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sa gang du yongs su sngo ba de lta bu'i nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas sa yang myi dmyigs/ sems de yang myi dmyigs te/ de sems
131a7('bum): dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste/ snying po byang chub la 'dug gi bar du bdag gis kyang srog gcod pa spangs pa yin/ gzhan yang srog gcod pa spong ba la yang dag par skul ba yin/ srog
131a8('bum): gcod pa spong ba'i legs pa rjod pa yin/ gzhan gang gis srog gcod pa spangs pa de dag gi legs pa rjod cing 'thun pas dga' bar byed pa yin/ bdag gis kyang ma byin par len pa spangs pa yin/
131b1('bum): gzhan yang ma byin par len pa spong ba la yang dag par skul ba yin/ ma byin par len pa spong ba'i legs pa rjod pa yin/ gzhan gang gis ma byin par len pa spangs pa de dag gi legs pa rjod cing 'thun pas dga'
131b2('bum): bar byed pa yin/ bdag gis kyang 'dod pas log par g.yem pa spangs pa yin/ gzhan yang 'dod pas log par g.yem pa spong ba la yang dag par skul ba yin/ 'dod pas log par g.yem pa spong ba'i legs
131b3('bum): pa rjod pa yin/ gzhan gang gis 'dod pas log par g.yem pa spangs pa de dag gi legs pa rjod cing 'thun pas dga' bar byed pa yin/ bdag gis kyang brdzun du smra ba spangs pa yin/ gzhan yang brdzun du
131b4('bum): smra ba spong ba la yang dag par skul ba yin/ brdzun du smra ba spong ba'i legs pa rjod pa yin/ gzhan gang gis brdzun du smra ba spangs pa de dag gi legs pa rjod cing 'thun pas dga' bar byed pa yin/ bdag
131b5('bum): gis kyang phra ma spangs pa yin/ gzhan yang phra ma spong ba la yang dag par skul ba yin/ phra ma spong ba'i legs pa rjod pa yin/ gzhan gang gis phra ma spangs pa de dag gi legs pa rjod cing 'thun
131b6('bum): pas dga' bar byed pa yin/ bdag gis kyang zhe gcod pa'i tshig spangs pa yin/ gzhan yang zhe gcod pa'i tshig spong ba la yang dag par skul ba yin/ zhe gcod pa'i tshig spong ba'i legs pa rjod
131b7('bum): pa yin/ gzhan gang gis zhe gcod pa'i tshig spangs pa de dag gi legs pa rjod cing 'thun pas dga' bar byed pa yin/ bdag gis kyang tshig kyal ba spangs pa yin/ gzhan yang tshig kyal ba spong ba
131b8('bum): la yang dag par skul ba yin/ tshig kyal ba spong ba'i legs pa rjod pa yin/ gzhan gang gis tshig kyal ba spangs pa de dag gi legs pa rjod cing 'thun pas dga' bar byed pa yin/ bdag gis kyang chags
132a1('bum): sems spangs pa yin/ gzhan yang chags sems spong ba la yang dag par skul ba yin/ chags sems spong ba'i legs pa rjod pa yin/ gzhan gang gis chags sems spangs pa de dag gi legs pa rjod
132a2('bum): cing 'thun pas dga' bar byed pa yin/ bdag gis kyang gnod sems spangs pa yin/ gzhan yang gnod sems spong ba la yang dag par skul ba yin/ gnod sems spong ba'i legs pa rjod pa yin/ gzhan gang
132a3('bum): gis gnod sems spangs pa de dag gi legs pa rjod cing 'thun pas dga' bar byed pa yin/ bdag gis kyang log par lta ba spangs pa yin/ gzhan yang log par lta ba spong ba la yang dag par skul ba yin/
132a4('bum): log par lta ba spong ba'i legs pa rjod pa yin/ gzhan gang gis log par lta ba spangs pa de dag gi legs pa rjod cing 'thun pas dga' bar byed pa yin te/ tshul khrims des nyan thos sam/ rang sangs rgyas
132a5('bum): kyi chos gang la yang chags par myi 'gyur na/ gzhan man chad lta ci smos te/ rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing / tshul khrims
132a6('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su 'dzin to/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing / bzod pa'i
132a7('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su 'dzin pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing /
132a8('bum): rjes su 'thun pa'i bzod pa skyes te/ de 'di snyam du 'di la chos gang yang skye ba 'am/ 'gag pa 'am/ 'byung ba 'am/ 'jig pa 'am/ 'chi ba 'am/ gshe ba 'am/ 'khyal ba 'am/ gcad pa
132b1('bum): pa 'am/ gtub pa 'am/ brdeg pa myed do snyam pas de la sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste/ snying po byang chub la 'dug gi bar du gal te sems can thams cad drung du lhags nas spyo ste/ bkyal tam/
132b2('bum): rdo dbyug gis brdegs sam/ mtshon gyis btab ste bcad gtubs kyang de la 'di snyam ste/ kye ma chos rnams kyi chos nyid 'di ni ngo mtshar che ste/ 'di la chos gang la yang spyo ba 'am/ bkyal pa 'am/ bcad
132b3('bum): pa 'am/ gtub pa 'am/ brdeg pa 'am/ bcing pa myed do snyam ste/ rab 'byor de ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa
132b4('bum): yongs su 'dzin to/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
132b5('bum): yongs su 'dzin pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing / rdzu 'phrul
132b6('bum): gyi rkang pa bzhi la gnas te/ thabs mkhas pa dang ldan pas/ lus dang sems kyi brtson 'grus skyed de/ 'jig rten gyi khams gcig gam/ 'jig rten gyi khams brgya 'am/
132b7('bum): 'jig rten gyi khams stong ngam/ 'jig rten gyi khams brgya phrag stong ngam/ 'jig rten gyi khams bye ba 'am/ 'jig rten gyi khams bye ba brgya 'am/ 'jig rten gyi khams bye ba stong
132b8('bum): ngam/ 'jig rten gyi khams bye ba brgya phrag stong ngam/ 'jig rten gyi khams bye ba khrag khrig brgya phrag stong dag du song ste/ sems can rnams la chos ston cing / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la rab
133a1('bum): tu 'god do/ /tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la rab tu 'god do/ /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la rab tu 'god do/ /brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la rab tu 'god do/ /bsam gtan gyi pha
133a2('bum): rol tu phyin pa la rab tu 'god do/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la rab tu 'god do/ /byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos thams cad la rab tu 'god do/ /rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la rab tu 'god do/ /lan cig
133a3('bum): phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la rab tu 'god do/ /phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la rab tu 'god do/ /dgra bcom pa nyid la rab tu 'god do/ /rang byang chub la rab tu 'god do/ /bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub
133a4('bum): la rab tu 'god do/ /de yang ci nas kyang 'dus byas kyi khams la rab tu bkod pa yang ma yin/ 'dus ma byas kyi khams la rab tu bkod pa yang ma yin pa de ltar rab tu bkod de/ rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems
133a5('bum): dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su 'dzin to/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems
133a6('bum): dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su 'dzin pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor 'di la byang chub
133a7('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing / de bzhin gshegs pa'i ting nge 'dzin ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi ting nge 'dzin tam/ byang chub sems dpa'i
133a8('bum): ting nge 'dzin kyang rung ste/ ting nge 'dzin gang ji snyed pa de dag thams cad la snyoms par 'jug ste/ ting nge 'dzin de dag la gnas shing / rnam par thar pa brgyad la lugs dang 'thun pa dang / lugs
133b1('bum): dang myi mthun par snyoms par 'jug cing rnam par ldang ngo / /brgyad gang zhe na/ rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gzugs can gyis gzugs rnams mthong ba 'di ni rnam par thar pa dang po'o/ /
133b2('bum): nang gzugs myed pa'i 'du shes dang ldan pas phyi rol gyi gzugs rnams mthong ba 'di ni/ rnam par thar pa gnyis pa'o/ /bzang bar mos pa 'di ni rnam par thar pa gsum pa'o/ /de rnam pa thams cad du gzugs kyi 'du
133b3('bum): shes las yang dag par 'das te/ thogs pa'i 'du shes rnams nub par gyur cing / sna tshogs kyi 'du shes rnams yid la myi byed pas/ nam mkha' mtha' yas so zhes te/ nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched
133b4('bum): la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas pa 'di ni rnam par thar pa bzhi pa'o/ /de rnam pa thams cad du nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/ rnam par shes pa mtha' yas so zhes te/ rnam shes mtha'
133b5('bum): yas skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas pa 'di ni rnam par thar pa lnga pa'o/ /de rnam pa thams cad du rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/ chung zad ma yod do zhes chung zad myed pa'i skye
133b6('bum): mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas pa 'di ni rnam par thar pa drug pa'o/ /de rnam pa thams cad du chung zad myed pa'i skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/ 'du shes myed 'du shes myed myin skye mched la nye bar
133b7('bum): bsgrubs te gnas pa 'di ni rnam par thar pa bdun pa'o/ /de rnam pa thams cad du 'du shes myed 'du shes myed myin skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/ 'du shes dang / tshor ba 'gog pa la nye bar bsgrubs
133b8('bum): te gnas pa 'di ni/ rnam par thar pa brgyad pa ste/ de ltar na rnam par thar pa brgyad po 'di dag la lugs dang 'thun pa dang / lugs dang myi mthun par snyoms par 'jug cing rnam par ldang ngo / /mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms
134a1('bum): par 'jug pa dgu la lugs dang 'thun pa dang / lugs dang myi mthun par snyoms par 'jug cing rnam par ldang ste/ dgu gang zhe na/ rab 'byor 'di la byang chun sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ 'dod
134a2('bum): pas dben pa sdig to myi dge ba'i chos kyis dben pa rtog pa dang bcas pa/ dpyod pa dang bcas pa dben pa las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang bde ba can bsam gtan dang po la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so/ /de rnam par rtog pa dang /
134a3('bum): rnam par dpyod pa nye bar zhi nas nang yongs su dang ste/ sems kyi rgyud gcig tu gyur pas/ rtog pa myed pa/ dpyod pa myed pa'i ting nge 'dzin las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang / bde ba can bsam gtan gnyis pa
134a4('bum): la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so/ /de dga' ba las 'dod chags dang bral bas dran pa dang ldan zhing shes bzhin du btang snyoms su gnas te/ bde ba lus kyis myong la 'phags pa rnams kyis de la dran
134a5('bum): pa dang ldan pa bde ba la rnam par spyod pa btang snyoms pa'o zhes brjod pa ste/ dga' ba myed pa'i bsam gtan gsum pa la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so/ /de bde ba yang spangs/ sdug bsngal yang spangs
134a6('bum): shing yid bde ba dang / yid myi bde ba snga nas kyang nub pas bde ba yang myed sdug bsngal yang myed pa btang snyoms dang dran pas yongs su dag pa bsam gtan bzhi pa la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so/ /
134a7('bum): de rnam pa thams cad du gzugs kyi 'du shes las yang dag par 'das te/ thogs pa'i 'du shes rnams nub par gyur cing / sna tshogs kyi 'du shes yid la myi byed pas/ nam mkha' mtha' yas
134a8('bum): so zhes te/ nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so/ /de rnam pa thams cad du nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/ rnam par shes pa mtha' yas so
134b1('bum): zhes rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so/ /de rnam pa thams cad du rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/ chung zad ma yod do zhes chung zad myed pa'i skye mched la
134b2('bum): nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so/ /de rnam pa thams cad du chung zad myed pa'i skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/ 'du shes myed 'du shes myed myin skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so/ /de rnam pa thams
134b3('bum): cad du 'du shes myed 'du shes myed myin skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/ 'du shes dang tshor ba 'gog pa la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so/ /de ltar mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu po de
134b4('bum): dag la lugs dang 'thun pa dang / lugs dang myi mthun par snyoms par 'jug cing rnam par ldang ngo / /de rnam par thar pa brgyad po de dag dang / mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu po de
134b5('bum): dag rnam par phye zhing seng ge rnam par bsgyings pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par 'jug go/ /rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i ting nge 'dzin seng ge rnam par bsgyings pa de gang zhe na/
134b6('bum): rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ 'dod pas dben pa sdig to myi dge ba'i chos kyis dben pa/ rtog pa dang bcas pa dpyod pa dang bcas pa dben pa las skyes pa'i dga'
134b7('bum): ba dang bde ba can bsam gtan dang po la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so/ /bsam gtan dang po las langs nas/ bsam gtan gnyis pa la snyoms par 'jug go/ /bsam gtan gnyis pa las
134b8('bum): langs nas bsam gtan gsum pa la snyoms par 'jug go/ /bsam gtan gsum pa las langs nas bsam gtan bzhi pa la snyoms par 'jug go/ /bsam gtan bzhi pa las langs
135a1('bum): nas nam mkha' mtha' las skye mched la snyoms par 'jug go/ /nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched las langs nas/ rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched la snyoms par 'jug go/ /rnam shes
135a2('bum): mtha' yas skye mched las langs nas chung zad myed pa'i skye mched la snyoms par 'jug go/ /chung zad myed pa'i skye mched las langs nas 'du shes myed 'du shes myed myin skye mched la snyoms par 'jug go/ /
135a3('bum): 'du shes myed 'du shes myed myin skye mched las langs nas 'gog pa la snyoms par 'jug go/ /'gog pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa las langs nas/ 'du shes myed 'du shes myed myin skye mched la snyoms
135a4('bum): par 'jug go/ /'du shes myed 'du shes myed myin skye mched las langs nas/ chung zad myed pa'i skye mched la snyoms par 'jug go/ /chung zad myed pa'i skye mched las langs nas/ rnam shes
135a5('bum): mtha' yas skye mched la snyoms par 'jug go/ /rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched las langs nas/ nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched la snyoms par 'jug go/ /nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched
135a6('bum): las langs nas/ bsam gtan bzhi pa la snyoms par 'jug go/ /bsam gtan bzhi pa las langs nas/ bsam gtan gsum pa la snyoms par 'jug go/ /bsam gtan gsum pa
135a7('bum): las langs nas/ bsam gtan gnyis pa la snyoms par 'jug go/ /bsam gtan gnyis pa las langs nas/ bsam gtan dang po la snyoms par 'jug ste/ de seng ge rnam par bsgyings
135a8('bum): pa'i ting nge 'dzin 'di rnam par smyin par byas nas/ thod rgal kyi ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par 'jug go/ /rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i ting nge 'dzin thod rgal de gang zhe na/ rab 'byor
135b1('bum): 'di la de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ 'dod pas dben sdig to myi dge ba'i chos kyis dben pa/ rtog pa dang bcas pa/ dpyod pa dang bcas pa/ dben pa las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang / bde ba can
135b2('bum): bsam gtan dang po la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so/ /bsam gtan dang po las langs nas/ bsam gtan gnyis pa las nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so/ /bsam gtan gnyis pa las langs nas/
135b3('bum): bsam gtan gsum pa la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so/ /bsam gtan gsum pa las langs nas/ bsam gtan bzhi pa la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so/ /bsam gtan bzhi pa las langs
135b4('bum): nas/ nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched kyi snyoms par 'jug pa la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so/ /nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched kyi snyoms par 'jug pa las langs nas/ rnam shes
135b5('bum): mtha' yas skye mched kyi snyoms par 'jug pa la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so/ /rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched kyi snyoms par 'jug pa las langs nas/ cung zad myed pa'i skye mched kyi snyoms
135b6('bum): par 'jug pa la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so/ /chung zad myed pa'i skye mched kyi snyoms par 'jug pa las langs nas/ 'du shes myed 'du shes myed myin skye mched kyi snyoms par 'jug pa la nye bar bsgrubs te
135b7('bum): gnas so/ /'du shes myed 'du shes myed myin skye mched kyi snyoms par 'jug pa las langs nas/ 'du shes dang tshor ba 'gog pa la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so/ /'gog pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa las langs
135b8('bum): nas/ bsam gtan dang po la snyoms par 'jug go/ /bsam gtan dang po las langs nas/ 'gog pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa la snyoms par 'jug go/ /'gog pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa las langs nas/
136a1('bum): bsam gtan gnyis pa la snyoms par 'jug go/ /bsam gtan gnyis pa las langs nas/ 'gog pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa la snyoms par 'jug go/ /'gog pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa las
136a2('bum): langs nas/ bsam gtan gsum pa la snyoms par 'jug go/ /bsam gtan gsum pa las langs nas/ 'gog pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa la snyoms par 'jug go/ /'gog pa'i snyoms par
136a3('bum): 'jug pa las langs nas/ bsam gtan bzhi pa la snyoms par 'jug go/ /bsam gtan bzhi pa las langs nas/ 'gog pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa la snyoms par 'jug go/ /'gog
136a4('bum): pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa las langs nas/ nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched kyi snyoms par 'jug pa la snyoms par 'jug go/ /nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched kyi snyoms par 'jug pa las langs
136a5('bum): nas/ 'gog pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa la snyoms par 'jug go/ /'gog pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa las langs nas/ rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched kyi snyoms par 'jug pa la snyoms par
136a6('bum): 'jug go/ /rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched kyi snyoms par 'jug pa las langs nas/ 'gog pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa la snyoms par 'jug go/ /'gog pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa las langs nas/
136a7('bum): chung zad myed pa'i skye mched kyi snyoms par 'jug pa la snyoms par 'jug go/ /chung zad myed pa'i skye mched kyi snyoms par 'jug pa las langs nas/ 'gog pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa la snyoms par
136a8('bum): 'jug go/ /'gog pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa las langs nas/ 'du shes myed 'du shes myed myin skye mched kyi snyoms par 'jug pa la snyoms par 'jug go/ /'du shes myed 'du shes myed myin skye mched kyi snyoms
136b1('bum): par 'jug pa las langs nas/ 'gog pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa la snyoms par 'jug go/ /'gog pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa las langs nas/ mnyam par ma gzhag pa'i sems su byed do/ /mnyam
136b2('bum): par ma gzhag pa'i sems las/ 'gog pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa la snyoms par 'jug go/ /'gog pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa las langs nas/ mnyam par ma gzhag pa'i sems la gnas so/ /
136b3('bum): mnyam par ma gzhag pa'i sems las/ 'du shes myed 'du shes myed myin skye mched kyi snyoms par 'jug go/ /'du shes myed 'du shes myed myin skye mched kyi snyoms par 'jug pa las langs nas/ mnyam
136b4('bum): par ma gzhag pa'i sems la gnas so/ /mnyam par ma gzhag pa'i sems las/ chung zad myed pa'i skye mched kyi snyoms par 'jug pa la snyoms par 'jug go/ /chung zad myed pa'i skye mched las
136b5('bum): langs nas/ mnyam par ma gzhag pa'i sems la gnas so/ /mnyam par ma gzhag pa'i sems las/ rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched la snyoms par 'jug go/ /rnam shes mtha' yas
136b6('bum): skye mched las langs nas/ mnyam par ma gzhag pa'i sems la gnas so/ /mnyam par ma gzhag pa'i sems las/ nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched la snyoms par 'jug go/ /nam mkha'
136b7('bum): mtha' yas skye mched las langs nas/ mnyam par ma gzhag pa'i sems la gnas so/ /mnyam par ma gzhag pa'i sems las/ bsam gtan bzhi pa la snyoms par 'jug go/ /bsam gtan
136b8('bum): bzhi pa las langs nas/ mnyam par ma gzhag pa'i sems su byed do/ /mnyam par ma gzhag pa'i sems las/ bsam gtan gsum pa la snyoms par 'jug go/ /bsam gtan gsum pa las langs
137a1('bum): nas/ mnyam par ma gzhag pa'i sems su byed do/ /mnyam par ma gzhag pa'i sems las/ bsam gtan gnyis pa la snyoms par 'jug go/ /bsam gtan gnyis pa las langs nas/ mnyam
137a2('bum): par ma gzhag pa'i sems su byed do/ /mnyam par ma gzhag pa'i sems las/ bsam gtan dang po la snyoms par 'jug go/ /bsam gtan dang po las langs nas/ mnyam par ma gzhag pa'i sems su
137a3('bum): byed do/ /de thod rgal gyi ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing / chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid rjes su thob par byed de/ rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
137a4('bum): la gnas shing / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su 'dzin to/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa las/ le'u lnga bcu gnyis so// // shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong
137a5('bum): phrag brgya pa/ bam po bcu pa/ tshe dang ldan rab 'byor gyis/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ gang thabs mkhas pa de
137a6('bum): lta bu dang ldan pa de/ yun ring po ji srid gcig nas yang dag par zhugs pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor thabs mkhas pa de lta bu dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa'
137a7('bum): sems dpa' chen po/ de ni bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig grangs myed pa nas yang dag par zhugs pa yin no/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ gang thabs mkhas pa de lta
137a8('bum): bu dang ldan pa des/ sangs rgyas ji snyed cig bsnyen bkur ba lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor thabs mkhas pa de lta bu dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/
137b1('bum): des ni sangs rgyas gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed bsnyen bkur bar rig par bya'o/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang thabs mkhas pa de lta bu dang ldan pa des/
137b2('bum): dge ba'i rtsa ba ci zhig bskrun pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thabs
137b3('bum): mkhas pa dang ldan pa des/ yongs su rdzogs par ma byas pa'i/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i bya ba de lta bu gang yang myed do/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po des
137b4('bum): yongs su rdzogs par ma byas pa'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i bya ba de lta bu gang yang myed do/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po des yongs su rdzogs par ma byas pa'i
137b5('bum): bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i bya ba de lta bu gang yang myed do/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po des yongs su rdzogs par ma byas pa'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i bya ba de
137b6('bum): lta bu gang yang myed do/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po des yongs su rdzogs par ma byas pa'i bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i bya ba de lta bu gang yang myed do/ /byang
137b7('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po des yongs su rdzogs par ma byas pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i bya ba de lta bu gang yang myed do/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub
137b8('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thabs mkhas pa de lta bu dang ldan pa de dag ni ngo mtshar che'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de de bzhin no/ /de de bzhin te/ byang chub sems
138a1('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po thabs mkhas pa de lta bu dang ldan pa de dag ni ngo mtshar che'o/ /rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor dang zla ba'i dkyil 'khor ni gling bzhir/ las
138a2('bum): byed cing gling bzhi'i rjes su 'gro'o/ /gling bzhi'i rjes su 'brang ngo / /rab 'byor de bzhin du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang pha rol tu phyin pa lngar las byed cing / pha rol tu phyin pa lnga'i rjes su 'gro'o/ /
138a3('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa lnga'i rjes su 'brang ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ma bral na/ pha rol tu phyin pa lnga pha rol tu phyin pa'i mying 'thob bo/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang bral
138a4('bum): na/ pha rol tu phyin pa lnga pha rol tu phyin pa'i mying myi 'thob bo/ /rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po dang bral na/ rin po che sna bdun gyis 'khor los sgyur ba'i mying
138a5('bum): myi 'thob bo/ /rab 'byor de bzhin du pha rol tu phyin pa lnga yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang bral na/ pha rol tu phyin pa'i mying myi 'thob bo/ /rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ khyim thab
138a6('bum): myed pa'i bud myed rnams ni/ 'phyon ma pa rnams kyis tshugs par sla ba yin no/ /rab 'byor de bzhin du pha rol tu phyin pa lnga yang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang bral na/ bdud dam
138a7('bum): bdud kyi ris kyi lha rnams kyis tshugs par sla ba yin no/ /rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ khyim thab dpa' bos shin tu bsrungs pa'i bud myed shin tu phun sum tshogs pa'i khyim na 'dug pa ni/
138a8('bum): 'phyon ma pa rnams kyis myi tshugs pa yin no/ /rab 'byor de bzhin du pha rol tu phyin pa lnga yang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ma bral na/ bdud dam bdud kyi ris kyi lha rnams kyis myi tshugs pa yin
138b1('bum): no/ /rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ g.yul du 'gro ba'i skyes bu go cha tshang bar gyon pa mtshon cha thams cad thogs pa ni g.yul ngor 'dug pa'i tshe/ rgyal po zla ba 'am/ phyir rgol ba dang / dgra rnams kyis thub par dka'o/ /
138b2('bum): rab 'byor de bzhin du pha rol tu phyin pa lnga yang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ma bral na/ bdud dam bdud kyi ris kyi lha rnams dang / gang zag lhag pa'i nga rgyal can nam/ byang chub sems dpa' gdol pa rnams kyis
138b3('bum): kyang thub par dka'o/ /rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po la khams kyi rgyal po yod pa rnams ni nang nub nang nub cing rim gror bya ba'i don du drung du 'ong ngo / /rab 'byor de bzhin du pha rol tu
138b4('bum): phyin pa lnga yang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su zin na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid gang na ba der 'dong ngo / /rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ chu klung gang ji snyed cig yod pa de thams cad ni chu klung
138b5('bum): chen po gang ga gang na ba der 'dong ngo / /de dag chu klung gang ga dang 'grogs shing rgya mtsho chen po'i nang du 'dong ngo / /rab 'byor de bzhin du pha rol tu phyin pa lnga yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su zin
138b6('bum): na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid gang na ba der 'dong ngo / /rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ skyes bu'i lag pa g.yas pa ni dgos pa thams cad byed do/ /rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
138b7('bum): yang de bzhin du blta ste/ pha rol tu phyin pa lnga ni lag pa g.yon pa ji lta ba bzhin du blta'o/ /rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ chu klung phra mo rnams kyi chu dang chu klung chen po rnams kyi chu gang ji snyed
138b8('bum): cig yod pa de dag thams cad kyang / rgya mtsho chen por phyin pa 'di lta ste/ lan tsa'i ror ro gcig par 'gyur ro/ /rab 'byor de bzhin du pha rol tu phyin pa lnga yang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas
139a1('bum): yongs su zin na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du phyin pa'i tshe/ 'di lta ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi ror ro gcig par 'gyur ro/ /rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ 'khor los sgyur
139a2('bum): ba'i rgyal po'i dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi dang ldan pa'i mdun du ni/ 'khor lo rin po che 'gro zhing 'dug ste/ gang du 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po zas kyi don du 'dug par gyur pa der 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po'i
139a3('bum): dpung gi tshogs thams cad yongs su tshim par byed cing 'khor lo rin po che de dag gnas nas g.yo ba myed do/ /rab 'byor de bzhin du pha rol tu phyin pa lnga po 'di dag kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su bkri ba
139a4('bum): yin te/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid gang na ba der 'dong zhing / der gnas so/ /der gnas par gyur nas kyang gnas de las myi 'da'o/ /rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ 'khor los sgyur ba'i
139a5('bum): rgyal po'i 'khor lo rin po che de dang / blon po rin po che de dang / khyim bdag rin po che de dang / bud myed rin po che de dang / nor bu rin po che de dang / glang po rin po che de dang / rta rin po che de dag ni dpung
139a6('bum): gi tshogs yan lag bzhi dang ldan pa'i mdun du 'dong ngo / /rab 'byor de bzhin du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang pha rol tu phyin pa lnga po 'di dag gi mdun du 'gro ste/ mdun du song nas kyang rnam
139a7('bum): pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid gang na ba der gnas par 'gyur te/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni 'di snyam du bdag gi phyi bzhin sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa 'brang ngo snyam du myi sems so/ /shes rab kyi pha rol
139a8('bum): tu phyin pa ni 'di snyam du bdag gi phyi bzhin tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'brang ngo snyam du myi sems so/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni 'di snyam du bdag gi phyi bzhin bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa 'brang ngo
139b1('bum): snyam du myi sems so/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni 'di snyam du bdag gi phyi bzhin brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'brang ngo snyam du myi sems so/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni 'di snyam du bdag gi phyi
139b2('bum): bzhin bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'brang ngo snyam du myi sems so/ /sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yang 'di snyam du bdag ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rjes su 'brang ngo snyam du myi sems so/ /tshul
139b3('bum): khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang 'di snyam du bdag ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rjes su 'brang ngo snyam du myi sems so/ /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yang 'di snyam du bdag ni shes rab kyi pha
139b4('bum): rol tu phyin pa'i rjes su 'brang ngo snyam du myi sems so/ /brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang 'di snyam du bdag ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rjes su 'brang ngo snyam du myi sems so/ /bsam gtan gyi
139b5('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa yang 'di snyam du bdag ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rjes su 'brang ngo snyam du myi sems so/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de dag gi rang bzhin ni de yin te/ ci 'ang nus pa myed pa ngo bo nyid kyis
139b6('bum): stong zhing gsol te/ smyig rgyu lta bu'o/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das gal te chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis stong pa lags
139b7('bum): na/ bcom ldan 'das ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin la spyod pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin
139b8('bum): pa la spyod pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa/ bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs
140a1('bum): pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ pha rol tu phyin pa drug la spyod pa'i tshe/
140a2('bum): 'di snyam du kye ma 'jig rten gnas pa 'di ni/ sems phyin ci log tu gyur pa ste/ de dag ni thabs mkhas pas/ 'khor ba nas yongs su gdon par myi nus kyis/ ma la bdag gis sems can de dag gi don du sbyin pa'i
140a3('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod par bya'o/ /tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod par bya'o/ /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod par bya'o/ /brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod par bya'o/ /bsam
140a4('bum): gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod par bya'o/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod par bya'o snyam nas/ de sems can de dag gi don du phyi nang gi dngos po rnams yongs su gtong ste/ de yongs su gtong
140a5('bum): ba'i tshe 'di snyam ste/ bdag gis gang yang yongs su gtang ba myed do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar dngos po 'di dag ni bdag nyid 'jig pa'o snyam ste/ rab 'byor de ltar yongs su rtog pa'i byang chub
140a6('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ /de sems can de dag nyid kyi don du tshul khrims ngan pa'i skabs myi 'byed de/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/
140a7('bum): de ni 'di ltar de 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par zhugs la srog gcod pa byed pa dang / ma byin par len pa dang / 'dod pas
140a8('bum): log par g.yem pa dang / brdzun gyi tshig smra ba dang / phra ma can du 'gyur ba dang / zhe gcod pa'i tshig smra ba dang / tshig kyal pa can du 'gyur ba dang / chags sems can du 'gyur ba dang / gnod
140b1('bum): sems su byed pa dang / log par lta ba can du 'gyur ba dang / yul la smon pa dang / lhar smon pa dang / tshangs par smon pa dang / nyan thos kyi sar smon pa dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi sar smon pa 'di ni bdag la tshul dang
140b2('bum): myi 'dra'o snyam ste/ rab 'byor de ltar yongs su rtog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa yin no/ /de sems can de dag nyid kyi don tu tshig rtsub pa dang /
140b3('bum): brlang bas rtag tu spyos shing / brgyad kyang 'khrug pa'i sems myi skyed/ rdo dbyug dang / bong ba dang / mtshon gyis btab cing bsnun pa dang / lus kyi yan lag gshags sam/ yan lag dang nying lag bcad
140b4('bum): kyang zhe sdang gi sems myi skyed do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar de ni sgra thams cad sgra brnyan lta bur rab tu rtog go/ /gzugs thams cad dbu ba lta bur yongs su rtog go/ /rab 'byor de ltar yongs su rtog
140b5('bum): pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa yin no/ /de sems can de dag nyid kyi don du dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad yongs su btsal ba'i phyir/ le lo'i sems
140b6('bum): myi skyed de/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar de ni 'di snyam du sems te/ mtho ris su skye ba'ang le lo can gyis rnyed par dka' na/ bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub lta ci smos kyis/
140b7('bum): de bas na bdag gis nam bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas kyi bar du brtson 'grus brtsam par bya'o/ /rtag tu brtson pa myi 'dor bar bya'o snyam ste/ rab
140b8('bum): 'byor de ltar yongs su rtog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa yin no/ /de sems can de dag nyid kyi don du sems myi 'khrugs pa yin te/
141a1('bum): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar de ni 'di snyam du sems te/ 'jig rten pa'i bsam gtan du skye ba 'ang sems 'khrugs pas rnyed par dka' na/ bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub lta ci smos
141a2('bum): kyis/ de bas na bdag gis nam bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas kyi bar du bdag gis sems ma 'khrugs par bya'o snyam ste/ rab 'byor de ltar yongs su
141a3('bum): rtog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa yin no/ /de sems can de dag nyid kyi don du nam bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu
141a4('bum): mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas kyi bar du/ nam yang shes rab dang bral bar myi 'gyur te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar de ni 'di snyam du sems te/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la ma
141a5('bum): zhugs par rnam pa gzhan gyis sems can yongs su smyin par bya bar myi nus kyis/ de bas na bdag gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa yin no/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das
141a6('bum): gal te pha rol tu phyin pa rnams la tha dad pa ma mchis na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ji skad du pha rol tu phyin pa lnga'i rab ces bgyi/ gtso 'o zhes bgyi/ mchog ces bgyi/
141a7('bum): dam pa zhes bgyi/ phul zhes bgyi/ gya nom pa zhes bgyi/ bla na myed pa zhes bgyi/ gong na myed pa zhes bgyi/ mnyam pa myed pa zhes bgyi/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa zhes bgyi/ bcom ldan
141a8('bum): 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de de bzhin no/ /de de bzhin te/ rab 'byor pha rol tu phyin pa rnams la ni/ rnam pa tha dad pa gang yang myed de/ gal te shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
141b1('bum): pa myed na ni/ pha rol tu phyin pa lnga po 'di dag gis kyang pha rol tu phyin pa'i mying 'thob par myi 'gyur te/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la rten na/ pha rol tu phyin pa lnga po 'di dag gis kyang pha rol tu phyin pa'i
141b2('bum): mying 'thob par 'gyur ro/ /rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ lus rnam pa tha dad pa rnams ni ri'i rgyal po ri rab kyi drung du phyin na/ kha dog gcig tu 'gyur ro/ /rab 'byor de bzhin du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
141b3('bum): la brten na pha rol tu phyin pa lnga po 'di dag gis pha rol tu phyin pa'i mying 'thob par 'gyur te/ de dag kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du phyin na 'di lta ste/
141b4('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi kha dog gcig par 'gyur te/ 'di ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /'di ni tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /'di ni bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /
141b5('bum): 'di ni brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /'di ni bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /'di ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /zhes bya ba'i khyad par gang yang myed do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/
141b6('bum): 'di ltar de dag la ngo bo nyid myed pas/ de'i phyir khyad par myed do/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ltar chos gang la yang khyad par ma mchis la bye brag ma mchis na/ rjes su thob par
141b7('bum): 'gyur ba ni gang zhig mchis/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa na ci'i slad du pha rol tu phyin pa lnga po de dag gi rab ces bgyi/ gtso bo zhes bgyi/ mchog ces bgyi/ dam pa zhes bgyi/ phul zhes bgyi/
141b8('bum): gya nom pa zhes bgyi/ bla na myed pa zhes bgyi/ gong na myed pa zhes bgyi/ mnyam pa myed pa zhes bgyi/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa zhes bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de de bzhin no/ /
142a1('bum): de de bzhin te/ don rjes su thob par bya ba la/ chos gang yang bye brag dang khyad par myed de/ 'on kyang 'jig rten gyi tha snyad dang brdar bya na/ sems can rnams 'khor ba las yongs su gdon pa'i don du
142a2('bum): sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yang yod do/ /tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang yod do/ /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yang yod do/ /brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang yod do/ /bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu
142a3('bum): phyin pa yang yod do/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang yod do/ /sems can de dag la yang skye ba myed do/ /'chi ba myed do/ /'pho ba myed do/ /sems can myed pas/ chos thams cad myed
142a4('bum): par rig par bya'o/ /rab 'byor rnam grangs des na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni/ pha rol tu phyin pa lnga po 'di dag gi rab ces bya/ gtso bo zhes bya/ mchog ces bya/ dam pa zhes bya/ phul zhes bya/
142a5('bum): gya nom pa zhes bya/ bla na myed pa zhes bya/ gong na myed pa zhes bya/ mnyam pa myed pa zhes bya/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa zhes bya ste/ rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ 'dzam bu'i gling gi bud myed gang ji snyed pa
142a6('bum): de dag gi nang na bud myed rin po che ni rab ces bya/ gtso bo zhes bya/ mchog ces bya/ dam pa zhes bya/ phul zhes bya/ gya nom pa zhes bya/ bla na myed pa zhes bya/ gong na myed pa zhes bya/ mnyam pa myed pa
142a7('bum): zhes bya/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa zhes bya ba bzhin no/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rab ces bgyi ba dang / gtso bo zhes bgyi ba dang / mchog ces bgyi ba dang / dam pa
142a8('bum): zhes bgyi ba dang / phul zhes bgyi ba dang / gya nom pa zhes bgyi ba dang / bla na myed pa zhes bgyi ba dang / gong na myed pa zhes bgyi ba dang / mnyam pa myed pa zhes bgyi ba dang / myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa zhes
142b1('bum): bgyi ba de ci las dgongs/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni/ dge ba'i chos thams cad yongs su bzung zhing myi gnas pa'i tshul gyis
142b2('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid gang na ba der gnas par 'gyur ba'i phyir ro/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa chos gang yang yongs su 'dzin pa 'am/ gtong ba mchis sam/ bcom
142b3('bum): ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ni ma yin te/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni chos gang yang yongs su 'dzin pa 'am/ gtong ba myed do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor de ni 'di ltar chos thams cad yongs
142b4('bum): su bzung ba myed pa dang / gtang ba myed pa'i phyir ro/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa chos thams cad myi 'dzin myi gtong ba lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
142b5('bum): stsal pa/ rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni gzugs yongs su myi 'dzin myi gtong ngo / /rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni tshor ba yongs su myi 'dzin myi gtong ngo / /rab 'byor shes
142b6('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni 'du shes yongs su myi 'dzin myi gtong ngo / /rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni 'du byed yongs su myi 'dzin myi gtong ngo / /rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni
142b7('bum): rnam par shes pa yongs su myi 'dzin myi gtong ngo / /rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni myig yongs su myi 'dzin myi gtong ngo / /rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni rna ba yongs su myi
142b8('bum): 'dzin myi gtong ngo / /rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni sna yongs su myi 'dzin myi gtong ngo / /rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni lce yongs su myi 'dzin myi gtong ngo / /rab 'byor shes
143a1('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni lus yongs su myi 'dzin myi gtong ngo / /rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni yid yongs su myi 'dzin myi gtong ngo / /rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni gzugs yongs

143a3('bum): phyin pa ni ro yongs su myi 'dzin myi gtong ngo / /rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni reg yongs su myi 'dzin myi gtong ngo / /rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni chos yongs su myi 'dzin myi gtong ngo / /rab 'byor shes rab kyi
143a4('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa ni myig gi rnam par shes pa yongs su myi 'dzin myi gtong ngo / /rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni rna ba'i rnam par shes pa yongs su myi 'dzin myi gtong ngo / /rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni

143a7('bum): myi gtong ngo / /rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa yongs su myi 'dzin myi gtong ngo / /rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni sna'i 'dus te reg pa yongs su myi 'dzin myi gtong ngo / /rab
143a8('bum): 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni lce'i 'dus te reg pa yongs su myi 'dzin myi gtong ngo / /rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni lus kyi 'dus te reg pa yongs su myi 'dzin myi gtong ngo / /rab 'byor shes rab
143b1('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni yid kyi 'dus te reg pa yongs su myi 'dzin myi gtong ngo / /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni myig gi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba yongs su myi 'dzin myi gtong ngo / /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni rna ba'i
143b2('bum): 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba yongs su myi 'dzin myi gtong ngo / /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni sna'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba yongs su myi 'dzin myi gtong ngo / /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni lce'i
143b3('bum): 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba yongs su myi 'dzin myi gtong ngo / /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni lus kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba yongs su myi 'dzin myi gtong ngo / /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
143b4('bum): pa ni yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba yongs su myi 'dzin myi gtong ngo / /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni sa'i khams yongs su myi 'dzin myi gtong ngo / /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni chu'i khams
143b5('bum): yongs su myi 'dzin myi gtong ngo / /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni mye'i khams yongs su myi 'dzin myi gtong ngo / /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni rlung gi khams yongs su myi 'dzin myi gtong ngo / /shes rab
143b6('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni nam mkha'i khams yongs su myi 'dzin myi gtong ngo / /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni rnam par shes pa'i khams yongs su myi 'dzin myi gtong ngo / /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni ma
143b7('bum): rig pa yongs su myi 'dzin myi gtong ngo / /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni 'du byed yongs su myi 'dzin myi gtong ngo / /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni rnam par shes pa yongs su myi 'dzin myi gtong ngo / /shes
143b8('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni mying dang gzugs yongs su myi 'dzin myi gtong ngo / /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni skye mched drug yongs su myi 'dzin myi gtong ngo / /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni reg pa yongs su myi
144a1('bum): 'dzin myi gtong ngo / /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni tshor ba yongs su myi 'dzin myi gtong ngo / /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni sred pa yongs su myi 'dzin myi gtong ngo / /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni
144a2('bum): len pa yongs su myi 'dzin myi gtong ngo / /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni srid pa yongs su myi 'dzin myi gtong ngo / /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni skye ba yongs su myi 'dzin myi gtong ngo / /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
144a3('bum): ni rga shi yongs su myi 'dzin myi gtong ngo / /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su myi 'dzin myi gtong ngo / /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs
144a4('bum): su myi 'dzin myi gtong ngo / /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su myi 'dzin myi gtong ngo / /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su myi 'dzin
144a5('bum): myi gtong ngo / /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su myi 'dzin myi gtong ngo / /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su myi 'dzin myi
144a6('bum): gtong ngo / /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni nang stong pa nyid yongs su myi 'dzin myi gtong ngo / /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni phyi stong pa nyid yongs su myi 'dzin myi gtong ngo / /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
144a7('bum): pa ni phyi nang stong pa nyid yongs su myi 'dzin myi gtong ngo / /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni stong pa nyid stong pa nyid yongs su myi 'dzin myi gtong ngo / /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni chen po stong pa nyid yongs su myi
144a8('bum): 'dzin myi gtong ngo / /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni don dam pa stong pa nyid yongs su myi 'dzin myi gtong ngo / /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni 'dus byas stong pa nyid yongs su myi 'dzin myi gtong ngo / /shes rab
144b1('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid yongs su myi 'dzin myi gtong ngo / /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid yongs su myi 'dzin myi gtong ngo / /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni thog ma dang tha ma myed pa
144b2('bum): stong pa nyid yongs su myi 'dzin myi gtong ngo / /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid yongs su myi 'dzin myi gtong ngo / /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni rang bzhin stong pa nyid yongs su myi 'dzin myi gtong ngo / /
144b3('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni chos thams cad stong pa nyid yongs su myi 'dzin myi gtong ngo / /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid yongs su myi 'dzin myi gtong ngo / /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni myi
144b4('bum): dmyigs pa stong pa nyid yongs su myi 'dzin myi gtong ngo / /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid yongs su myi 'dzin myi gtong ngo / /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yongs su myi 'dzin
144b5('bum): myi gtong ngo / /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yongs su myi 'dzin myi gtong ngo / /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi yongs su myi 'dzin myi gtong ngo / /
144b6('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni yang dag par spong ba bzhi yongs su myi 'dzin myi gtong ngo / /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi yongs su myi 'dzin myi gtong ngo / /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni dbang po
144b7('bum): lnga yongs su myi 'dzin myi gtong ngo / /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni stobs lnga yongs su myi 'dzin myi gtong ngo / /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni byang chub kyi yan lag bdun yongs su myi 'dzin myi gtong ngo / /shes
144b8('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni 'phags pa'i lam yan brgyad pa yongs su myi 'dzin myi gtong ngo / /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi yongs su myi 'dzin myi gtong ngo / /shes rab kyi
145a1('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa ni bsam gtan bzhi yongs su myi 'dzin myi gtong ngo / /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni tshad myed pa bzhi yongs su myi 'dzin myi gtong ngo / /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni gzugs myed pa'i
145a2('bum): snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi yongs su myi 'dzin myi gtong ngo / /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni rnam par thar pa brgyad yongs su myi 'dzin myi gtong ngo / /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni mthar kyis gnas pa'i
145a3('bum): snyoms par 'jug pa dgu yongs su myi 'dzin myi gtong ngo / /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa yongs su myi 'dzin myi gtong ngo / /
145a4('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni mngon par shes pa rnams yongs su myi 'dzin myi gtong ngo / /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni ting nge 'dzin rnams yongs su myi 'dzin myi gtong ngo / /shes rab kyi pha

150b5('bum): myi byed pas/ mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba yin no/ /rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa yid la myi byed pas/

155b7('bum): la ma bgyis/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yid la ma bgyis/ phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yid la ma bgyis/ dgra bcom pa nyid yid la ma bgyis/ rang byang chub yid la ma bgyis/ lam gyi rnam pa
155b8('bum): shes pa nyid yid la ma bgyis/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yid la ma bgyis pas/ dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams ji ltar rnam par 'phel bar 'gyur/ dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams rnam par 'phel na yang /
156a1('bum): ji ltar pha rol tu phyin pa drug yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur/ pha rol tu phyin pa drug yongs su ma rdzogs na yang / ji ltar rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid 'thob par 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das
156a2('bum): kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor nam gzugs yid la myi byed/ tshor ba yid la myi byed/ 'du shes yid la myi byed/ 'du byed yid la myi byed/ rnam par shes pa yid la myi byed/ myig yid la myi byed/ rna ba yid
156a3('bum): la myi byed/ sna yid la myi byed/ lce yid la myi byed/ lus yid la myi byed/ yid yid la myi byed/ gzugs yid la myi byed/ sgra yid la myi byed/ dri yid la myi byed/ ro yid la myi byed/ reg yid la
156a4('bum): myi byed/ chos yid la myi byed/ myig gi rnam par shes pa yid la myi byed/ rna ba'i rnam par shes pa yid la myi byed/ sna'i rnam par shes pa yid la myi byed/ lce'i rnam par shes pa yid la myi byed/ lus kyi rnam
156a5('bum): par shes pa yid la myi byed/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa yid la myi byed/ myig gi 'dus te reg pa yid la myi byed/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa yid la myi byed/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa yid la myi byed/ lce'i 'dus
156a6('bum): te reg pa yid la myi byed/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa yid la myi byed/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa yid la myi byed/ myig gi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba yid la myi byed/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i
156a7('bum): tshor ba yid la myi byed/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba yid la myi byed/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba yid la myi byed/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba yid la myi byed/
156a8('bum): yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba yid la myi byed/ sa'i khams yid la myi byed/ chu'i khams yid la myi byed/ mye'i khams yid la myi byed/ rlung gi khams yid la myi byed/ nam mkha'i khams yid la myi byed/
156b1('bum): rnam par shes pa'i khams yid la myi byed/ ma rig pa yid la myi byed/ 'du byed yid la myi byed/ rnam par shes pa yid la myi byed/ mying dang gzugs yid la myi byed/ skye mched drug yid la myi byed/ reg pa yid la myi byed/ tshor
156b2('bum): ba yid la myi byed/ sred pa yid la myi byed/ len pa yid la myi byed/ srid pa yid la myi byed/ skye ba yid la myi byed/ rga shi yid la myi byed/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yid la myi byed/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yid la myi
156b3('bum): byed/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yid la myi byed/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yid la myi byed/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yid la myi byed/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yid la myi byed/ nang stong pa nyid yid la
156b4('bum): myi byed/ phyi stong pa nyid yid la myi byed/ phyi nang stong pa nyid yid la myi byed/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid yid la myi byed/ chen po stong pa nyid yid la myi byed/ don dam pa stong pa nyid yid la myi byed/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid yid la myi byed/
156b5('bum): 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid yid la myi byed/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid yid la myi byed/ thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid yid la myi byed/ dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid yid la myi byed/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid yid la myi byed/
156b6('bum): chos thams cad stong pa nyid yid la myi byed/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid yid la myi byed/ myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid yid la myi byed/ dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid yid la myi byed/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yid la myi byed/ dngos po myed
156b7('bum): pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yid la myi byed/ dran pa nye bar bzhag pa bzhi yid la myi byed/ yang dag par spong ba bzhi yid la myi byed/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi yid la myi byed/ dbang po lnga yid la myi byed/ stobs lnga yid la
156b8('bum): myi byed/ byang chub kyi yan lag bdun yid la myi byed/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa yid la myi byed/ 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi yid la myi byed/ bsam gtan bzhi yid la myi byed/ tshad myed pa bzhi yid la myi

157a2('bum): stong pa nyid dang / mtshan pa myed pa dang / smon pa myed yid la myi byed/ mngon par shes pa rnams yid la myi byed/ ting nge 'dzin rnams yid la myi byed/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams yid la myi byed/ de bzhin gshegs

157a5('bum): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub yid la byed pa de'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams rnam par 'phel bar 'gyur te/ dge ba'i rtsa ba rnam par 'phel bas/
157a6('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa drug yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ /pha rol tu phyin pa drug yongs su rdzogs pas/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur ro/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gzugs yid la ma byas/
157a7('bum): tshor ba yid la ma byas/ 'du shes yid la ma byas/ 'du byed yid la ma byas/ rnam par shes pa yid la ma byas/ myig yid la ma byas/ rna ba yid la ma byas/ sna yid la ma byas/ lce yid la ma byas/

158b2('bum): byang chub yid la ma byas/ bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ci'i slad du zhe na/ de ltar gzugs yid la ma bgyis/ de ltar tshor ba yid

159a7('bum): gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yid la ma bgyis/ de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yid la ma bgyis/ de ltar nang stong pa nyid yid la ma bgyis/ de ltar phyi stong pa nyid yid la ma bgyis/ de ltar phyi nang stong

159b7('bum): mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu yid la ma bgyis/ de ltar rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa yid la ma bgyis/ de ltar mngon par shes pa

160a1('bum): la ma bgyis/ de ltar so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi yid la ma bgyis/ de ltar byams pa chen po yid la ma bgyis/ de ltar snying rje chen po yid la ma bgyis/ de ltar sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwo brgyad yid la ma bgyis/ de ltar rgyun

160a4('bum): ni gal te 'dod pa'i khams sam/ gal te gzugs kyi khams sam/ gal te gzugs myed pa'i khams su 'dre bar 'gyur te/ yid la myi byed pas ni gang du yang 'dre bar myi 'gyur ro/ /rab 'byor byang chub
160a5('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ chos gang dang yang 'dre bar myi bya'o/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes
160a6('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar spyod pa de gang la gnas par 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ltar spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni/ gzugs la

160b7('bum): khams la gnas par myi 'gyur ro/ /mye'i khams la gnas par myi 'gyur ro/ /rlung gi khams la gnas par myi 'gyur ro/ /nam mkha'i khams la gnas par myi 'gyur ro/ /rnam par shes pa'i khams la gnas
160b8('bum): par myi 'gyur ro/ /ma rig pa la gnas par myi 'gyur ro/ /'du byed la gnas par myi 'gyur ro/ /rnam par shes pa la gnas par myi 'gyur ro/ /mying dang gzugs la gnas par myi 'gyur ro/ /skye mched drug la gnas par myi 'gyur
161a1('bum): ro/ /reg pa la gnas par myi 'gyur ro/ /tshor ba la gnas par myi 'gyur ro/ /sred pa la gnas par myi 'gyur ro/ /len pa la gnas par myi 'gyur ro/ /srid pa la gnas par myi 'gyur ro/ /skye ba la gnas par
161a2('bum): myi 'gyur ro/ /rga shi la gnas par myi 'gyur ro/ /sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas par myi 'gyur ro/ /tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas par myi 'gyur ro/ /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas par myi 'gyur
161a3('bum): ro/ /brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas par myi 'gyur ro/ /bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas par myi 'gyur ro/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas par myi 'gyur ro/ /nang stong pa nyid la gnas par
161a4('bum): myi 'gyur ro/ /phyi stong pa nyid la gnas par myi 'gyur ro/ /phyi nang stong pa nyid la gnas par myi 'gyur ro/ /stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la gnas par myi 'gyur ro/ /chen po stong pa nyid la gnas par myi 'gyur ro/ /don dam pa stong pa
161a5('bum): nyid la gnas par myi 'gyur ro/ /'dus byas stong pa nyid la gnas par myi 'gyur ro/ /'dus ma byas stong pa nyid la gnas par myi 'gyur ro/ /mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid la gnas par myi 'gyur ro/ /thog ma dang tha ma myed
161a6('bum): pa stong pa nyid la gnas par myi 'gyur ro/ /dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid la gnas par myi 'gyur ro/ /rang bzhin stong pa nyid la gnas par myi 'gyur ro/ /chos thams cad stong pa nyid la gnas par myi 'gyur ro/ /rang gi mtshan nyid
161a7('bum): stong pa nyid la gnas par myi 'gyur ro/ /myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid la gnas par myi 'gyur ro/ /dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid la gnas par myi 'gyur ro/ /ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la gnas par myi 'gyur ro/ /dngos po myed pa'i
161a8('bum): ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la gnas par myi 'gyur ro/ /dran pa nye bar bzhag pa bzhi la gnas par myi 'gyur ro/ /yang dag par spong ba bzhi la gnas par myi 'gyur ro/ /rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi la gnas par myi 'gyur ro/ /dbang po

161b5('bum): la gnas par myi 'gyur ro/ /myi 'jigs pa bzhi la gnas par myi 'gyur ro/ /so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi la gnas par myi 'gyur ro/ /byams pa chen po la gnas par myi 'gyur ro/ /snying rje chen po la gnas par myi 'gyur ro/ /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwo

161b8('bum): ldan 'das ji'i slad du/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la gnas par myi 'gyur ba lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ mngon par chags pa myed pa'i phyir/ gang la yang gnas par myi 'gyur ro/ /de ci'i
162a1('bum): phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar des gang la mngon par chags par bya ba 'am/ gnas par bya ba'i chos de lta bu gang yang yang dag par rjes su myi mthong ste/ rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems
162a2('bum): dpa' chen po mngon par chags pa myed pa dang gnas pa myed pa'i tshul gyis/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di snyam du sems shing / gang de
162a3('bum): ltar spyod pa dang / de ltar sgom pa de ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la sgom ste/ bdag ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /bdag ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la sgom mo snyam ste/ gal te de ltar 'du shes
162a4('bum): na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las ring du byed pa yin no/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las ring du gyur pa de ni/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa las ring du gyur pa yin/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las

162a6('bum): gyur pa yin/ phyi stong pa nyid las ring du gyur pa yin/ phyi nang stong pa nyid las ring du gyur pa yin/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid las ring du gyur pa yin/ chen po stong pa nyid las ring du gyur pa yin/ don dam pa stong pa nyid

162b1('bum): las ring du gyur pa yin/ myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid las ring du gyur pa yin/ dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid las ring du gyur pa yin/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid las ring du gyur pa yin/ dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid

162b7('bum): gyur pa yin/ myi 'jigs pa bzhi las ring du gyur pa yin/ so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi las ring du gyur pa yin/ byams pa chen po las ring du gyur pa yin/ snying rje chen po las ring du gyur pa yin/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa

163a1('bum): gyur pa yin/ dgra bcom pa nyid las ring du gyur pa yin/ rang byang chub las ring du gyur pa yin/ lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid las ring du gyur pa yin/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid las ring du gyur pa yin/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ shes
163a2('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni/ gang la yang mngon par chags par myi byed de/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mngon par chags pa gang yang myed do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar gang la mngon par chags par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i rang bzhin de la myed de/ rab 'byor
163a3('bum): gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin par 'du shes na yang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de shes rab pha rol tu phyin pa las nyams par 'gyur te/ gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las nyams pa
163a4('bum): de ni chos thams cad las nyams par 'gyur ro/ /gal te yang de 'di snyam du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni pha rol tu phyin pa lnga yongs su 'dzin to snyam na yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las nyams pa yin no/ /
163a5('bum): gal te yang 'di snyam du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni/ nang stong pa nyid yongs su 'dzin to/ /phyi stong pa nyid yongs su 'dzin to/ /phyi nang stong pa nyid yongs su 'dzin to/ /stong pa nyid stong pa nyid yongs su 'dzin to/ /chen po stong pa nyid yongs su 'dzin to/ /

163a8('bum): ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yongs su 'dzin to/ /dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yongs su 'dzin to snyam na yang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las nyams pa yin no/ /gal te yang de 'di snyam du shes rab kyi
163b1('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa ni/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi yongs su 'dzin to snyam na 'ang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las nyams pa yin no/ /gal te yang de 'di snyam du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni

165b7('bum): tshad myed pa bzhi mngon par bsgrub bo/ /gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi mngon par bsgrub bo/ /rnam par thar pa brgyad mngon par bsgrub bo/ /mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu mngon par
