219a4('bum): thams cad kyi mdo dang rgyas pa shes par 'gyur ro/ /rga shi'i de bzhin nyid shes na/ chos thams cad kyi mdo dang rgyas pa shes par 'gyur ro/ /sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i de bzhin nyid shes na/ chos
219a5('bum): thams cad kyi mdo dang rgyas pa shes par 'gyur ro/ /tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i de bzhin nyid shes na/ chos thams cad kyi mdo dang rgyas pa shes par 'gyur ro/ /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i de bzhin nyid shes
219a6('bum): na/ chos thams cad kyi mdo dang rgyas pa shes par 'gyur ro/ /brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i de bzhin nyid shes na/ chos thams cad kyi mdo dang rgyas pa shes par 'gyur ro/ /bsam gtan pha rol tu phyin pa'i de bzhin nyid shes
219a7('bum): na/ chos thams cad kyi mdo dang rgyas pa shes par 'gyur ro/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i de bzhin nyid shes na/ chos thams cad kyi mdo dang rgyas pa shes par 'gyur ro/ /nang stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid shes na/ chos thams cad
219a8('bum): kyi mdo dang rgyas pa shes par 'gyur ro/ /phyi stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid shes na/ chos thams cad kyi mdo dang rgyas pa shes par 'gyur ro/ /phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid shes na/ chos thams cad kyi mdo dang rgyas
219b1('bum): dang rgyas pa shes par 'gyur ro/ /dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid shes na/ chos thams cad kyi mdo dang rgyas pa shes par 'gyur ro/ /yang dag par spong ba rnams kyi de bzhin nyid shes na/ chos thams
219b2('bum): cad kyi mdo dang rgyas pa shes par 'gyur ro/ /rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid shes na/ chos thams cad kyi mdo dang rgyas pa shes par 'gyur ro/ /dbang po rnams kyi de bzhin nyid shes na/ chos thams
219b3('bum): cad kyi mdo dang rgyas pa shes par 'gyur ro/ /stobs rnams kyi de bzhin nyid shes na/ chos thams cad kyi mdo dang rgyas pa shes par 'gyur ro/ /byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyi de bzhin nyid shes na/ chos
219b4('bum): thams cad kyi mdo dang rgyas pa shes par 'gyur ro/ /'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i de bzhin nyid shes na/ chos thams cad kyi mdo dang rgyas pa shes par 'gyur ro/ /'phags pa'i bden
219b5('bum): pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid shes na/ chos thams cad kyi mdo dang rgyas pa shes par 'gyur ro/ /bsam gtan rnams kyi de bzhin nyid shes na/ chos thams cad kyi mdo dang rgyas pa shes par 'gyur ro/ /
219b6('bum): tshad myed pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid shes na/ chos thams cad kyi mdo dang rgyas pa shes par 'gyur ro/ /gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid shes na/ chos thams cad kyi
219b7('bum): mdo dang rgyas pa shes par 'gyur ro/ /rnam par thar pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid shes na/ chos thams cad kyi mdo dang rgyas pa shes par 'gyur ro/ /mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams
219b8('bum): kyi de bzhin nyid shes na/ chos thams cad kyi mdo dang rgyas pa shes par 'gyur ro/ /rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa'i de bzhin nyid shes na/ chos thams
220a1('bum): cad kyi mdo dang rgyas pa shes par 'gyur ro/ /mngon par shes pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid shes na/ chos thams cad kyi mdo dang rgyas pa shes par 'gyur ro/ /ting nge 'dzin rnams kyi de bzhin nyid
220a2('bum): shes na/ chos thams cad kyi mdo dang rgyas pa shes par 'gyur ro/ /gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyi de bzhin nyid shes na/ chos thams cad kyi mdo dang rgyas pa shes par 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i
220a3('bum): stobs rnams kyi de bzhin nyid shes na/ chos thams cad kyi mdo dang rgyas pa shes par 'gyur ro/ /myi 'jigs pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid shes na/ chos thams cad kyi mdo dang rgyas pa shes par 'gyur ro/ /
220a4('bum): so so yang dag par rig pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid shes na/ chos thams cad kyi mdo dang rgyas pa shes par 'gyur ro/ /byams pa chen po'i de bzhin nyid shes na/ chos thams cad kyi mdo dang rgyas pa shes par
220a5('bum): 'gyur ro/ /snying rje chen po'i de bzhin nyid shes na/ chos thams cad kyi mdo dang rgyas pa shes par 'gyur ro/ /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid shes na/ chos thams cad kyi mdo
220a6('bum): dang rgyas pa shes par 'gyur ro/ /rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'i de bzhin nyid shes na/ chos thams cad kyi mdo dang rgyas pa shes par 'gyur ro/ /lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i de bzhin nyid shes na/ chos
220a7('bum): thams cad kyi mdo dang rgyas pa shes par 'gyur ro/ /phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i de bzhin nyid shes na/ chos thams cad kyi mdo dang rgyas pa shes par 'gyur ro/ /dgra bcom pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid shes
220a8('bum): na/ chos thams cad kyi mdo dang rgyas pa shes par 'gyur ro/ /rang byang chub kyi de bzhin nyid shes na/ chos thams cad kyi mdo dang rgyas pa shes par 'gyur ro/ /lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid
220b1('bum): shes na/ chos thams cad kyi mdo dang rgyas pa shes par 'gyur ro/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid shes na/ chos thams cad kyi mdo dang rgyas pa shes par 'gyur ro/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das gzugs
220b2('bum): kyi de bzhin nyid ji lta bu lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de bzhin nyid gang la skye ba myi dmyigs/ 'jig pa myi dmyigs/ gnas pa las gzhan du 'gyur ba myi dmyigs pa 'di ni gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid de/
220b3('bum): de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bslab par bya'o/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid ji lta bu lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de bzhin nyid gang la skye
220b4('bum): ba myi dmyigs/ 'jig pa myi dmyigs/ gnas pa las gzhan du 'gyur ba myi dmyigs pa 'di ni tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid de/ de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bslab par bya'o/ /
220b5('bum): gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ 'du shes kyi de bzhin nyid ji lta bu lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de bzhin nyid gang la skye ba myi dmyigs/ 'jig pa myi dmyigs/ gnas pa las
220b6('bum): gzhan du 'gyur ba myi dmyigs pa 'di ni 'du shes kyi de bzhin nyid de/ de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bslab par bya'o/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'du byed kyi de bzhin nyid ji lta bu
220b7('bum): lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de bzhin nyid gang la skye ba myi dmyigs/ 'jig pa myi dmyigs/ gnas pa las gzhan du 'gyur ba myi dmyigs pa 'di ni 'du byed kyi de bzhin
220b8('bum): nyid de/ de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bslab par bya'o/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid ji lta bu lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis
221a1('bum): bka' stsal pa/ de bzhin nyid gang la skye ba myi dmyigs/ 'jig pa myi dmyigs/ gnas pa las gzhan du 'gyur ba myi dmyigs pa 'di ni/ rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid de/ de la byang chub
221a2('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bslab par bya'o/ /gsol pa bcom ldan 'das myig gi de bzhin nyid ji lta bu lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de bzhin nyid gang la skye ba
221a3('bum): myi dmyigs/ 'jig pa myi dmyigs/ gnas pa las gzhan du 'gyur ba myi dmyigs pa 'di ni myig gi de bzhin nyid de/ de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bslab par bya'o/ /gsol pa/ bcom
221a4('bum): ldan 'das rna ba'i de bzhin nyid ji lta bu lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de bzhin nyid gang la skye ba myi dmyigs/ 'jig pa myi dmyigs/ gnas pa las gzhan du 'gyur ba myi
221a5('bum): dmyigs pa 'di ni rna ba'i de bzhin nyid de/ de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bslab par bya'o/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ sna'i de bzhin nyid ji lta bu lags/ bcom ldan
221a6('bum): 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de bzhin nyid gang la skye ba myi dmyigs/ 'jig pa myi dmyigs/ gnas pa las gzhan du 'gyur ba myi dmyigs pa 'di ni/ sna'i de bzhin nyid de/ de la byang chub sems
221a7('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bslab par bya'o/ /gsol pa bcom ldan 'das lce'i de bzhin nyid ji lta bu lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de bzhin nyid gang la skye ba myi dmyigs/
221a8('bum): 'jig pa myi dmyigs/ gnas pa las gzhan du 'gyur ba myi dmyigs pa 'di ni lce'i de bzhin nyid de/ de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bslab par bya'o/ /gsol pa/
221b1('bum): bcom ldan 'das lus kyi de bzhin nyid ji lta bu lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de bzhin nyid gang la skye ba myi dmyigs/ 'jig pa myi dmyigs/ gnas pa las gzhan du
221b2('bum): 'gyur ba myi dmyigs pa 'di ni lus kyi de bzhin nyid de/ de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bslab par bya'o/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das yid kyi de bzhin nyid ji lta bu
221b3('bum): lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de bzhin nyid gang la skye ba myi dmyigs/ 'jig pa myi dmyigs/ gnas pa las gzhan du 'gyur ba myi dmyigs pa 'di ni/ yid
221b4('bum): kyi de bzhin nyid de/ de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bslab par bya'o/ /gsol pa bcom ldan 'das gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid ji lta bu lags/ bcom
221b5('bum): ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de bzhin nyid gang la skye ba myi dmyigs/ 'jig pa myi dmyigs/ gnas pa las gzhan du 'gyur ba myi dmyigs pa 'di ni/ gzugs kyi
221b6('bum): de bzhin nyid de/ de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bslab par bya'o/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das sgra'i de bzhin nyid ji lta bu lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis
221b7('bum): bka' stsal pa/ de bzhin nyid gang la skye ba myi dmyigs/ 'jig pa myi dmyigs/ gnas pa las gzhan du 'gyur ba myi dmyigs pa 'di ni/ sgra'i de bzhin nyid de/ de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bslab par bya'o/ /
221b8('bum): gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das dri'i de bzhin nyid ji lta bu lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de bzhin nyid gang la skye ba myi dmyigs/ 'jig pa myi dmyigs/ gnas pa las gzhan du 'gyur ba myi dmyigs pa 'di ni/ dri'i de bzhin nyid de/
222a1('bum): de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bslab par bya'o/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ro'i de bzhin nyid ji lta bu lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de bzhin nyid gang
222a2('bum): la skye ba myi dmyigs/ 'jig pa myi dmyigs/ gnas pa las gzhan du 'gyur ba myi dmyigs pa 'di ni ro'i de bzhin nyid de/ de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bslab par bya'o/ /gsol pa/
222a3('bum): bcom ldan 'das reg gi de bzhin nyid ji lta bu lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de bzhin nyid gang la skye ba myi dmyigs/ 'jig pa myi dmyigs/ gnas pa las gzhan du 'gyur ba myi dmyigs
222a4('bum): pa 'di ni/ reg gi de bzhin nyid de/ de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bslab par bya'o/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das chos kyi de bzhin nyid ji lta bu lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis
222a5('bum): bka' stsal pa/ de bzhin nyid gang la skye ba myi dmyigs/ 'jig pa myi dmyigs/ gnas pa las gzhan du 'gyur ba myi dmyigs pa 'di ni/ chos kyi de bzhin nyid de/ de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
222a6('bum): chen pos bslab par bya'o/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das myig gi rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid ji lta bu lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de bzhin nyid gang la skye ba myi dmyigs/ 'jig
222a7('bum): pa myi dmyigs/ gnas pa las gzhan du 'gyur ba myi dmyigs pa 'di ni/ myig gi rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid de/ de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bslab par bya'o/ /gsol pa/
222a8('bum): bcom ldan 'das rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid ji lta bu lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de bzhin nyid gang la skye ba myi dmyigs/ 'jig pa myi dmyigs/ gnas pa las gzhan du
222b1('bum): 'gyur ba myi dmyigs pa 'di ni/ rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid de/ de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bslab par bya'o/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das sna'i rnam par shes pa'i
222b2('bum): de bzhin nyid ji lta bu lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de bzhin nyid gang la skye ba myi dmyigs/ 'jig pa myi dmyigs/ gnas pa las gzhan du 'gyur ba myi dmyigs pa 'di ni/ sna'i rnam par
222b3('bum): shes pa'i de bzhin nyid de/ de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bslab par bya'o/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das lce'i rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid ji lta bu lags/ bcom ldan
222b4('bum): 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de bzhin nyid gang la skye ba myi dmyigs/ 'jig pa myi dmyigs/ gnas pa las gzhan du 'gyur ba myi dmyigs pa 'di ni/ lce'i rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid de/ de la byang chub
222b5('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bslab par bya'o/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid ji lta bu lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de bzhin nyid
222b6('bum): gang la skye ba myi dmyigs/ 'jig pa myi dmyigs/ gnas pa las gzhan du 'gyur ba myi dmyigs pa 'di ni/ lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid de/ de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos
222b7('bum): bslab par bya'o/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid ji lta bu lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de bzhin nyid gang la skye ba myi dmyigs/ 'jig pa myi dmyigs/
222b8('bum): gnas pa las gzhan du 'gyur ba myi dmyigs pa 'di ni yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid de/ de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bslab par bya'o/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das myig gi 'dus
223a1('bum): te reg pa'i de bzhin nyid ji lta bu lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de bzhin nyid gang la skye ba myi dmyigs/ 'jig pa myi dmyigs/ gnas pa las gzhan du 'gyur ba myi dmyigs pa 'di ni/ myig gi
223a2('bum): 'dus te reg pa'i de bzhin nyid de/ de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bslab par bya'o/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i de bzhin nyid ji lta bu lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis
223a3('bum): bka' stsal pa/ de bzhin nyid gang la skye ba myi dmyigs/ 'jig pa myi dmyigs/ gnas pa las gzhan du 'gyur ba myi dmyigs pa 'di ni/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i de bzhin nyid de/ de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
223a4('bum): pos bslab par bya'o/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i de bzhin nyid ji lta bu lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de bzhin nyid gang la skye ba myi dmyigs/ 'jig pa myi dmyigs/ gnas pa la
223a5('bum): gzhan du 'gyur ba myi dmyigs pa 'di ni/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i de bzhin nyid de/ de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bslab par bya'o/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i de bzhin nyid ji lta bu lags/
223a6('bum): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de bzhin nyid gang la skye ba myi dmyigs/ 'jig pa myi dmyigs/ gnas pa las gzhan du 'gyur ba myi dmyigs pa 'di ni lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i de bzhin nyid de/ de la byang chub sems dpa'
223a7('bum): sems dpa' chen pos bslab par bya'o/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i de bzhin nyid ji lta bu lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de bzhin nyid gang la skye ba myi dmyigs/ 'jig pa myi
223a8('bum): dmyigs/ gnas pa las gzhan du 'gyur ba myi dmyigs pa 'di ni/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i de bzhin nyid de/ de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bslab par bya'o/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das yid kyi 'dus
223b1('bum): te reg pa'i de bzhin nyid ji lta bu lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de bzhin nyid gang la skye ba myi dmyigs/ 'jig pa myi dmyigs/ gnas pa las gzhan du 'gyur ba myi dmyigs pa 'di ni/ yid kyi 'dus te reg
223b2('bum): pa'i de bzhin nyid de/ de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bslab par bya'o/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid ji lta bu lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis
223b3('bum): bka' stsal pa/ de bzhin nyid gang la skye ba myi dmyigs/ 'jig pa myi dmyigs/ gnas pa las gzhan du 'gyur ba myi dmyigs pa 'di ni/ myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid de/ de la byang chub sems
223b4('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bslab par bya'o/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid ji lta bu lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de bzhin nyid gang
223b5('bum): la skye ba myi dmyigs/ 'jig pa myi dmyigs/ gnas pa las gzhan du 'gyur ba myi dmyigs pa 'di ni/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid de/ de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bslab
223b6('bum): par bya'o/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid ji lta bu lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de bzhin nyid gang la skye ba myi dmyigs/ 'jig pa
223b7('bum): myi dmyigs/ gnas pa las gzhan du 'gyur ba myi dmyigs pa 'di ni/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid de/ de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bslab par bya'o/ /gsol pa/
223b8('bum): bcom ldan 'das/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid ji lta bu lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de bzhin nyid gang la skye ba myi dmyigs/ 'jig pa myi
224a1('bum): dmyigs/ gnas pa las gzhan du 'gyur ba myi dmyigs pa 'di ni/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid de/ de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bslab par
224a2('bum): bya'o/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid ji lta bu lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de bzhin nyid gang la skye ba myi dmyigs/ 'jig pa

224a4('bum): pa/ bcom ldan 'das yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid ji lta bu lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de bzhin nyid gang la skye ba myi dmyigs/ 'jig pa myi dmyigs/
224a5('bum): gnas pa las gzhan du 'gyur ba myi dmyigs pa 'di ni/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid de/ de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bslab par bya'o/ /gsol pa/
224a6('bum): bcom ldan 'das sa'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid ji lta bu lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de bzhin nyid gang la skye ba myi dmyigs/ 'jig pa myi dmyigs/ gnas pa las gzhan du
224a7('bum): 'gyur ba myi dmyigs pa 'di ni/ sa'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid de/ de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bslab par bya'o/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das chu'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid ji
224a8('bum): lta bu lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de bzhin nyid gang la skye ba myi dmyigs/ 'jig pa myi dmyigs/ gnas pa las gzhan du 'gyur ba myi dmyigs pa 'di ni/ chu'i khams
224b1('bum): kyi de bzhin nyid de/ de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bslab par bya'o/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das mye'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid ji lta bu lags/ bcom ldan 'das
224b2('bum): kyis bka' stsal pa/ de bzhin nyid gang la skye ba myi dmyigs/ 'jig pa myi dmyigs/ gnas pa las gzhan du 'gyur ba myi dmyigs pa 'di ni/ mye'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid de/ de la byang chub
224b3('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bslab par bya'o/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das rlung gi khams kyi de bzhin nyid ji lta bu lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de bzhin
224b4('bum): nyid gang la skye ba myi dmyigs/ 'jigs pa myi dmyigs/ gnas pa las gzhan du 'gyur ba myi dmyigs pa 'di ni/ rlung gi khams kyi de bzhin nyid de/ de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
224b5('bum): chen pos bslab par bya'o/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das nam mkha'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid ji lta bu lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de bzhin nyid gang la skye ba myi
224b6('bum): dmyigs/ 'jig pa myi dmyigs/ gnas pa las gzhan du 'gyur ba myi dmyigs pa 'di ni/ nam mkha'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid de/ de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos

224b8('bum): la skye ba myi dmyigs/ 'jig pa myi dmyigs/ gnas pa las gzhan du 'gyur ba myi dmyigs pa 'di ni/ rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid de/ de la byang chub sems dpa' sems
225a1('bum): dpa' chen pos bslab par bya'o/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ma rig pa'i de bzhin nyid ji lta bu lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de bzhin nyid gang la skye ba myi
225a2('bum): dmyigs/ 'jig pa myi dmyigs/ gnas pa las gzhan du 'gyur ba myi dmyigs pa 'di ni/ ma rig pa'i de bzhin nyid de/ de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bslab par bya'o/ /
225a3('bum): gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ 'du byed kyi de bzhin nyid ji lta bu lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de bzhin nyid gang la skye ba myi dmyigs/ 'jig pa myi dmyigs/ gnas pa
225a4('bum): las gzhan du 'gyur ba myi dmyigs pa 'di ni/ 'du byed kyi de bzhin nyid de/ de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bslab par bya'o/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das rnam par shes pa'i de
225a5('bum): bzhin nyid ji lta bu lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de bzhin nyid gang la skye ba myi dmyigs/ 'jig pa myi dmyigs/ gnas pa las gzhan du 'gyur ba myi dmyigs pa 'di ni/ rnam
225a6('bum): par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid de/ de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bslab par bya'o/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ mying dang gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid ji lta bu lags/
225a7('bum): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de bzhin nyid gang la skye ba myi dmyigs/ 'jig pa myi dmyigs/ gnas pa las gzhan du 'gyur ba myi dmyigs pa 'di ni/ mying dang gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid de/
225a8('bum): de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bslab par bya'o/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ skye mched drug gi de bzhin nyid ji lta bu lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
225b1('bum): stsal pa/ de bzhin nyid gang la skye ba myi dmyigs/ 'jig pa myi dmyigs/ gnas pa las gzhan du 'gyur ba myi dmyigs pa 'di ni/ skye mched drug gi de bzhin nyid de/ de la byang chub
225b2('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bslab par bya'o/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ reg pa'i de bzhin nyid ji lta bu lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de bzhin

225b6('bum): pa bcom ldan 'das/ sred pa'i de bzhin nyid ji lta bu lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de bzhin nyid gang la skye ba myi dmyigs/ 'jig pa myi dmyigs/ gnas pa
225b7('bum): las gzhan du 'gyur ba myi dmyigs pa 'di ni/ sred pa'i de bzhin nyid de/ de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bslab par bya'o/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das len pa'i de
225b8('bum): bzhin nyid ji lta bu lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de bzhin nyid gang la skye ba myi dmyigs/ 'jig pa myi dmyigs/ gnas pa las gzhan du 'gyur ba myi dmyigs pa 'di
226a1('bum): ni len pa'i de bzhin nyid de/ de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bslab par bya'o/ /gsol pa bcom ldan 'das/ srid pa'i de bzhin nyid ji lta bu lags/

226a5('bum): dpa' chen pos bslab par bya'o/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das rga shi'i de bzhin nyid ji lta bu lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de bzhin nyid gang la skye ba myi
226a6('bum): dmyigs/ 'jig pa myi dmyigs/ gnas pa las gzhan du 'gyur ba myi dmyigs pa 'di ni/ rga shi'i de bzhin nyid de/ de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bslab par
226a7('bum): bya'o/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i de bzhin nyid ji lta bu lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de bzhin nyid gang la skye ba myi dmyigs/
226a8('bum): 'jig pa myi dmyigs/ gnas pa las gzhan du 'gyur ba myi dmyigs pa 'di ni/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i de bzhin nyid de/ de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bslab par
226b1('bum): bya'o/ /gsol pa bcom ldan 'das tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i de bzhin nyid ji lta bu lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de bzhin nyid gang la skye ba myi dmyigs/
226b2('bum): 'jig pa myi dmyigs/ gnas pa las gzhan du 'gyur ba myi dmyigs pa 'di ni/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i de bzhin nyid de/ de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bslab par
226b3('bum): bya'o/ /gsol pa bcom ldan 'das/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i de bzhin nyid ji lta bu lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de bzhin nyid gang la skye ba myi dmyigs/ 'jig
226b4('bum): pa myi dmyigs/ gnas pa las gzhan du 'gyur ba myi dmyigs pa 'di ni/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i de bzhin nyid de/ de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bslab par bya'o/ /
226b5('bum): gsol pa bcom ldan 'das brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i de bzhin nyid ji lta bu lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de bzhin nyid gang la skye ba myi dmyigs/ 'jig pa
226b6('bum): myi dmyigs gnas pa las gzhan du 'gyur ba myi dmyigs pa 'di ni/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i de bzhin nyid de/ de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bslab par bya'o/ /gsol pa bcom ldan 'das bsam gtan gyi
226b7('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa'i de bzhin nyid ji lta bu lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de bzhin nyid gang la skye ba myi dmyigs/ 'jig pa myi dmyigs/ gnas pa las gzhan
226b8('bum): du 'gyur ba myi dmyigs pa 'di ni/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i de bzhin nyid de/ de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bslab par bya'o/ /gsol pa bcom ldan 'das
227a1('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i de bzhin nyid ji lta bu lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de bzhin nyid gang la skye ba myi dmyigs/ 'jig pa myi dmyigs/
227a2('bum): gnas pa las gzhan du 'gyur ba myi dmyigs pa 'di ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i de bzhin nyid de/ de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bslab par bya'o/ /gsol pa/ bcom
227a3('bum): ldan 'das nang stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid ji lta bu lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de bzhin nyid gang la skye ba myi dmyigs/ 'jig pa myi dmyigs/ gnas pa las gzhan du 'gyur
227a4('bum): ba myi dmyigs pa 'di ni/ nang stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid de/ de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bslab par bya'o/ /gsol pa bcom ldan 'das/ phyi stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid ji lta bu lags/
227a5('bum): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de bzhin nyid gang la skye ba myi dmyigs/ 'jig pa myi dmyigs/ gnas pa las gzhan du 'gyur ba myi dmyigs pa 'di ni/ phyi stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin
227a6('bum): nyid de/ de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bslab par bya'o/ /gsol pa bcom ldan 'das/ phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid ji lta bu lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis
227a7('bum): bka' stsal pa/ de bzhin nyid gang la skye ba myi dmyigs/ 'jig pa myi dmyigs/ gnas pa las gzhan du 'gyur ba myi dmyigs pa 'di ni/ phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid de/ de la byang chub
227a8('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bslab par bya'o/ /gsol pa bcom ldan 'das/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid ji lta bu lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de bzhin
227b1('bum): nyid gang la skye ba myi dmyigs/ 'jig pa myi dmyigs/ gnas pa las gzhan du 'gyur ba myi dmyigs pa 'di ni/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid de/ de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
227b2('bum): pos bslab par bya'o/ /gsol pa bcom ldan 'das/ chen po stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid ji lta bu lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de bzhin nyid gang la skye ba myi dmyigs/ 'jig pa myi
227b3('bum): dmyigs/ gnas pa las gzhan du 'gyur ba myi dmyigs pa 'di ni/ chen po stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid de/ de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bslab par bya'o/ /gsol pa bcom ldan 'das
227b4('bum): don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid ji lta bu lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de bzhin nyid gang la skye ba myi dmyigs/ 'jig pa myi dmyigs/ gnas pa las gzhan du 'gyur ba myi
227b5('bum): dmyigs pa 'di ni/ don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid de/ de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bslab par bya'o/ /gsol pa bcom ldan 'das/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin
227b6('bum): nyid ji lta bu lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de bzhin nyid gang la skye ba myi dmyigs/ 'jig pa myi dmyigs/ gnas pa las gzhan du 'gyur ba myi dmyigs pa 'di ni/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin
227b7('bum): nyid de/ de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bslab par bya'o/ /gsol pa bcom ldan 'das/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid ji lta bu lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de bzhin nyid
227b8('bum): gang la skye ba myi dmyigs/ 'jig pa myi dmyigs/ gnas pa las gzhan du 'gyur ba myi dmyigs pa 'di ni/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid de/ de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bslab par bya'o/ /gsol
228a1('bum): pa bcom ldan 'das mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid ji lta bu lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de bzhin nyid gang la skye ba myi dmyigs/ 'jig pa myi dmyigs/
228a2('bum): gnas pa las gzhan du 'gyur ba myi dmyigs pa 'di ni/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid de/ de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bslab par bya'o/ /gsol pa bcom ldan
228a3('bum): 'das thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid ji lta bu lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de bzhin nyid gang la skye ba myi dmyigs/ 'jig pa myi dmyigs/ gnas pa las gzhan
228a4('bum): du 'gyur ba myi dmyigs pa 'di ni/ thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid de/ de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bslab par bya'o/ /gsol pa bcom ldan 'das dor ba myed pa
228a5('bum): stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid ji lta bu lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de bzhin nyid gang la skye ba myi dmyigs/ 'jig pa myi dmyigs/ gnas pa las gzhan du 'gyur ba myi dmyigs pa
228a6('bum): 'di ni/ dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid de/ de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bslab par bya'o/ /gsol pa bcom ldan 'das rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid ji lta bu lags/ bcom
228a7('bum): ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de bzhin nyid gang la skye ba myi dmyigs/ 'jig pa myi dmyigs/ gnas pa las gzhan du 'gyur ba myi dmyigs pa 'di ni/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid de/ de la byang chub sems
228a8('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bslab par bya'o/ /gsol pa bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid ji lta bu lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de bzhin nyid gang la skye ba myi dmyigs/
228b1('bum): 'jig pa myi dmyigs/ gnas pa las gzhan du 'gyur ba myi dmyigs pa 'di ni/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid de/ de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bslab par bya'o/ /gsol
228b2('bum): pa bcom ldan 'das rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid ji lta bu lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de bzhin nyid gang la skye ba myi dmyigs/ 'jig pa myi dmyigs/ gnas pa las
228b3('bum): gzhan du 'gyur ba myi dmyigs pa 'di ni/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid de/ de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bslab par bya'o/ /gsol pa bcom ldan 'das myi dmyigs pa
228b4('bum): stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid ji lta bu lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de bzhin nyid gang la skye ba myi dmyigs/ 'jig pa myi dmyigs/ gnas pa las gzhan du 'gyur ba myi dmyigs pa 'di ni/ myi
228b5('bum): dmyigs pa stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid de/ de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bslab par bya'o/ /gsol pa bcom ldan 'das dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid ji lta bu lags/ bcom ldan
228b6('bum): 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de bzhin nyid gang la skye ba myi dmyigs/ 'jig pa myi dmyigs/ gnas pa las gzhan du 'gyur ba myi dmyigs pa 'di ni/ dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid de/ de la byang chub sems dpa'
228b7('bum): sems dpa' chen pos bslab par bya'o/ /gsol pa bcom ldan 'das ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid ji lta bu lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de bzhin nyid gang la skye ba myi dmyigs/ 'jig pa myi dmyigs/
228b8('bum): gnas pa las gzhan du 'gyur ba myi dmyigs pa 'di ni/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid de/ de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bslab par bya'o/ /gsol pa bcom ldan 'das dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong
229a1('bum): pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid ji lta bu lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de bzhin nyid gang la skye ba myi dmyigs/ 'jig pa myi dmyigs/ gnas pa las gzhan du 'gyur ba myi dmyigs pa 'di ni/ dngos
229a2('bum): po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid de/ de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bslab par bya'o/ /gsol pa bcom ldan 'das dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid ji lta bu lags/
229a3('bum): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de bzhin nyid gang la skye ba myi dmyigs/ 'jig pa myi dmyigs/ gnas pa las gzhan du 'gyur ba myi dmyigs pa 'di ni/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid de/ de la
229a4('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bslab par bya'o/ /gsol pa bcom ldan 'das yang dag par spong ba rnams kyi de bzhin nyid ji lta bu lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de bzhin nyid
229a5('bum): gang la skye ba myi dmyigs/ 'jig pa myi dmyigs/ gnas pa las gzhan du 'gyur ba myi dmyigs pa 'di ni/ yang dag par spong ba rnams kyi de bzhin nyid de/ de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bslab par bya'o/ /
229a6('bum): gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid ji lta bu lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de bzhin nyid gang la skye ba myi dmyigs/ 'jig pa myi dmyigs/ gnas pa las gzhan
229a7('bum): du 'gyur ba myi dmyigs pa 'di ni/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid de/ de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bslab par bya'o/ /gsol pa bcom ldan 'das dbang po rnams kyi de bzhin nyid ji lta bu lags/

229b3('bum): chub kyi yan lag rnams kyi de bzhin nyid ji lta bu lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de bzhin nyid gang la skye ba myi dmyigs/ 'jig pa myi dmyigs/ gnas pa las gzhan du 'gyur ba myi dmyigs pa

229b5('bum): lta bu lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de bzhin nyid gang la skye ba myi dmyigs/ 'jig pa myi dmyigs/ gnas pa las gzhan du 'gyur ba myi dmyigs pa 'di ni/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i
229b6('bum): de bzhin nyid de/ de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bslab par bya'o/ /gsol pa bcom ldan 'das 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid ji lta bu lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/
229b7('bum): de bzhin nyid gang la skye ba myi dmyigs/ 'jig pa myi dmyigs/ gnas pa las gzhan du 'gyur ba myi dmyigs pa 'di ni/ 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid de/ de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bslab
229b8('bum): par bya'o/ /gsol pa bcom ldan 'das bsam gtan rnams kyi de bzhin nyid ji lta bu lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de bzhin nyid gang la skye ba myi dmyigs/ 'jig pa myi dmyigs/ gnas pa las gzhan
230a1('bum): du 'gyur ba myi dmyigs pa 'di ni/ bsam gtan rnams kyi de bzhin nyid de/ de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bslab par bya'o/ /gsol pa bcom ldan 'das tshad myed pa rnams

230b4('bum): skye ba myi dmyigs/ 'jig pa myi dmyigs/ gnas pa las gzhan du 'gyur ba myi dmyigs pa 'di ni/ mngon par shes pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid de/ de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bslab par bya'o/ /

230b8('bum): kyi de bzhin nyid de/ de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bslab par bya'o/ /gsol pa bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams kyi de bzhin nyid ji lta bu lags/ bcom ldan 'das

231a4('bum): gsol pa bcom ldan 'das so so yang dag par rig pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid ji lta bu lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de bzhin nyid gang la skye ba myi dmyigs/ 'jig pa myi dmyigs/ gnas pa

231a6('bum): chen po'i de bzhin nyid ji lta bu lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de bzhin nyid gang la skye ba myi dmyigs/ 'jig pa myi dmyigs/ gnas pa las gzhan du 'gyur ba myi dmyigs pa 'di ni byams
231a7('bum): pa chen po'i de bzhin nyid de/ de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bslab par bya'o/ /gsol pa bcom ldan 'das snying rje chen po'i de bzhin nyid ji lta bu lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de bzhin
231a8('bum): nyid gang la skye ba myi dmyigs/ 'jig pa myi dmyigs/ gnas pa las gzhan du 'gyur ba myi dmyigs pa 'di ni/ snying rje chen po'i de bzhin nyid de/ de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bslab par bya'o/ /gsol pa
231b1('bum): bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid ji lta bu lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de bzhin nyid gang la skye ba myi dmyigs/ 'jig pa myi dmyigs/ gnas pa las gzhan

231b3('bum): bu'i de bzhin nyid ji lta bu lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de bzhin nyid gang la skye ba myi dmyigs/ 'jig pa myi dmyigs/ gnas pa las gzhan du 'gyur ba myi dmyigs pa 'di ni/ rgyun tu zhugs
231b4('bum): pa'i 'bras bu'i de bzhin nyid de/ de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bslab par bya'o/ /gsol pa bcom ldan 'das lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i de bzhin nyid ji lta bu lags/ bcom ldan 'das
231b5('bum): kyis bka' stsal pa/ de bzhin nyid gang la skye ba myi dmyigs/ 'jig pa myi dmyigs/ gnas pa las gzhan du 'gyur ba myi dmyigs pa 'di ni lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i de bzhin nyid de/ de la byang chub sems dpa'
231b6('bum): sems dpa' chen pos bslab par bya'o/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i de bzhin nyid ji lta bu lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de bzhin nyid gang la skye ba myi dmyigs/
231b7('bum): 'jig pa myi dmyigs/ gnas pa las gzhan du 'gyur ba myi dmyigs pa 'di ni/ phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i de bzhin nyid de/ de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bslab par bya'o/ /gsol pa/
231b8('bum): bcom ldan 'das dgra bcom pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid ji lta bu lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de bzhin nyid gang la skye ba myi dmyigs/ 'jig pa myi dmyigs/ gnas pa las gzhan du 'gyur ba myi
232a1('bum): dmyigs pa 'di ni/ dgra bcom pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid de/ de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bslab par bya'o/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das rang byang chub kyi de bzhin nyid ji lta bu

232a3('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bslab par bya'o/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid ji lta bu lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de bzhin nyid gang la skye ba myi dmyigs/
232a4('bum): 'jig pa myi dmyigs/ gnas pa las gzhan du 'gyur ba myi dmyigs pa 'di ni/ lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid de/ de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bslab par bya'o/ /gsol pa bcom ldan
232a5('bum): 'das rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid ji lta bu lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de bzhin nyid gang la skye ba myi dmyigs/ 'jig pa myi dmyigs/ gnas pa las gzhan du 'gyur ba myi
232a6('bum): dmyigs pa 'di ni/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid de/ de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bslab par bya'o/ /yang dag pa'i mtha' shes na/ chos thams cad kyi mdo dang rgyas pa shes par 'gyur
232a7('bum): ro/ /gsol pa bcom ldan 'das/ yang dag pa'i mtha' gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ mtha' myed pa ni yang dag pa'i mtha' ste/ mtha' 'di dag la slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
232a8('bum): chen po ni/ chos thams cad kyi mdo dang rgyas pa shes par 'gyur ro/ /chos kyi dbyings shes na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ chos thams cad kyi mdo dang rgyas pa shes par 'gyur ro// //shes rab kyi pha
232b1('bum): rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa/ bam po bcu drug pa/ gsol pa bcom ldan 'das chos kyi dbyings gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dbyings myed pa ni/ chos kyi dbyings te/ chos kyi dbyings de
232b2('bum): la chad pa dang / yongs su chad pa myi dmyigs so/ /chos kyi dbyings de ltar shes pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni chos thams cad kyi mdo dang rgyas pa shes par 'gyur ro/ /gsol pa bcom ldan 'das/ ji
232b3('bum): ltar chos thams cad kyi mdo dang rgyas pa 'tshal bar bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ci nas kyang chos thams cad ldan pa yang ma yin/ myi ldan pa yang ma yin par shes par bya'o gsol pa/ bcom ldan
232b4('bum): 'das ldan pa yang ma lags/ myi ldan pa yang ma lags pa'i chos de dag kyang gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gzugs ldan pa yang ma yin/ myi ldan pa yang ma yin no/ /tshor ba ldan pa yang ma yin/
232b5('bum): myi ldan pa yang ma yin no/ /'du shes ldan pa yang ma yin/ myi ldan pa yang ma yin no/ /'du byed ldan pa yang ma yin/ myi ldan pa yang ma yin no/ /rnam par shes pa ldan pa yang ma yin/ myi ldan pa yang ma yin no/ /myig ldan pa yang
232b6('bum): ma yin/ myi ldan pa yang ma yin no/ /rna ba ldan pa yang ma yin/ myi ldan pa yang ma yin no/ /sna ldan pa yang ma yin/ myi ldan pa yang ma yin no/ /lce ldan pa yang ma yin/ myi ldan pa yang ma yin no/ /lus ldan pa yang
232b7('bum): ma yin myi ldan pa yang ma yin no/ /yid ldan pa yang ma yin/ myi ldan pa yang ma yin no/ /gzugs ldan pa yang ma yin myi ldan pa yang ma yin no/ /sgra ldan pa yang ma yin myi ldan pa yang ma yin no/ /dri ldan pa yang ma yin/ myi
232b8('bum): ldan pa yang ma yin no/ /ro ldan pa yang ma yin/ myi ldan pa yang ma yin no/ /reg ldan pa yang ma yin myi ldan pa yang ma yin no/ /chos ldan pa yang ma yin myi ldan pa yang ma yin no/ /myig gi rnam par shes pa ldan
233a1('bum): pa yang ma yin/ myi ldan pa yang ma yin no/ /rna ba'i rnam par shes pa ldan pa yang ma yin myi ldan pa yang ma yin no/ /sna'i rnam par shes pa ldan pa yang ma yin/ myi ldan pa yang ma yin no/ /lce'i
233a2('bum): rnam par shes pa ldan pa yang ma yin myi ldan pa yang ma yin no/ /lus kyi rnam par shes pa ldan pa yang ma yin myi ldan pa yang ma yin no/ /yid kyi rnam par shes pa ldan pa yang ma yin/ myi ldan pa yang
233a3('bum): ma yin no/ /myig gi 'dus te reg pa ldan pa yang ma yin/ myi ldan pa yang ma yin no/ /rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa ldan pa yang ma yin myi ldan pa yang ma yin no/ /sna'i 'dus te reg pa ldan pa yang ma yin myi ldan
233a4('bum): pa yang ma yin no/ /lce'i 'dus te reg pa ldan pa yang ma yin/ myi ldan pa yang ma yin no/ /lus kyi 'dus te reg pa ldan pa yang ma yin/ myi ldan pa yang ma yin no/ /yid kyi 'dus te reg pa ldan pa yang
233a5('bum): ma yin myi ldan pa yang ma yin no/ /myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba ldan pa yang ma yin/ myi ldan pa yang ma yin no/ /rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba ldan pa yang ma yin/ myi ldan
233a6('bum): pa yang ma yin no/ /sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba ldan pa yang ma yin/ myi ldan pa yang ma yin no/ /lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba ldan pa yang ma yin// myi ldan pa yang ma yin no/ /
233a7('bum): lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba ldan pa yang ma yin/ myi ldan pa yang ma yin no/ /yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba ldan pa yang ma yin/ myi ldan pa yang ma yin no/ /sa'i khams
233a8('bum): ldan pa yang ma yin myi ldan pa yang ma yin no/ /chu'i khams ldan pa yang ma yin myi ldan pa yang ma yin no/ /mye'i khams ldan pa yang ma yin myi ldan pa yang ma yin no/ /rlung gi khams ldan pa yang ma yin myi ldan
233b1('bum): pa yang ma yin no/ /nam mkha'i khams ldan pa yang ma yin myi ldan pa yang ma yin no/ /rnam par shes pa'i khams ldan pa yang ma yin myi ldan pa yang ma yin no/ /ma rig pa ldan pa yang ma yin myi ldan pa
233b2('bum): yang ma yin no/ /'du byed ldan pa yang ma yin myi ldan pa yang ma yin no/ /rnam par shes pa ldan pa yang ma yin/ myi ldan pa yang ma yin no/ /mying dang gzugs ldan pa yang ma yin/ myi ldan pa yang ma yin no/ /
233b3('bum): skye mched drug ldan pa yang ma yin/ myi ldan pa yang ma yin no/ /reg pa ldan pa yang ma yin myi ldan pa yang ma yin no/ /tshor ba ldan pa yang ma yin/ myi ldan pa yang ma yin no/ /sred pa ldan pa yang ma yin/
233b4('bum): myi ldan pa yang ma yin no/ /len pa ldan pa yang ma yin myi ldan pa yang ma yin no/ /srid pa ldan pa yang ma yin myi ldan pa yang ma yin no/ /skye ba ldan pa yang ma yin/ myi ldan pa yang ma yin no/ /rga shi ldan
233b5('bum): pa yang ma yin/ myi ldan pa yang ma yin no/ /sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ldan pa yang ma yin/ myi ldan pa yang ma yin no/ /tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ldan pa yang ma yin/ myi ldan pa yang ma yin no/ /

233b8('bum): yang ma yin myi ldan pa yang ma yin no/ /phyi nang stong pa nyid ldan pa yang ma yin/ myi ldan pa yang ma yin no/ /stong pa nyid stong pa nyid ldan pa yang ma yin myi ldan pa yang ma yin no/ /chen po stong pa nyid ldan pa

234b3('bum): no/ /mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu ldan pa yang ma yin/ myi ldan pa yang ma yin no/ /rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa ldan pa yang

234b6('bum): myi ldan pa yang ma yin no/ /so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi ldan pa yang ma yin/ myi ldan pa yang ma yin no/ /byams pa chen po ldan pa yang ma yin/ myi ldan pa yang ma yin no/ /snying rje chen po ldan pa yang ma
234b7('bum): yin myi ldan pa yang ma yin no/ /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwo brgyad ldan pa yang ma yin/ myi ldan pa yang ma yin no/ /rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu ldan pa yang ma yin/ myi ldan pa yang ma yin no/ /
234b8('bum): lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu ldan pa yang ma yin/ myi ldan pa yang ma yin no/ /phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu ldan pa yang ma yin/ myi ldan pa yang ma yin no/ /dgra bcom pa nyid ldan pa yang ma yin/

235a3('bum): yin no/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na gang ldan pa 'am myi ldan par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i ngo bo nyid myed de/ gang ngo bo nyid myed pa de ni/ dngos po myed pa'o/ /dngos po myed pa ni dngos po myed pa dang ldan pa yang ma yin
235a4('bum): myi ldan pa yang ma yin no/ /de ltar chos thams cad shes par bya'o/ /rab 'byor 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi mdor bsdus pa ste/ mdor bsdus pa'i pha rol tu phyin
235a5('bum): pa 'di la las dang po pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bslab par bya'o/ /byang chub sems dpa'i sa bcu la gnas te/ mdor bsdus pa la bslab par bya'o/ /mdor bsdus
235a6('bum): pa 'di la slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni/ chos thams cad kyi mdo dang rgyas pa shes par 'gyur ro/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems
235a7('bum): dpa' chen po dbang po rnon pos rtogs pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dbang po zhan pas kyang rtogs par 'gyur ba'o/ /
235a8('bum): 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dbang po 'bring pos kyang rtogs par 'gyur ro/ /'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dbang po mnyam par gzhag pas kyang rtogs par 'gyur
235b1('bum): ba ste/ 'di ni slob par 'dod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems chen po gang gis kyang rtogs par myi 'gyur ba myed do/ /'di ni le lo can gyis rtogs par 'gyur ba ma yin/ brtson
235b2('bum): 'grus zhan pas rtogs par 'gyur ba ma yin/ dran pa nyams pas rtogs par 'gyur ba ma yin/ sems 'khrugs pas rtogs par 'gyur ba ma yin gyi/ 'di ni brtson 'grus brtsams pa/
235b3('bum): le lo myed pa/ dran pa nye bar gnas pas rtogs par 'gyur ba'o/ /phyir myi ldog pa'i sa la slob par 'dod pa/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'dod pas rtogs par 'gyur ba ste/ gal
235b4('bum): te ji skad du bstan pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la slob cing / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol
235b5('bum): tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslabs nas/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par byed na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
235b6('bum): po de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ bdud kyi las ci byung yang rung ste/ de dag thams cad 'byung ba nyid kyi tshe/ rab tu spangs par 'gyur ro/ /de bas na thabs mkhas pas yongs su gzung bar
235b7('bum): 'dod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bya'o/ /gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa
235b8('bum): dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la sgom pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la brtson par byed pa de'i tshe/ 'jig rten gyi khams grangs myed pa dag na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang ji snyed
236a1('bum): cig bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba dang / chos ston pa de dag kyang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa de la dgongs pa mdzad do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/
236a2('bum): 'di lta ste/ pha rol tu phyin pa drug po 'di dag las byung ba ni/ 'das pa dang ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams te/ de bas na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
236a3('bum): po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas/ 'di ltar yongs su brtag par bya ste/ chos gang 'das pa dang ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis brnyes par gyur pa dang /
236a4('bum): brnyes pa dang / brnyes par 'gyur ba'i chos de dag bdag gis kyang thob par bya'o snyam du brtag par bya ste/ rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod
236a5('bum): pas de ltar brtson par bya'o/ /de ltar brtson pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni myur du bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o/ /rab 'byor
236a6('bum): de bas na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yid la bya ba dang ma bral bar bya ste/ gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ rnam pa
236a7('bum): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi don du de ltar spyod na/ chung ngu na se gol gtogs pa tsam du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgom pa yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de'i bsod nams ni ches
236a8('bum): mang du 'phel gyi/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na sems can gang ji snyed cig 'khod pa de dag sbyin pas yongs su tshim par byas pa dang / tshul khrims la rab tu bkod pa
236b1('bum): dang / ting nge 'dzin la rab tu bkod pa dang / shes rab la rab tu bkod pa dang / rnam par grol ba la rab tu bkod pa dang / rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba la rab tu bkod pa dang / rgyun
236b2('bum): tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la rab tu bkod pa dang / lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la rab tu bkod pa dang / phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la rab tu bkod pa dang / dgra bcom pa nyid la rab tu bkod pa
236b3('bum): dang / rang byang chub la rab tu bkod pas ni ma yin te/ gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di se gol gtogs pa tsam du bsgom pa de'i bsod nams ni ches mang du 'phel lo/ /de ci'i phyir
236b4('bum): zhe na/ sbyin pa dang / tshul khrims dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / shes rab dang / rnam par grol ba dang / rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba dang / rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu dang lan
236b5('bum): cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / dgra bcom pa nyid dang / rang byang chub ni 'di las byung ba ste/ phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams dag na/ sangs rgyas
236b6('bum): bcom ldan 'das gang ji snyed cig bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba dang chos ston pa de dag kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las byung ngo / /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang 'das pa dang ma byon pa
236b7('bum): dang / da ltar byung ba de dag kyang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid las byung ngo / /rab 'byor gzhan yang gang skad 'ga' 'am/ nyin 'ga' 'am/ nyi ma brgya 'am/ lo 'ga'
236b8('bum): 'am/ lo brgya 'am/ bskal pa 'ga' 'am/ bskal pa brgya nas bskal pa grangs myed pa brgya'i bar du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la dmyigs
237a1('bum): pa'i yid la bya bas bsgom pa de'i bsod nams ni ches mang du 'phel gyi/ 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ sems can gang ji snyed cig 'khod pa de dag thams cad sbyin pa
237a2('bum): la rab tu bkod pa dang tshul khrims la rab tu bkod pa dang / ting nge 'dzin la rab tu bkod pa dang / shes rab la rab tu bkod pa dang / rnam par grol ba la rab tu bkod pa dang / rnam par grol ba'i

237a5('bum): pa dang / tshul khrims las byung ba'i bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po bstan pa dang / bsgom pa las byung ba'i bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po bstan pa dang / rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu bstan pa

237a7('bum): dag kyang 'di las byung ngo / /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang de ltar bstan pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas pa de ni phyir myi ldog par rig par bya ste/ byang chub sems
237a8('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang thabs mkhas pa 'di dag dang ldan pa de ni/ de bzhin gshegs pas dgongs par rig par bya'o/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni sangs rgyas bye ba
237b1('bum): khrag khrig brgya stong mang pos bsnyen bkur bar rig par bya'o/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed par rig par bya'o/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po

238a7('bum): bsgoms par rig par bya'o/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni mngon par shes pa drug dang ldan par rig par bya'o/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni gzhon nur gyur par rig
238a8('bum): par bya'o/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni bsam pa yongs su rdzogs par rig par bya'o/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni sangs rgyas mthong ba dang myi 'bral bar rig

238b3('bum): bya'o/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni gzugs yongs su rdzogs par rig par bya'o/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni lung bstan pa phun sum tshogs par rig
238b4('bum): par bya'o/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni ched du bsams shing srid pa 'dod par rig par bya'o/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni rnam par rtogs par bya ba la
238b5('bum): mkhas par rig par bya'o/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni lung bstan pa la mkhas par rig par bya'o/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni yi ge dang yi ge myed pa rtogs
238b6('bum): par bya ba la mkhas par rig par bya'o/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par spyod pa la mkhas par rig par bya'o/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni

238b8('bum): tshig la mkhas par rig par bya'o/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni/ gnyis kyi lhag pa'i tshig la mkhas par rig par bya'o/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni mang po'i
239a1('bum): lhag pa'i tshig la mkhas par rig par bya'o/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni bud myed kyi lhag pa'i tshig la mkhas par rig par bya'o/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
239a2('bum): chen po de ni/ skyes pa'i lhag pa'i tshig la mkhas par rig par bya'o/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni/ ma ning gi lhag pa'i tshig la mkhas par rig par bya'o/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems
239a3('bum): dpa' chen po de ni 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung ba la mkhas par rig par bya'o/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni gzugs la mkhas par rig par bya'o/ /byang chub sems dpa'
239a4('bum): sems dpa' chen po de ni/ tshor ba la mkhas par rig par bya'o/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni 'du shes la mkhas par rig par bya'o/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po

244b7('bum): rig par bya'o/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni/ rnam par shes pa'i khams yid la myi bya ba la mkhas par rig par bya'o/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni

255b2('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par bsgrub pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa de la legs pa 'di dag yod par
255b3('bum): rig par bya'o/ / //shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa/ bam po bcu bdun pa/ gsol pa bcom ldan 'das ji ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyad par bgyi/ ji ltar shes rab
255b4('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mngon par bsgrub par bgyi/ ji ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom par bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gzugs zhi ba dang / gzugs rag las pa dang / gzugs
255b5('bum): gsog dang / gzugs snying po myed pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyad par bya'o/ /tshor ba zhi ba dang / tshor ba rag las pa dang / tshor ba gsog dang / tshor ba snying po myed pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
255b6('bum): la spyad par bya'o/ /'du shes zhi ba dang / 'du shes rag las pa dang / 'du shes gsog dang / 'du shes snying po myed pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa spyad par bya'o/ /'du byed zhi ba dang / 'du byed rag
255b7('bum): las pa dang / 'du byed gsog dang / 'du byed snying po myed pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyad par bya'o/ /rnam par shes pa zhi ba dang / rnam par shes pa rag las pa dang / rnam par shes pa gsog dang /
255b8('bum): rnam par shes pa snying po myed pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyad par bya'o/ /gang yang 'di skad du/ ji ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par bsgrub par bya zhes zer ba ni/ nam mkha'
256a1('bum): stong pa nyid mngon par bsgrub pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par bsgrub par bya'o/ /gang yang 'di skad du/ ji ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom par bya zhes zer ba ni/ bsgom pa rnam par
256a2('bum): bsgom pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom par bya'o/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la yun ring po ji srid cig tu spyad na/
256a3('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyad par 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste/ snying po byang chub la 'dug gi bar du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
256a4('bum): pa la spyad par bya ba yin te/ de ltar mngon par bsgrub par bya'o/ /bsgom par bya'o/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ji ltar sems kyi rgyun ma chad pa dang / ma bral bar spyad par bgyi/ bcom ldan
256a5('bum): 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ yid la bya ba gzhan gyi go skabs myi 'byed pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyad par bya'o/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yid la bya ba myi 'dor bas shes rab
256a6('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyad par bya/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par bsgrub par bya/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom par bya ste/ ci nas kyang sems dang sems las byung ba'i chos
256a7('bum): myi rgyu ba de ltar spyad par bya'o/ /de ltar mngon par bsgrub par bya'o/ /de ltar bsgom par bya'o/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ji lags/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyad pa dang / shes rab

261b6('bum): kyis tshor ba la dbri ba dang bsnan pa myed par bslab par bya'o/ /sa'i khams la dbri ba dang bsnan pa myed par bslab par bya'o/ /chu'i khams la dbri ba dang bsnan pa myed par bslab par bya'o/ /mye'i khams la
261b7('bum): dbri ba dang bsnan pa myed par bslab par bya'o/ /rlung gi khams la dbri ba dang bsnan pa myed par bslab par bya'o/ /nam mkha'i khams la dbri ba dang bsnan pa myed par bslab par bya'o/ /rnam par shes pa'i
261b8('bum): khams la dbri ba dang bsnan pa myed par bslab par bya'o/ /ma rig pa la dbri ba dang bsnan pa myed par bslab par bya'o/ /'du byed la dbri ba dang bsnan pa myed par bslab par bya'o/ /rnam par shes pa la dbri ba dang

266b6('bum): ba myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor bas stong par blta'o/ /rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor bas stong par blta'o/ /sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba sna'i
266b7('bum): 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor bas stong par blta'o/ /lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor bas stong par blta'o/ /lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba lus kyi
266b8('bum): 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor bas stong par blta'o/ /yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor bas stong par blta'o/ /sa'i khams sa'i khams kyis stong par blta'o/ /
267a1('bum): chu'i khams chu'i khams kyis stong par blta'o/ /mye'i khams mye'i khams kyis stong par blta'o/ /rlung gi khams rlung gi khams kyis stong par blta'o/ /nam mkha'i khams nam mkha'i khams kyis stong par blta'o/ /rnam par

267a3('bum): mying dang gzugs kyis stong par blta'o/ /skye mched drug skye mched drug gis stong par blta'o/ /reg pa reg pas stong par blta'o/ /tshor ba tshor bas stong par blta'o/ /sred pa sred pas stong par blta'o/ /len pa len pas

267a6('bum): pas stong par blta'o/ /bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pas stong par blta'o/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas stong par blta'o/ /nang stong pa
267a7('bum): nyid nang stong pa nyid kyis stong par blta'o/ /phyi stong pa nyid phyi stong pa nyid kyis stong par blta'o/ /phyi nang stong pa nyid phyi nang stong pa nyid kyis stong par blta'o/ /stong pa nyid stong pa nyid stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyis stong par
267a8('bum): blta'o/ /chen po stong pa nyid chen po stong pa nyid kyis stong par blta'o/ /don dam pa stong pa nyid don dam pa stong pa nyid kyis stong par blta'o/ /'dus byas stong pa nyid 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyis stong par blta'o/ /'dus ma byas
267b1('bum): stong pa nyid 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyis stong par blta'o/ /mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyis stong par blta'o/ /thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid kyis
267b2('bum): stong par blta'o/ /dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid kyis stong par blta'o/ /rang bzhin stong pa nyid rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyis stong par blta'o/ /chos thams cad stong pa nyid chos thams cad stong pa nyid

268b1('bum): kyis stong par blta'o/ /rab 'byor de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas/ chos thams cad rang gi mtshan nyid kyis stong pa la bslab par bya'o/ /gsol pa/
268b2('bum): bcom ldan 'das gal te de ltar gzugs ni gzugs kyis stong / tshor ba ni tshor bas stong / 'du shes ni 'du shes kyis stong / 'du byed ni 'du byed kyis stong / rnam par shes pa ni rnam par shes pas

268b8('bum): myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor bas stong / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba ni rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor bas stong / sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba ni sna'i 'dus

269a7('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pas stong / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pas stong / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni shes rab kyi
269a8('bum): pha rol tu phyin pas stong / nang stong pa nyid ni nang stong pa nyid kyis stong / phyi stong pa nyid ni phyi stong pa nyid kyis stong / phyi nang stong pa nyid ni phyi nang stong pa nyid kyis stong / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid ni stong
269b1('bum): pa nyid stong pa nyid kyis stong / chen po stong pa nyid ni chen po stong pa nyid kyis stong / don dam pa stong pa nyid ni don dam pa stong pa nyid kyis stong / 'dus byas stong pa nyid ni 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyis stong /

270a8('bum): pa nyid ni lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyis stong / bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyis stong / bcom ldan 'das de ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/
270b1('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod par 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor spyod pa myed pa ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i
270b2('bum): spyod pa'o/ / //shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa/ bam po bco brgyad pa/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ci'i slad du/ spyod pa ma mchis pa/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i
270b3('bum): spyod pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang myi dmyigs/ byang chub sems dpa' yang myi dmyigs/ spyod pa yang
270b4('bum): myi dmyigs/ gang spyod pa dang / gang gis spyod pa dang / gang la spyod pa de yang myi dmyigs te/ rab 'byor gang la spros pa de dag thams cad myi dmyigs pa de ni/ byang chub sems dpa'
270b5('bum): sems dpa' chen po'i spyod pa myed pa/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'o/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das gal te de ltar spyod pa ma mchis pa/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i spyod pa lags na/
270b6('bum): las dang po pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la ji ltar spyad par bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor 'di ltar las dang po pa'i
270b7('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/ sems dang po bskyed pa nas brtsams te chos thams cad dmyigs su myed pa la bslab par bya'o/ /des sbyin pa gtong ba'i tshe/ myi dmyigs pa'i
270b8('bum): tshul gyis sbyin pa gtong bar bya'o/ /tshul khrims bsrung ba'i tshe/ myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis/ tshul khrims srung bar bya'o/ /bzod pa sgrub pa'i tshe/ myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis bzod pa sgrub par bya'o/ /

271a8('bum): bya'o/ /dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid sgom pa'i tshe/ myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis/ dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid bsgom par bya'o/ /rang bzhin stong pa nyid sgom pa'i tshe/ myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis/ rang bzhin
271b1('bum): stong pa nyid bsgom par bya'o/ /chos thams cad stong pa nyid sgom pa'i tshe/ myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid bsgom par bya'o/ /rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid sgom pa'i tshe/ myi dmyigs pa'i

271b4('bum): myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid sgom pa'i tshe/ myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis/ dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid bsgom par bya'o/ /dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi sgom pa'i tshe/ myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis/
